Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing was all good
Positive_Review: Everything from the warm welcome we got at reception a little gift on arrival of warm cookies and a bottle or called water great way to say hello hotel is absolutely beautiful and the staff are great too the room was amazing lovely view of the river and loved the complimentary boat for the river crossing would 100 stay here again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Drinks were a bit pricey but probably normal price for London and the bathroom was a bit on the small side for my liking
Positive_Review: All of it staff were fantastic got a car parking space which is a bonus as it is first come first served room was clean and we had a lot of room in the room itself Shower in bathroom was fab nice to have a decent shower in a hotel and the food was amazing Would recommend the vouchers by a dinning voucher for 25 and get 5 free

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bathroom ridiculously small could barely use toilet and have door closed Using garage was challenging as entry cards didn t work so lots of trips to and from reception
Positive_Review: Service at dinner was excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely friendly and informative went above and beyond our expectations Was able to check in earlier then stated which was brilliant The free unlimited ferry ride back and forth was a brilliant perk

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Wasn t made clear how easy it was to get the C10 bus directly to the property from Canada Water so we had a very expensive taxi that took us to the wrong Hilton through the Rotherhithe tunnel
Positive_Review: The deluxe rooms overlooking the Thames have great views You can also open the windows properly so the room stays cool and fresh Ferry great for getting across to the City and the restaurants

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: unable to get the room i wanted river view with outside balcony
Positive_Review: love the hotel stayed before just didnt get the room i was expecting but the staff did try to amend it limited amount of river view rooms with access to outside balcony

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Having to queue at restaurant for breakfast
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff Comfort Accessibility Facilities Perfect location for use of public transport including small ferry to Canary Wharf and back to hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Found room cheaper still no refund through booking com one staff member told me there was no parking on site Bathroom could have been cleaner
Positive_Review: Location and ferry great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Unfortunately during my stay I got food poisoning from the hotels restaurant When mentioned to staff they were not very concerned This spoilt my stay
Positive_Review: Good facilities and lovely spot rooms were spot on On arrival we were upgraded to a suite

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our door did not lock on its own and we only realised when we were leaving our room to catch the boat Had to ring reception and it took them 25 minutes to send someone up to fix it We had to wait in the room as didn t want to leave it unlocked with valuables in it This meant we missed the boat over the river and also took about 45 minutes out of our day when we wanted to get into London centre for our weekend away
Positive_Review: Breakfast was cooked well with a lot of choice to cater for everybody Rooms were clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The whole experience The hotel is over priced for what it is it s not luxury it s a standard hotel with standard rooms and I paid 250 a night for the best room and the room was pathetic
Positive_Review: The food was nice but expensive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: At times the lobby was very crowded Restaurant Breakfast was nice but also very busy Navigating the hallways and lifts was a bit confusing wouldn t want to be a little tipsy Location is a bit out of the way but useful for where we needed to be
Positive_Review: Breakfast buffet was amazing Room was decent size clean quiet and well laid out View was lovely Ferry was very helpful Staff was very helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Couldn t use the dockside bar past 10pm Was told could not make any cocktails as they had been busy that week had no ingredients left Main bar was cramped when we returned to hotel after our meal ended up finishing the night earlier than planned headed to our room a little disappointing to say the least
Positive_Review: Lovely room with great featured bathroom abit of a let down old fashioned Breakfast excellent huge choice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The cookie received on arrival The staff were really friendly and helpful One particular bar staff was very friendly and chatty didn t get his name as we met in the lift

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Wifi could be a little hit and miss may have just been my phone though as partner appeared to have no issues
Positive_Review: Loved the trip away Very comfy bed good sized room and bathroom lovely view and had a small balcony Free unlimited pass on the ferry to get into Canary Wharf Great variety of food in the buffet breakfast Warm cookie on arrival Overall great stay at the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We had no windows to open making the room exceptionally hot and was expecting a lovely view of the Thames which we didn t have
Positive_Review: The staff were welcoming room was lovely and breakfast was very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It was a littl further out than we thought it would but other than that all good
Positive_Review: Staff were efficient views of the river lovely comfortable room with small balcony

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The Restaurant had run out of key ingredient from their limited menu The waitress lied about the sauce on the brisket and the customer service right up to duty manager was deplorable and insulting Having stayed in other DoubleTrees and The Hiltonsurrounding I was horrified The room was not made up and after some hours trying to locate anyone to help I was told I would have to stand there or it would not be done The step into the bathroom has a sign but is still missable owing to the tiling
Positive_Review: We were thankful the Blacksmith was to hand The hosts and hospitality should train those at The Hotel They were so good we returned for a family mealife later in the week

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Booking com advertised a room with a view across the Thames I did not get one My view was a brick wall
Positive_Review: The helpfulness and courtesy of the staff How quiet it was The ferry ticket and cookies was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The way the breakfast was it was unorganised it was really busy and only one chef cooking and everyone was complaining as they wasn t everything out for breakfast also the sausages wasn t cooked properly they was pink
Positive_Review: The views and that it was based on the river the location was lovely and that you could get a ferry from the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Toilet seat was broken in our room which was surprisingly annoying Also we were shown to a table for breakfast went up to get a drink then another couple were also shown to our table which was by the window I had moved things around on the table to try and indicate it was taken however we did not want a scene as it appeared the other couple of ladies did so we moved not very proffessional made it quite uncomfortable
Positive_Review: Good location for the Olympic Stadium

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Parking was a nightmare you have to phone a number when you got to the car park so they could lift the barrier but no answer so i rang the hotels reception to be told i had to walk up to reception as noone would answer the number that was left Breakfast was a bit of a sham everything lovely once you finally got it but seemed to be chasing staff constantly to get cutlery juice jams
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The lamp in our room didnt work The satellite cable used to go off and the tv was displayed with no source After change of sheets on our second day we returned to tea coffee stained sheets Staff make you wait a long time even if they don t have any customers to deal with Especially the ones that help around the kitchen Found a fried egg with a hair on it right infront of the chef and she failed to detect it Completely put me off breakfast that day The underground car park seemed very risky as no sufficient lighting also had some young teens running in past midnight which concerned me and my wife For 660 3 night stay I d expect a lot more Compared to 740 i paid for flights and accommodation to Sofitel Dubai last summer this was a 1 star experience The UK needs to renovate the shoddy buildings it s a class below the rest of the world Wouldn t recommend this hotel at all Pay a bit more for something in the city Novotel etc Location is not the best it s about 15min walk from nearest underground and 3 min ferry ride and 9min walk to Canary Wharf station The area itself feels unsafe The hotel doesn t even offer water Me and my wife would take our own bottles at breakfast as the two bottles are finished by the time we get to breakfast around 9am We had a Queen guest room which we upgraded to a better view for 20per night as the others were taken Absolute extortion Room was relatively small The bathroom was a joke The tub and tiles had limescale and the sink was very low and really small Had to wash my hands at the side of the tap because I couldn t lather them directly under it If you try to wash your face water spills everywhere They have a bar across our side of the room Apparently they had a prom night for students Loud music went on past midnight which could be easily heard through the glass like I was sleeping outside Very narrow lift and corridors
Positive_Review: The ferry ride to Canary Wharf was complimentary for hotel guests but due to lack of other services we might as well have paid for it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room tired TV unable to face the bed Tiny bathroom Not near public transport Small corridors
Positive_Review: really warm welcome with cookies the boat trip to and from the hotel nice bar overlooking the river good breakfast fast check out

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Booking com stated we had a smoking room however when we arrived I had to go out of my way back to reception to get the room changed which they said usually costs 25 pounds
Positive_Review: The boat ride from the hotel across the river Thames which was offered free by the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room I booked was a king deluxe and I expected a good view but was over looking the car park not the most romantic of places
Positive_Review: Great location close to canary wharf and loved the little ferry

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The internet connection was awful and kept dropping off Paid 8 for a tuna sandwich which was very basic and was worth about 2 We had a powercut at about 10pm which was a bit of a pain
Positive_Review: Warm cookie on check in was great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Only thing I could pick fault with is I was hoping for a fiver view on the balcony but sadley we didn t get that You could just about see the river but it was more of a view of the court yard Not that the court yard was dirty or an eye sore or anything but would ve made the trip even better with a Canary Wharf view
Positive_Review: Great modern hotel staff lovely and the room comfy Went for my girlfriends birthday and let them know this when I booked When we arrived we were greeted with happy birthday balloons on the bed which was a great touch We then went out round London for an hour or so and returned to 2 beautiful cheescakes strawberrys and blueberries and a bottle of wine and 2 glasses sat on the bed side cabinet with a little happy birthday note from the duty manager What an absolutely fantastic touch and they really were beautiful I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here so modern clean and comfortable and the staff and management really helped make our trip and my girlfriends birthday Will be returning

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Got in late wanted to go to bed and order room service to be told that they had stopped cooking and had run out of everything from the snack menu So ordered take away and the 5 staff on the desk were not even good enough to ring the room to tell me the delivery guy was here They would only give us one room key which was very annoying as my partner went to the bar to get drinks and I got in the bath He asked for a 2nd key and was refused which was most inconvenient Had to pay extra for wifi The bed was very tired and noisy
Positive_Review: Good welcome with a yummy cookie Bathroom facilities excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Price of the breakfast and that it wasn t included in the price for the room Too far from the attractions A long walk for the tube station
Positive_Review: Clean rooms Friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room service very poor it was a selection of left overs as described by a member of your staff as a result of this we had a processed meat type sandwich cobbled together and a packet of crisps grand total of which came to a staggering 17 00 where as I appreciate room service is expensive by the very nature I would expect said sandwich meal to be all singing and all dancing to coin a phrase This not being the case I would appreciate some form of recompense I shall leave this for you to determine what is fare
Positive_Review: Breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The restaurant food at night is very poor and basic and extremely over priced we expected more from a Hilton although breakfast was very nice
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was brilliant and the boat was amazing hotel was extremely clean and the staff where very helpful Lovely to sit outside at night and watch the Thames Lots of choice at breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Better food options for room service after 11pm choice of 9 cold sandwiches All food services closed very early and there is not many options around the vicinity unless you know the area very well
Positive_Review: Location for our purpose of Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park Stadium concert Travel to and from stadium was very easy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: they charged a service charge every time I went to the bar for a drink I had to ask for it to be removed It was shocking And extra 1 30 every single time I went to the bar just for service More if you were ordering more than 2 drinks
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Comfortable and clean hotel in an interesting location It s not exactly what I would call a boutique hotel though it is large breakfast felt like an all inclusive impersonal no nice touches and there is nothing really special about it The short boat trip across to Canary Warf Pier is pleasant although you do have to factor in more time when going from A to B Sitting outside on the terrace is nice but be warned if you order 2 small bottles of water at the bar to take to your room they will cost you nearly 8 which does include an unbelievable 0 9 service charge Fortunately this was deducted from my bill when I expressed my disgust

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We had a nightmare with the key cards because we was given 3 different cards on 3 separate occasions and none were working We was on the 6th floor so to keep going up and down to reception was very tiring I was calling reception and all they were doing was putting me on hold it was quite frustrating
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When booking I chose a room with great views of the London skyline Our view was of an estate over the road When I questioned the staff at reception they said that if I had wanted a room with a view I should have contacted the hotel separately to my booking com booking Something which I couldn t have possibly known and which I suspect may be total rubbish
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a great location and the views of Canary Wharf are fantastic

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Unhelpful staff late allocation of room which resulted in a missed dinner appointment the room should have had Sky TV it didnt the bath was rusty the tiles were stained Used the fact that i booked through Booking com that the room was not correct
Positive_Review: Breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The shift leader on the morning of the 8 7 17 during breakfast time should improve her communication skills and attitude towards customers I Had asked the receptionist to have one of the tables cleaned for breakfast and was told it would be done in five minutes The shift leader who was told to do this walked away without any communication whatsoever and l was left standing next to a dirty table for more than 15 mins until I had to look for an alternative seating place She never came back to me untill I called her after breakfast
Positive_Review: Allocated Room no 171 The bed was comfortable the pillows were too soft and warning the step sign in the bathroom should also be out side the bathroom in case someone falls down

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was very warm and there wasn t enough tea and coffee left in the room
Positive_Review: Close to the river and had a ferry accross to canary wharf which was free to guests

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fact that in 2017 this hotel does not provide free wifi puts it right at the bottom of my list I don t want to pay 12 99 per day for wifi and 20 per day for breakfast when there are other hotels in the area that throw both in for free Also I don t want to stay in a room that has air con that has 3 levels Not very cold quiet Not very cold quite noisy Not very cold really noisy It s not cool
Positive_Review: Bed comfy Location good for a quick ferry ride into canary wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Very limited food available when returning from the O2 late at night Didn t like the distance from a tube station Felt the Hotel lacked refinements Carpets looked tired Hot drinks served in glasses with no handle so very difficult to hold
Positive_Review: We loved being able to sit out by the river in the morning for coffee Liked the ferry being directly available Reception very helpful when we arrived as we were in a rush to get to the O2 Very good breakfast and comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The air conditioning was set at 23 degrees which we were unable to alter and was a bit warm for us
Positive_Review: The location was excellent and views from our room fabulous Very convenient to have complimentary ferry shuttle to and from Canary Wharf which allowed easy access to all areas of the city

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: room lighting layout service slow at times tv on wall that could not be comfortably viewed from bed Balcony dirty
Positive_Review: Breakfast Buffet fresh omeletes coffee machine friendly staff Comfy Bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Rubbish coffee sachets in room The toilet was adequate in the bathroom but if you were a little large you would find it a problem to sit on and close the door We were ok
Positive_Review: Lovely delicious hot cookie welcome Bed very comfortable good air conditioning Excellent breakfast choice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Called on room phone at 5am and again at 8am by somone phoning to cancel their work experience Staff were not particularly helpful and the queue at reception was slow moving
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: A little isolated from the main areas of London because of the river and no bridge around but the ferry makes it up somehow
Positive_Review: Former warehouse along the river converted into a lovely style hotel The room is more spacious than the average of London The bed was very comfy The hotels give a pass for the ferry crossing the river to Canary Wharf which is the easiest access to most areas on the city

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Quicker room service had to make a second request for additional pillows when we checked in we were told breakfast was included but when we went down to breakfast it wasn t so that was a bit embarrassing
Positive_Review: It was the most comfortable bed we have slept in ever Welcome biscuits Getting there by boat location of the bar having a balcony and a door that opened out onto the balcony

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We didn t have coffee at the hotel However upon arrival we were visibly soaking wet having walked through torrential rain yet weren t even offered a paper towel to dry off

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The air con was not working properly in our room we had to leave all windows and balcony door open over night cause it was pretty warm otherwise
Positive_Review: The free ferry to Canary wharf the very comfortable bed the view from the balcony excellent breakfast friendly and attentive staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No fan so was warmer than I would have liked Breakfast at almost 20 for a full English per person a rather hefty additional cost found the bar staff quite rude and disinterested
Positive_Review: Lovely room comfortable bed large to

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: First night we stayed on the ground floor and got 5 hours sleep because of the noise of staff at the smoking shelter and a skip being changed at 7 30 am The staff were very rude and not helpful at all with bags and the chafing of room
Positive_Review: Nothing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The hotel was very busy At breakfast the restaurant was packed noisy and not well laid out for finding the food Poor bread selection In our double room the duvet was too heavy There was only one bedside table In my opinion our room should have been a single room as there was not enough room for a double bed I wish Premier Inn would open a hotel nearby they are far superior and much better value for money
Positive_Review: The ferry boat is an asset

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The taxi service the hotel uses was very poor We booked him to take us to a show which we arrived 35 mins late for and not only that but we had to get our own navigation out on our phones to get him there after a 1 hour transport from the hotel Felt like the gentleman was deliberately driving wrong to get more money our of the journey wouldn t recommend this at all to anyone wishing to get a taxi into the city from here We called a black Cab on the next trip and got where we needed again centre of London for less than the hotel taxi Even the black taxi cabs on the way back cost cheaper to book This was the only upsetting part of this trip
Positive_Review: Views at night and free boat to get across the river

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We arrived at 16 45 check in was 15 00 however our room was not ready We had very little time to check in and set off again therefore we had to make do with a temporary room which we had little choice but to accept as we were running a bit late
Positive_Review: Good location and Asha on reception was very welcoming and provided useful information

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was very hot and the Aircon didn t work There wasn t any bottled water in the room either let alone a fridge mini bar
Positive_Review: Lovely location overlooking the Thames

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Waiting 45 minutes to be seat at breakfast Then waiting 20 minutes in a que for your full English breakfast and letting what s on your plate already getting cold Clean the rooms before new guests go in Make sure the tv works Have clear signs to show keep quiet after dark Taxi at 1 and 3pm in the car park honking horn is not good
Positive_Review: Complementary ferry crossing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The que to be seated for breakfast took a little while likewise waiting at the bar to be served took a while
Positive_Review: Loved that breakfast was unlimited with a great range to choose from The ferry pass was an added convenience and the warm cookies on arrival were a lovely touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Rooms were quirky loved the windows with the shutters rather than curtains Outside seating areas were great Food was lovely Cookies on arrival were amazing The free ferry across to Canary Wharf is fantastic Great stay will hopefully be back again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff in the restaurant specifically at breakfast were entirely unhelpful and in more than one occasion rude Breakfast service on the day was poorly managed and despite the lady chef who was a diamond in the rough was frankly awful particularly as paying 200 a night was not close to value for money Extremely disappointing Breakfast experience 0 out 10
Positive_Review: Great location staff on arrival and checkout were extremely pleasant and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: TV not watchable from Bed in a very awkward position Bathroom and bedroom very small and we had a king deluxe room not even enough room for two people in bathroom Had a room right next to the lift so heard guests in and out all night No fridge in room to store drinks and London was baking this week
Positive_Review: Warm cookies on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Ordered room service late one evening and there was no food left although the guy who spoke to me ended up finding a sandwich which had just gone out of date I was starving so took it and he threw in brownies too free of charge
Positive_Review: Staff here are amazing and so helpful Room was beautiful and will definitely be coming back

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Birthday tray was organized Wasn t ready and I had to call from the room to ask where it arrived 4hours late The restaurant was booked for outside to enjoy the views couldn t have the table booked as the hotel had booked a private function If i had know I would have gone somewhere else No water available Paid for breakfast for my wife and they were supposed to pass the ticket under the door This never happened so my wife never got breakfast which was paid for Spent 15minutes calling reception until someone answered to complain that we could not sleep as the music from the function was vibrating through the room
Positive_Review: Nothing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Air conditioning wasnt working so room was unbearable and didnt get any sleep throughout the night There was no fans that could be provided either Got discounted rate but still paid 150 for one night stay in a room that we didnt get any sleep in due to the heat
Positive_Review: Location was great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The price of this hotel for one night was very expensive and when talking to other visitors at the hotel we found that we paid twice as much as they did and they had a two night stay we only had one
Positive_Review: I liked the hotel in general

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The hotel was absolutely spotless the room was very spacious and up to date I would recommend this hotel to anyone
Positive_Review: The hotel was lovely and the staff where very pleasant and friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Very poor quality of accomodation for amount paid for stay Property very dated and requires an update No mini fridge in room which I would have expected for amount paid for stay Also very poor view room overlooked a car park
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was a lot smaller then a delux queen room should be I ve Been to budget hotels with a room that size and half the price balcony barely had a river view
Positive_Review: Balcony was ok

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The air con did not go below 26 which on a hot day is a nightmare someone said they would look at it but never showed up we saw them giving out fans but they apparently ran our The door which opened to the outside would not lock there was a barrier outside and a small chain inside but anyone could have climbed over and bashed the door open The car park was full so they sent us to one down the road which you could exit on foot right near the hotel but when you had to return to it with your bags you couldn t get back through those doors so you had to walk down the road and then basically all the way back on yourself to the hotel side underground It was narrow and difficult to manoeuvre in a big car and they still charge 16 not 12 like it says on some sites for the privilege Don t stay here if you want to be close to city centre either a long bus ride to the nearest tube stop or ferry ride over to Canary Wharf with a walk to the tube We had a drink in the bar only to find inflated prices and a discretionary 12 5 service charge we went to the bar for our drinks but would have paid the same if we d just sat down and got someone to serve us We found a dirty coffee cup next to our bed though I have to say generally the room was clean and tidy small but fit for purpose I personally wouldn t stay here again mainly because I didn t find it very convenient for getting to or getting around
Positive_Review: The outside restaurant bar area is nice to look over the water towards Canary Wharf The communal areas grounds are well looked after and very welcoming Staff are very friendly even if they do forget to come and see you when promised

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We did the reservation via booking com and we had to wait 30min to check in as the reservation wasn t in the system It was a 30C day and we got a roof room with a poor functioning AC very noisy and didn t cool the room at all Overall the stay wasn t brilliant
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Air con in room could be better Also nobody answered when calling for room service numerous times
Positive_Review: Location and view were amazing Modern look Cookies on arrival are a lovely touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was not at all as depicted by the images it looked wonderful on the pictures river view wide ground to ceiling French doors balcony open and airy reality was a cell with a port hole that would not stay open unless propped with a pen the night was for my husbands birthday linked to seeing Guns and Roses and so was a treat room service Did not answer on three occasions we rang reception who said they would pass on our message and room service would revert to us this did not happen the price of overnight parking was charged at 16 but on booking com stated 12 this was reviewed and Amended I was upset and embarrassed that the special occasion was ruined by poor description of room as I would not have booked if it had been described as it truly was and other services on offer were not actually provided the trip had been planned for six months and turned out not to be the perfect Experience that I had wished for my husband I felt let down by false advertising
Positive_Review: Cleanliness

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was a little dated and located over the front reception where cars and buses were dropping and collecting pasengers
Positive_Review: Facilities location Breakfast all very good Staff helpful and courteous

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room s are small for a deluxe The layout of the room isn t great Mirror in a dark corner with no light Drinks at the bar very expensive 26 for two drinks
Positive_Review: Rooms were clean staff friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Explain how the parking works as we ended up going through the driving opening when picking up the car as couldn t find a pedestrian walk way
Positive_Review: The staffs approach In delivering the best service we ve ever had and to make our stay the best we ve ever had in the uk Thank you so much

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The ferry was excellent staff really nice The terrace was nice to sit out on to relax and have a drink We had afternoon tea on the Friday which was excellent and all the staff were lovely at breakfast especially Sandra who made me my omlette

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Parking we had paid for it and could only park in the farthest car park away which was down the road there was no easy access to and from it
Positive_Review: The ferry they provided to get to the other side where you could get to canary warf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The reception staff are very cold unwelcoming really think they are superior to everyone The view was meant to be a city view If looking at the back of the hotel a car park building site is meant to be city Booking com you really need to change your wording The arrangements to get to the hotel also need to be clear If I had known I could travel by tube then jump on a boat to take me to Canary Wharf to then catch the regular ferry over to the hotel it would have saved me walking in what I class as very dodgy areas
Positive_Review: Food was excellent both the breakfast evening meal The restaurant staff were extremely helpful polite friendly Especially Dinos Francis The bed was so comfy George on reception was very helpful polite Shame about the other reception staff If it wasn t for the food bed restaurant staff I would never step foot in the hotel again It is only those points that made me give it a reasonable review

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The attention to detail we have appreciated at lower star Hilton hotels was missing on this occasion and we felt there was a complacency that the accommodation was enough on its own A suite for 2 with no bathrobes or slippers a mean amount of toiletries and tea facilities which barely lasted the duration of the stay no virgin cocktails hairs in the bath the tv not working properly and showing other guests details these were the irritating things that detracted from our luxury experience There is also a tendency to over reliance on free cookies which were offered as a panacea to all no substitute for a bathrobe On a positive note we were offered extra towels but this was after a 2 hour wait and 3 phonecalls
Positive_Review: The hotel is in an amazing location with a private return ferry service from Canary Wharf which makes you feel incredibly special The converted building is high end and certainly luxurious with stunning views Staff are pleasant Breakfast was excellent and plentiful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: You can t improve perfection
Positive_Review: The bed was super comfy and the pillows But more to the point I must mention Sandra Her personality shines and she is a great asset to The Hilton hotel She cooks the best omelettes in the world She makes them just soft and fluffy enough without any raw parts Hilton is lucky to have her Look after her she is an asset to you Also there was a young man Italian who served us at reception He was so demure and a perfect gentleman I don t know where you get your staff from and how you train them but they are the greatest asset to you It doesn t matter how beautiful your hotel is and how much money you have spent if the staff do not reflect it in their personalities I didn t want to leave

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The first room allocated was rear of building on ground floor and dated so I upgraded
Positive_Review: I changed rooms from basic standard ground floor dated room to a king de luxe second floor Paid upgrade

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bathroom was quite small in that you had to shut the door to sit on the toilet but who needs a big bathroom
Positive_Review: Location staff accessibility quiet and view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfy the breakfast was really nice but for me the location was fantastic we were heading to the O2 and it was just so easy would definitely stay there again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The breakfast was awful Queuing to get in and wait was unacceptable The food was hard and warm not hot because it was sitting siting fir us The tables weren t clean or wiped or tidied away on time Really disappointed
Positive_Review: I liked the old brick building but unfortunately we didn t get that sort of room that was advertised

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No spa or pool Something for the hotel to consider getting
Positive_Review: Very welcoming friendly staff who gave us cookies upon check in clean good location with complimentary ferry taxi then only a short walk to the tube shops and restaurants close by the hotel had a lovely breakfast choice something for everyone rooms were perfect as had everything you could need Park over the road if you have little ones Parking which is of good price We had a great view from our room too x

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Hard beds Rubbish wifi
Positive_Review: Location was stunning Staff were all really lovely friendly and helpful Breakfast outstanding Cod with risotto dinner was outstanding

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location is a little off Beautiful but off The nearest stations Canary Wharf and Canada water are not that close to the hotel In the room we stayed the wifi was just not working for the full trip On booking com it said that we had a city view but that was just a view to a parkinglot
Positive_Review: The old monumental building is beautiful Location next to the river has a lot of romance to it The breakfast is good The staff is very helpfull and friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was a lot smaller than expected didn t have a river view as requested and wasn t like the pictures
Positive_Review: Staff were lovely and the head chef was fantastic

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Waited nearly 1 hour for the ferry on Saturday night as ferry staff having a break and not working to the published timetable Bit of a pain with young kids
Positive_Review: Staff went the extra mile for us Providing treats for our daughter s birthday Fab breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Check in very good nice bonus of warm cookie Ferry service great Excellent service in the restaurant staff very friendly and professional but make you feel like you are getting a personal service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were upgraded to a king size suite The bed was the most comfortable I have ever slept in the breakfast was superb a thoroughly enjoyable stay Thank you

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing it s excellent
Positive_Review: This hotel is amazing the staff are the best the rooms are fantastic brilliant location no need for the tube just take the boat everywhere the beds are soooo comfortable and a warm cookie on arrival it really is excellent I would recommend to anyone and everyone going to definitely come back wouldn t go anywhere else now

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Air coon and the room temperature was difficult to adjust
Positive_Review: Breakfast is worth it all Staff and place with the view and the bar is just perfect The staff most of them is great The food is good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: there was nothing I didn t like except the lighting was abit poor could ve done with a light outside the bathroom and more mirrors in the room
Positive_Review: The complimentary cookies were the best I personally love staying in places with views and the view was beautiful and the balcony

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We were in a room with a sloped Roof and our window looked directly into another guest room
Positive_Review: The staff are super helpful and the welcome Cookie was really good The bar and outside Areas are also really nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: This has been the worst hotel experience of my life The room was small my bed was under a slanted roof only had blind windows the curtains didn t keep the light out and the airconditioning next to my bed was extremely noisy even in OFF mode Even earplugs could not resolve this All this for 263 euro night And under the Hilton brand Hotel not reachable by tube
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: the bathroom was just a tad dated and something was rusty in the shower
Positive_Review: The chef was really friendly and accommodating and made my eggs to order All of the staff was really nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Tricky to get to by tube which was stressful after a long train journey Bus was easier but there was no mention of the bus on their website we found out ourselves We arrived in the room and there was only 1 teabag and the shower gel shampoo etc wasn t replaced on day 2 Clean room but it s the extra bits that make a difference
Positive_Review: The bed was amazing so comfy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: when booking stated executive lounge access when arrived we were told that it wasnt included and not available in this hotel asked for room close to family that were also in hotel this was not accommodated either
Positive_Review: clean room good choice for breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location is a bit far from city center Free wifi is only available for members
Positive_Review: I could hear the water flow and feel peace by the river view and the bed is comfortable It s quiet at night

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The only thing we missed was a vending machine We arrived back from a concert and had to rush to get the last ferry back to the hotel There was nowhere after 11pm to get a drink and snack to take back to the room A vending machine would be ideal there was one for toothpaste razors etc
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly helpful and efficient Offered an upgrade on a room so we could check in early Cookies on arrival Fantastic spread of everything you could wish for at breakfast Comfy bed and pleasant room Lovely views of London Very good value for money

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Had to inform reception that the state of our bathroom was not acceptable when we arrived They were very apologetic and had it cleaned for us Offered a discount The amount of time it took to get a drink from the bar more staff needed
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Drink and food prices
Positive_Review: Fab breakfast Great room Comfy bed Clean throughout Great location with river taxi there Recommend Would stay there again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We were up in top rooms very hot and air conditioning didnt work plus double bed was against wall so access was a pain Changed room and much morw friendly room but again air con no good
Positive_Review: Easy access to travel Free boat across river to access transport routes

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was extremely hot and stuffy The fan was on when we entered but we switched it off as it seemed to be blowing hot air despite the thermostat setting
Positive_Review: The room was clean the staff were friendly The hotel is well situated if you need to get to Canary Wharf and they give out complimentary ferry tickets

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bathroom floor could do with having a bath mat or some grip as it was very slippy and my partner would have like some complimentary chocolates or biscuits to go with the coffee and the kettle
Positive_Review: Really nice hotel nice staff and a cookie on arrival The boat was great but it was very difficult to get back at night The main bridge was closed and this was out of the hotels hands but keep this in mind if you re trying to get back on the night tube The bed was so comfortable It was very clean and easy to check in and out The bed had been made and we had fresh towels when we got back in We agree with the little signs in the bathroom asking for you to reuse the towels tho

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The Room 342 Apart from the view Really disappointed No sleep first night due to a faulty extraction unit in bathroom Rang reception at 0230h no answer The soap holder on bath not fit properly so fell off Ironing board broke And even ended up watching tv on my my phone as the remote didn t work by the last day Staff very polite full of apologies But for approx 300 it s not good enough for a hotel chain we have always stayed in
Positive_Review: The views The bar terrace The ferry crossing was frequent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Smoke alarm covered in room so dangerous told reception but little apology sent to a car park from reception without coin to gain access and room was so small breakfast was poor at first looked a great choice but eggs were not cooked as well as bacon and sausage undercooked Been to many Hilton s but this was the worst Shame as loved the location
Positive_Review: Right on the thames

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The communication between the employers could be better but that s just a small detail
Positive_Review: We liked specially the view from our room to the river the easy access provided from the hotel with the ferry boat to the Canary Wharf and of course the breakfast was amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: An excellent property living up to the Hilton standards that you would expect We had a Queen room which has a view of The Thames The staff all went above and beyond with their customer service The rooms were spotless as were all other areas within the hotel An excellent breakfast selection with waiter waitress service A nice touch was the free ferry across to the hotel from Canary Wharf included in the cost of your stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We was booked for a Queen room as it was my birthday the staff member upgraded us to Queen deleuxe room which was a pleasant suprise but our friend had a King room and they were both exactly the same other than our friends view was better than ours onto a tennis court Rooms could be modernized
Positive_Review: We enjoyed the ferry crossing and the fact it was included with stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The long walk to the car park and then to realise the barrier was closed
Positive_Review: Cookie on arrival You changed our room because of a loft room window curtain with no quibble Able to sit in the bar and have a very relaxing drink late in the evening A complimentary bottle of champagne The breakfast was very good value Views for excellent in the room The staff were very helpful especially the lady serving breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Only slight issue was the temperature we had a lovely view of the river however there was a slight draft and the heating on in our room wasn t able to go high enough for our liking however the bed was warm and comfy enough that it didn t hinder our evening that much
Positive_Review: The breakfast was fresh with so much variety especially for myself and my girlfriend as vegetarians The staff were welcoming and gave water and cookies when waiting to check in and out three whole experience was perfect

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room had a few oddities There is no mini bar There is an ice bucket ice machines on the ground floor along with two glasses There are no water bottles in the room There is a kettle for tea and coffee though When we wanted drinks we of course consulted the in room menus Ah No drinks apart from tea and coffee on the menu Tap water only How absurd So if you re a fan of ice do stay here and use that very thoughtful ice bucket and maybe even take it down to the bar that the staff assured us was open till 1am but was in fact closed by 12 15 and supply your own ice for what I m sure will be very average mimosas We also booked a balcony room We got a Juliette balcony room with a view of the river But not a balcony Just an open window with a railing in front of it The bathroom was dingy and the shower head cocked to the right The hotel is a maze of corridors When I asked for directions to my room from a porter he explained that there are 6th floors everywhere and then proceeded in telling me a very Homer esque set of directions to the room It was an odyssey to be sure The location is good for exploring the lovely Greenland Docks Rotherhithe and Canary Wharf with free tickets for the ferry but that s all The rest of the hotel is a bore It s average to the extreme and missing so many key features of any good modern hotel that it really feels like stepping back in time Oh wait no There s a very modern vending machine close to the lobby But alas no drinks just condoms and toothpaste presumably for the working clientele who can t make it home because of the late meeting
Positive_Review: The location We booked the Hilton because it was conveniently located and we were moving and needed a place to stay for a night

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bathroom could have been slightly better designed as the door was catching the toilet while opening and closing Was a very nice bathroom other then that
Positive_Review: Great view across the river and with a direct river boat to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Horrendous evening meal room with no window staff didn t seem to be bothered about food Completely different standard compared to previous hiltons
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The service at the hotel was terrible It was my partners birthday and had arranged the romance package along with my own champagne on ice The romance package was just rose petals on the bed and nothing else they promised For his birthday there was the smallest chocolate thing which wasn t even worth sending up The shower was never a constant temperature It kept going hot and cold We ordered room service twice for drinks as it was a hot day and we had to call up twice to check where the drinks were and to ask for ice and glasses as they only sent bottles Would not stay here again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I stayed at the hotel this bank holiday weekend with my boyfriend and what a pleasure it was The warm cookies on arrival are a lovely touch A MASSIVE thank you to Melvin he was at our every beck and call even going the extra mile of getting us hair spray that we had forgot to pack 10 10 on our stay and would be happy to stay again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Hotel is cramped delux room is small bathrooms are dated no mini fridge overall I expected more from a hotel like the double tree
Positive_Review: View was great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: room far to hot and extra money charged to my card and being charged for a meal not had this being said was rectified by the duty manager
Positive_Review: location the breakfast staff were excelkent friendly and efficient

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 1 we paid for a river view room but got a back room so our room should have been cheaper 2 There was constantly lorries unloading under our room so we got woke up alot 3 our bed was so creaky every time we moved we woke eachother up 4 someone came into our room at 7 30am weird
Positive_Review: The free ferry over to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: COULDNT WORK THE AIR CONDITIONING AND IT WAS EXTREMELY HOT THIS WEEKEND
Positive_Review: LOVELY ROOM OVERLOOKING THE THAMES ROOM WAS CLEAN AND WE HAD A FREE UPGRADE TO A QUEEN DELUXE WHICH HAD GREAT SPACE BED WAS COMFY VIEW WAS GREAT AND BATHROOM WAS CLEAN LOVED THE FREE FERRY ACROSS THE RIVER TO CANARY WHARF

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Firmer pillows would be nice Didn t sleep well When I go to a B B which is far cheaper you get biscuits and a variety but not here The extra effort is not there There is no ambience Reception were really good even though they initially charged 10x the price It was refunded and as an apology they they gave us free WiFi in the room and a complementary drink in the restaurant Why do they charge for WiFi in the room Also the air conditioning didn t do much conditioning i e Cooling Also noisy and no obvious airflow As for the restaurant food looked and tasted OK but is basically expensive pub food Service was awful Put at a table and then ignored Complementary drinks we argued over that one plus they charge a service charge on top Desert was awful Then they said we had to charge to the room and reception said we should have paid in the restaurant
Positive_Review: We have stayed here before so thought we d stay again We were given a free upgrade thank you presumably because there were no standard doubles available Still not really worth the 209 for the room Everything is there the room is very clean we asked and received extra pillows and milk The view over the river is great except for the noisy party boats Free ferry tickets is good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Like Jerry Seinfeld said I don t think you do You see you know how to take the reservation you just don t know how to hold the reservation And that s really the most important part of the reservation the holding Anybody can just take them I entered the hotel late at night to find that the room I have reverted was taken without any notification Im pretty sure they would have changed my fully if it would not have come at all
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Booking stated city view As I arrived at 19 30 I was given a view of the tennis courts and what looked like a housing estate Having called reception I was relocated into a river view as all the city views had gone Staff were very obliging but if you have a particular room type booked it should be honoured
Positive_Review: Staff were very pleasant and helpfull

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Wi fi didn t work at all in the room despite being a Hilton Honors member TV was fixed to the wall to the side of the bed impossible to watch without getting a stiff neck
Positive_Review: ENORMOUS bed very comfy Good location well served by local buses Complementary ferry service to Canary Wharf Fantastic breakfast Chocolate chip cookie on check in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Surprisingly well located never much of a wait for the short ferry to Canary Wharf and just hop on another boat there to Central London a perfect commute on a hot summer s day The hotel itself is great nice rooms stylish good bar restaurant and very friendly helpful staff I had one problem the air con not working in my room but they kindly upgraded me when it couldn t be immediately fixed I ll be back

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Not most convenient for access to city centre first a boat across Thames and then a 5 10 min walk to underground at Canary Wharf
Positive_Review: Easy access and parking for car Nice location next to river Good breakfast and decent size room Good friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I loved the staff so friendly and welcoming The bonus was at breakfast where the chef personally introduced herself and we then had the breakfast manager do the same This attention to detail is impressive The boat to the hotel was a bonus and the fantastic views across the Thames to Canary Wharf Rooms were much nicer than I expected

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Had to move rooms as we requested water front view but we got building site Got changed to different room told it would be 20 got home and they have taken 40 not at all happy
Positive_Review: Water front view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I could not pick a fault with anything
Positive_Review: We had a problem with the signal to the TV Engineer did improve the signal but still not successfully in the end But called down to reception and was moved to another room with a Tv in good working order Nothing seemed to be a problem Would love to stay again Fantastic location too Views amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We paid for an upgrade We have stayed here before a few years ago and chose to return to celebrate our anniversary it may have been a nice gesture to have been given this complementary or maybe to have waived the car parking charge
Positive_Review: Loved our room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: You couldn t open the bathroom door without it getting stuck against the toilet the lay out of the room was not good Also the view from our balcony was not very nice we wanted to over look the Thames
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The hotel was very far away from the centre which was not really well indicated on the site It takes you 1 hour at least to get into town The service of the hotel was ok not great There is no mini bar in the rooms so even a bottle of water is not available The rooms are a long way from the main bar The furniture in the rooms especially the chairs were worn out At the bar we asked for crisps but that was not available only drinks The quality of the breakfast is very poor It is a massa production Eggs and bacon were cooked long time in advance no fresh orange juice and the croissants were no good at all
Positive_Review: The setting is nice as the hotel is in an old renovated pack house It is ashame it has all be renovated with cheap materials though

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: My only negative comment were that even though the bathrooms were clean they looked tired in need of a refurbishment
Positive_Review: Value for money free ferry taxi pass over to Canary Wharf Free warm cookie on arrival Fab breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location Good that they provided a ferry service however I get motion sick so the journeys were not great for me We did find other routes to get where we needed to but the ferry was the quickest and easiest way
Positive_Review: Staff were wonderful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The ferry stopped at 12 15am which means it was harder to get back when you re in canary wharf at this time
Positive_Review: The rooms were fantastic and the staff were very polite and always wanted to help

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Building project going on next door but not too noisy
Positive_Review: The whole experience walking distance to Canada Water tube station From here could access all main attractions in London Fantastic shopping at Westfield Stratford Great location friendly staff great food with beautiful views both at night and during the day Breakfast available till 11 00

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: N A can t fault our stay
Positive_Review: More of a holiday resort than a hotel everywhere spotless and gorgeous looking Cute little spots throughout the hotel including snug room library with fires and open terrace balcony Staff were extremely welcoming as soon as we stepped through the doors They went above and beyond and catered for every need

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room No view from any window The Bed was rickety uncomfortable The floor boards was creeky The TV was in a bad position Not enough tea coffee making facilities Not what I would of expected for the price I ve stayed in premier inn with better rooms better Beds
Positive_Review: The hotel the car parking the staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The payment and deposits could be explained a little better at reception when checking out But this is a very little issue
Positive_Review: I have been to many Double Tree Hilton hotels and every single time I have left satisfied with my stay The staff at the reception make you feel very welcome and are always very enthusiastic I was at Double Tree in Docklands and I cant remember her name but a lady at reception did everything she could to accommodate to our needs she even upgraded our room And that little touch of giving us cookies as we finished checking in was nice In addition our room was lovely with the added touch of a balcony to enjoy the views of London Overall we had a lovely stay at Double Tree as per usual

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fact we only stayed one night
Positive_Review: Brilliant hotel the staff were brilliant Cesar Costa who checked us in was an absolute legend Perfect room with a view of the thames breakfast was lovely The whole hotel has a chilled feel we felt right at home Private ferry to canary wharf pier is a great way to travel Can t fault the place at all 100 will be staying here again All for the same price as a Travelodge Loved it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fact my friend got charged twice When we checked in we both payed half each for the hotel so we payed the full price on the first day When we checked out we were told that my friends payment did not go through and that she needed to pay again We advised that she received a receipt confirming payment however we were still told she needed to pay the price The member of staff who checked us out was incredibly rude and very patronising It was out of order especially for a Hilton hotel My friend paid and when we left she phoned her bank who advised that she had been charged twice By this point we had left the hotel so I phoned the hotel and spoke again to the rude member of staff who was again very rude and patronising she said on the phone that the bank were lying and that only one payment had gone through and was adamant this was the case She advised that she would send an email to confirm Once we received this email it contradicted everything this staff member said and advised that it was correct my friend had been charged twice My friend had to make a formal complaint regarding this matter and it ruined my opinion and expectation of Hilton hotels
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfy and on the first day the receptionist we had was lovely The birthday treat was a fantastic touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was a little small although we did have a small outside space which was great bed was very squeaky to even move there was a huge dirty linen bin over filled right out side our door from when we arrived and still there when we left
Positive_Review: Restaurant was good value for money breakfast was great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I got lost trying to find my room via the lift I needed because it was down past more rooms which I thought was a dead end
Positive_Review: The free boat to canary warf The cookies on arrival The view and balcony Staff very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It wasn t clear that it would be such a trek to get to the hotel from the tube station It was a good 5 10 minute walk with stairs to from the boat back to tube station A shuttle bus would be better than the boat in my opinion especially if bringing luggage
Positive_Review: The booking greeting staff were professional helpful and pleasant The staff in the restaurant were cheerful hard working and quick to bring the coffee when asked The room was spacious clean modern and beds were super comfy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Rooms were a little tired and the linking doors were very noisy
Positive_Review: The whole experience was good The real asset that this hotel has is the boat to Canary Wharf Without this it would have not been half as good a location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff at breakfast just ignored us at greeting desk breakfast lounge was very busy Car park system was confusing which would have been ok if it was explained on check in and check out but it wasn t We were charged a pre authorisation refundable cost without knowledge of this
Positive_Review: Lovely views location room very clean lovely hotel building terrace and outside seating area next to Thames Ferry over to Canary Wharf was reliable and great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Initial room was very poor condition small with sloping roof and bed in corner Iron flex damaged lightbulb out and curtains on skylight very frayed Just above face if in bed Room changed without a problem but original room should not have been in use Ferry return finishes at 12 midnight which is very difficult to get back for if at a show in central London
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and friendly Breakfast was excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We upgraded room because bed in queen room was terrible
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and polite Bottle of water and cookie was a nice touch and tickets for the water taxi

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bar staff were especially slow and seemed a bit disorganised even with a very quiet bar Seemed to be a bit disorganised across quite a few areas bar replenishment of food and booking differences not what I would expect from a doubletree Hilton experience
Positive_Review: Breakfast chef was extremely kind attentive and friendly She is a great asset to the company There was a bit of a mix up with my booking at check in once I showed my confirmation this was swiftly amended Great to enjoy some relaxing drinks with friends

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bathroom was a little worn
Positive_Review: The staff made me feel my stay was so important to them and there customer Focus was second to none The breakfast was amazing and I must say the gentleman who managed the restaurant on Friday night was so friendly and couldn t do more to help he is an asset to doubletree

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room had not been cleaned upon our arrival There was stains on the carpets and the towels were not clean at all There was thick dust around the bathroom including the bin and window ledge We would not stay here again
Positive_Review: nothing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No mirror at dressing table so was not able to dry and style hair with hairdryer or straighteners easily I was resorted to sitting on the floor by the door where there was a full length mirror and a socket just close enough to manage This I consider a basic consideration which is why I marked down on the facilities Also there was not window in the room but there were French doors that opened onto a little veranda That would have been fine but anybody could access that balcony which was outside our room and the neighbouring room Therefore didn t feel comfortable leaving open the doors at night and became a little to hot and stuffy
Positive_Review: The hotel was lovely and very quirky The best bit was the terrace was right on the riverside Lovely seating areas heaters blankets and all lit up at night Lovely to have coffee on the terrace in the morning The omelettes that were cooked for breakfast were to die for and a truly excellent breakfast The restaurant was very good and reasonably priced The staff were really helpful and friendly and the hotels surroundings were lovely Would love to return again The ferry service from the hotel was also brilliant with attentive staff and was very reliable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bar staff were very rude Not helpful in the slightest The room service was appalling I asked for two different items on the 24 hour food menu which they didn t have Very limited food menu All they had was sandwiches Which come in a packet No plate provided Over all wouldn t recommend staying here
Positive_Review: The cookies on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Had to pay for Wifi in room The bathroom albeit clean and the complementary toiletries slippers were great but the bathroom door would not close unless the toilet seat was up Design error
Positive_Review: The view was fantastic from the balcony We were given a complementary pass to use the ferry for our stay to cross the river The room was comfortable and clean The bed was very comfortable which is important The staff were helpful and friendly Received a cookie when we checked in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bathroom was in need of a little updating
Positive_Review: Very picturesque London hotel on the river in a converted industrial building Stunning views friendly staff very comfortable room and the breakfast was excellent The complementary river ferry was extremely helpful takes you right to Canary Wharf and the Jubilee line

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No complaints whatsoever
Positive_Review: The staff were brilliant and the food first class and I was given a complimentary glass of wine when they heard I was running the marathon which I thought was a lovely gesture

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: On Saturday 22nd April the hot breakfast items kept under the hot lock e g Bacon eggs hash browns etc were not particularly hot
Positive_Review: We were there to run in the London Marathon and to support a runner I would like to commend the hotel staff and management on the 23rd April as they gave excellent assistance to our party in extending our late check out when our runner needed treatment after the Marathon This caused our group of 11 to overrun the organised late checkout time as we were delayed in Central London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Would of liked a mirror on the desk by the socket so I could see what I was doing when drying my hair

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The service was great very helpful and friendly staff the room was comfy with a lot of space overlooking Canary Wharf and the ferry service was a lovely touch too sad to have only spent one night there

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The only issue was that the plug socket next to our mirror didn t work
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful Bed was comfy and the room was nice and clean Great location as the river ferry is right at the hotel so very easy to get onto northside of the river quickly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Everything exceeded my expectations
Positive_Review: Amazing service from the staff who went out of their way to ensure my needs were met The view from our room was amazing and overlooking Canary Wharf and the O2 with the river on one side and a distant view of the city from the other side of the balcony We were offered free return boat tickets from the hotel into Canary Wharf and the breakfast was scrumptious Would definitely return Special thanks to Maria the front desk supervisor who provided an amazing service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: Premium room was well proportioned great location to all hotel facilities nice large bed Staff were friendly and helpful free ferry to Canary Wharf a real bonus

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bar service could have been better

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Midday food and snacks from the bar menu a little expensive but tasted good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Only hotel I ve been in that didn t have bottles of water in the room I upgraded to a room with a city view but I didn t get a city view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast is expensive 16 for a breakfast I can t justify that I m afraid after spending 200 for the room rate for one night

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The only gripe is that the standard Queen rooms were very small however this did not ruin our stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
