Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The wifi in our room was poor The rooms were nice ans clean but we aspected a little bit more for the price we ve paid
Positive_Review: Great area and the ferry of the hotel is super handy Ideal to visit London The hotel was clean and the staff friendly The breakfast was fantastic

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: my first room had a leak in the bathroom ceiling and I was most unimpressed and requested another room That should not have happened and it was obvious that the leak had been happening for a long time and the room had an odour of mould Most unsatisfactory Full credit to all staff I was upgraded to a better room and all was well Could not fault the reception staff I sincerely hope that such substandard rooms are not the norm for people such as myself who have book online from along way away Australia Tasmania to be exact
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our bed wasn t stable It was on wheels so you couldn t lean on the bed because it would just roll
Positive_Review: Great location Loved the decor in our rooms and the view from our room Lovely breakfast and great service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bathroom a little small Smashed my elbow on the door numerous times
Positive_Review: Comfy bed and lovely pillows We had a great nights sleep it was almost too comfy We found ourselves not wanting to get up to continue exploring London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Had a king room and the bathroom was extremely small there was maybe a 2 3mm gap between the toilet bowl and the edge of the door I was a bit concerned about the location of the room near the lift shaft and overlooking the hotel entrance yet slept well
Positive_Review: Staff extremely friendly and helpful Lovely terrace to enjoy the sunshine Slept very well Cushions were very comfortable Loved the little ferry and the public services to the hotel were good It helped that the bus drivers were also friendly they deserve a thanks I hadn t been keen on Double Tree in the past yet this was a very positive experience so will consider in the future

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Theur was a mix up with our room but the staff were so quick to rectify the mistake and couldn t have been more apologetic and helpful
Positive_Review: The view from out king room was beautiful and we had use of the executive sweet which made the trip even more special

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I initially called about 2 months ago to request a higher floor but upon my arrival I was given a ground floor BUT the staff were excellent once I raised this issue and I media tell sought to find me a higher floor with better view I was very happy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The size of the bathtub could be better but everything else is perfect
Positive_Review: The staff is very helpfull the restaurant is awsome and the place of the hotel is really nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: the corridors and lifts were narrow and made wheelchair use a little difficult but was more than compensated for with the extremely helpful and pleasant staff I was really impressed the each and everyone who worked here

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bathroom wasn t big enough for a child let alone an adult bed was not comfy and played my back up it was not in the location that it advertised when I booked and it was not worth the money paid for it Wasn t all that clean and walls were dam and yellow in places Not what you expect from a hotel of the hit on chain
Positive_Review: The view from the room was nice and location was quiet

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Amazing staff in every area of the hotel Attentive polite and just happy in general which as a guest is a big thing for me when arriving The breakfast was incredible and the view overlooking the Thames was just as impressive The rooms were clean spacious and the balcony we had was a nice touch My girlfriend and I loved it and the surrounding area combined with the ferry service just topped it off for us We will be back

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location and excellent staff and customer service Food brilliant and breakfast equally as good Lovely to hop on the complimentary river boat to Canary Wharf Looking forward to returning

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was nothing we didn t like about this hotel everything was perfect for us
Positive_Review: We loved everything about this hotel the location was perfect Just a very short 5 min ferry journey across the river to all the bars and restaurants The staff were all very welcoming and helpful the room was beautiful and spacious and we had an amazing view It s worth having breakfast too there was something for everyone

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When we got there at first they couldn t find our reservation and was also told that the hotel ddnt receive any of the emails I sent through booking com making certain requests to make our trip pleasant When we were even calling the hotel before we arrived they kept saying we can t find your reservation so we should call booking com and sort it out with them although I kept giving them the reference This made me really worried wit my partner and thought of booking somewhere else last minute but we thought about the fact that my card would be charged if we ddnt pitch at the hotel Getting there from the train station in canary wharf was a problem the hotel could have at least mentioned they have a ferry that runs every now and again for our convinience but obviously communicating them was hard now we had to take a taxi which cost us a lot We apparently got upgraded to a king room from a double room but to be honest those rooms are small if if were we stayed was the king I wonder how tiny the doublr is For that price the hotel doesn t even have a mini bar just great The pictures of the terrace are what sold me when I made the booking but clearly they were deceptive Looked nothing like what we saw there All in all mediocre standards and service I believe
Positive_Review: The breakfast was alright

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Poor non functioning aircon in our original room Beds and bathrooms a little small for a family
Positive_Review: We had some issues with our room which were efficiently dealt with by your duty manager Aaron Frank The breakfast choice and quality were superb as we re the staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fact they tried to sneak in a 11 odd service charge at the bottom of my receipt which I wouldn t usually check
Positive_Review: It was unbelievable even ended up eating in the hotel late Saturday night at was very surprised at how nice it was

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Asked for a city view room got one the opposite way facing builders who began working very early in the morning Parking for 2 x night was 24 pound which was ridiculous and the shutter was always open No wifi Overall not a nice experience for mine and my partners 1st anniversary
Positive_Review: Complimentary boat to the other sode

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Rooms are getting a little tired but you get over this by excellent service from all members of staff that go out of the way to help

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The only thing that I didn t like was the room I booked on booking com wasn t the room I got All I would say advertise the actually room customers are paying for as it was a let down for me as it was my daughters 18 birthday and booked what I thought we was going to get for her and didn t get the room shown on there
Positive_Review: Nice and quite area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bed was very squeeky any time you moved it was very loud and noisey and un comfy there was also no mini bar which i thought was strange as the room was very hot would have been nice to have a cold drink and our room looked on to a fire exit which wasnt amazing for viewing would have been nice to look on to the thames

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: How far the hotel is from central london There is nothing going on around the hotel We did not enjoy our break in london because the location if this hotel is very misleading

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: my room was just above the air conditioning units of the hotel so it was a bit noisy especially because i am a light sleeper

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was lovely with nice Thames views and quite spacious Mini fridge in the room Comfy beds Really friendly staff Great selection and choice at breakfast We appreciated free ferry

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Had to wait quite a long time in the restaurant and then when it did arrive it was the wrong food we didn t complain as the wait had already been too long
Positive_Review: Beautiful place nice and quite and very friendly staff and comfy beds

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Needs a plug near mirror so she can see herself with the hairdryer etc Step down into bathroom was not good floor could have been lifted We were staying with Hilton as it worked with the ferry and access to the o2 The ferry worked well until Sunday night where we took the river okay to the venue instead of ferry walk underground route on return we were told the river bus would be there for 15 mins after performance we left the concert promptly and we re ahead of 50 plus people and as we re we re on the ramp the boat pulled away we did not realise this was the last river boat and more than this when the river Joan arrived at the HILTON crossing it was to be waiting as the last crossing so we would have missed that as well the only way back was by taxi at a cost of 28 90 this was the only down side to a very good weekend
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfortable Room was spacious

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It did take a ferry and a little walk 20 mins to get to restaurants
Positive_Review: The duvet was the best duvet ever still trying to find one like it The hotels ferry service was awesome and the bus stops right at the hotels front door

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Everything was perfect there wasn t anything to not like
Positive_Review: All the staff were extremely pleasant and friendly They made you feel welcome from the moment you stepped through the door Nothing was too much trouble We will definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The shuttle service from Canary Wharf following a concert at the O2 was very poor and did not afford customers the time to get from the O2 My Daughter and I were left stranded at Canary Wharf with no option to transport to the Hotel The Police took pity and returned us safely after 2 hours of trying to get back by public transport Hotel staff had no interest when I attempted to discuss the issues the following morning
Positive_Review: The breakfast was lovely Nice hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: That weekend my partners parents came to visit us in London And annoying got offered a room with a double bed and two single beds together in the same room When we paid for a family room for 4 Highly think it wasn t worth the money and was also very embarrassing for our inlaws to be going through a difficult time just to get what we paid for Shouldn t be advertising what your not giving So annoying
Positive_Review: Went through a lot After changing the hotel room 3 times we had to accept anything

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Going home
Positive_Review: The Restaurant manager forgot her name Was absolutely fantastic We complimented her for the wonderful food variety and service So she called out the head chef so we could talk with him A fellow South Africa and absolute gent Lovely hotel Highly recommended

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Curtains would be better as blinds but not a big issue Maybe fridges put in the rooms
Positive_Review: Food lovely in restaurant and in a great location aswell Room was available early which was a bonus and we got left a little birthday dessert for my dad in the room ND bottle of wine free of charge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: From when we checked in at 3pm till we left at 6pm to go out we were waiting for the staff to bring us something When we got to the room we asked for fresh milk the robes that were included with our executive room an ice bucket and for the tv and the patio door to be fixed The only good point about this hotel is your maintenance who came quickly and sorted everything no problem Fresh milk for tea was an alien concept only 1 robe ever materialised about 5pm as did our ice bucket Every time we called we were told not our department you need to call This just isn t good enough from a Hilton brand one employee should have taken responsibility and noted down what we needed and then ensured other departments were informed My partner physically went down to reception twice asking for an ice bucket he would have just bought it back up but they insisted on bringing it two hours too late They never admitted they had ran out of robes one was finally bought for me with the promise another was on its way still waiting We hadn t bought relaxing clothes with us as we re planning on just chilling in our robes We never had time to relax as were constantly waiting for the door to go it all could have been solved within the first 30 mins Shabby poor organisation I d have been better off saving my money and staying in a travel lodge
Positive_Review: Comfy bed great views from room 546 Actual hotel very attractive looking

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Had to pay to upgrade our room as we were stuck in a shoe box at the back of the building next to a building site Bathroom needed upgrading bed linen falling apart Wifi was only free due to having a Hilton Honors membership
Positive_Review: Beautiful view opposite canary wharf IF you were lucky enough to get a river view room Good connection to public transport quiet area of London which was very clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We had no tv or power points from 10 00pm until 10 00am This was very inconvenient The manager did take my phone to charge it for me but that ment I had no phone over night no TVs and no kettle
Positive_Review: Liked the ferry

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: when booked the site and hotel never mentioned breakfast so ordered room service which was fine but when it came was told you have breakfast in price but still charged 40 pounds extra because we ordered room service not happy so check you have breakfast in price
Positive_Review: bed was good room size excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Was offered a pot of tea with breakfast Ate my breakfast and still no tea Asked a member of staff for tea but still didn t arrive Was offered tea when I checked out but I would have liked it with my breakfast
Positive_Review: Loved the complimentary boat ride to from Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: just checked my bank statement and been charged twice for the food in restaurant not happy especially as i questioned the bill at check out requested a room with a bath and they did nt have any Check out process very slow
Positive_Review: love the location have stayed here many a time

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I was really unhappy that my room did not have hot water so we couldn t have a shower the next morning for the price we paid for the room I find this really unacceptable
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: This hotel cost me a lot of money and it was for a special occasion The pictures advertised and the price gave me the impression that my partner and I would be in for a real treat Unfortunately this was not the case When we got to our room we were extremely disappointed as it did not quite look like the advertised pictures Also this hotel sells itself on its spectacular views which we were very much looking forward to When we opened our balcony we were in disbelief We had a shared balcony with two doors either side that seemed accessible by anyone The view was of the back of the building and nothing more I personally felt unsafe and thought that the balcony would be better bricked up as there was no view and to reassure safety I felt as though anyone could have walked on our balcony and got in to our room What was also extremely disappointing was the noise level On both mornings I was awake for 6am It seemed from our room you could hear every little squeak and movement from what I presume the other rooms I could hear showers and toilets flushing There was lots of loud banging that was probably people just getting around there room normally but from our room sounded like someone trying to get in to our room We had a terrible balcony and view the room did not match the pictures I felt unsafe and the noise was unbearable which resulted in a very tired frustrated couple that were trying to enjoy a romantic trip I am disappointed as we were very much looking forward to this trip it was meant to be special and for an occasion We are frequent Hilton stayers and expected much much better for the money and from the advertisement
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and the food was lovely particularly the breakfast The view across the river and the complementary boat were also nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The rooms are tiny but for 100 in London that s not unusual
Positive_Review: This was actually a relief to get because of storm Doris all our trains got cancelled and we were forced to stay over We really surprised at the price and how nice it is It really was such a relief

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Would have been better if we could have purchased a snack with our drinks i e crisps or nuts etc at the bar after our returned from the 02 in the evening
Positive_Review: The bed and pillows were very comfy location of room was good Was a very easy journey to the 02 by ferry in the evening as well

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our stay ending
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel such hard working staff where nothing was was too much trouble The breakfast was lovely and the massive choice the nice lady on the grill was so helpful with any requests The staff in the restaurant were so polite and friendly Oh And the lovely fresh cookies that we were given on check in Excellent location with its own frerry to canary wharf we will be returning later in the year

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: They don t sell bar snacks There is a food menu though but not available really late
Positive_Review: The location by the river is lovely The boat over to Canary Wharf is really handy and makes it quicker to get to central London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: layout of the room could not quit see the TV from the bed Iron could have been placed lower in the wardrobe to enable us to use the full hanging space wardrobe would have been easier to access if facing the bed and not enough milk cartons in the room
Positive_Review: The ease of traveling into central London Via canary wharf and the hotel atmosphere was amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The images on booking com of the queen size room didn t reflect the actual size of room I got and it didn t look like the photos on the website The pictures made it look much more impressive than it was The room was clean and modern but the room I got was more like a box room and not queen size I wouldn t like to see the size of the standard room Did upgrade to a king and that was much better
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful and the breakfast we lovely A hotel having its own boat is a brilliant idea and the staff on the boat were very helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The rooms were beautifully set out extremely clean and was a lovely room to stay in The staff were very welcoming and answered any questions we had Me and my partner had a wonderful time and would definitely return again The staff and the facilities were excellent and I can t fault any of it We had a lovely stay and would like to thank them so much for making our trip so pleasant

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: too dark room At Sunday morning breakfast the staff was a mess under organized although there were enough people to manage The process and guest management failed big time Stress test f ailed It was a mess
Positive_Review: Breakfast is delicious staff is pretty helpful and nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No wi fi in the room Bath was damaged in a couple of places and rust was showing through Not much to eat other than pub grub within easy walking distance on this side of the river
Positive_Review: Free ferry unfortunately the weather was to bad and we couldn t use it this put most decent restraints out of reach

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There wasn t any bathrobes and one pair or slippers when my partner called they said we do give robes sometimes and got told we d get one which we didn t no mini fridge bar quiet strange no toothbrush or little toothpaste The option of still or sparlking bottled water in the room as a standard not from the menu
Positive_Review: The size of the balcony

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: For one night we had a lovely sized bedroom with a riverside view and it was very comfortable The staff were friendly and welcoming It is easily accessible through numerous ways by transport We got the bus and tube which were regular

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room service it wasn t made clear that hot food is not available for 24 hours however they made up by giving us the sandwiches for free
Positive_Review: The room was lovely with nice views and quite spacious this is if you get the bigger rooms the normals ones are nice but not great views and smaller This room Was very comfortable clean location was good not far from Greenwich and other desired destinations Free ferry breakfast included overall very good value for money Also very welcoming staff Especially eugenijiz probably wrong spelling

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We had no water available in our room upon arrival or at all We were literally put in the boiler room where it was very noisey and hot The complimentary shampoo and conditioner were hard and non existent The tv didn t work I had booked a twin room but they gave us a double bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Walls were a bit thin Especially when room next door have a party from 2am 0430am

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: the communication with staff that worked there i found was very poor simple questions asked were hard for them to understand or even know two nights cost over 200 pound as checked in was told they rake 50 deposit for each night but was told this goes into bank when leave straight away was not told it takes 5 days noticed on my online banking they had taken payment for hotel and on check out day i had money in my account then i had to contact my bank as i placed a order for online food payment went through then the next day i was notified my order was cancelled as the hilton hotel took 338 00 plus the rate for the two night stay after trying to contact the hotel and to be put through to the right person was a nightmare after many attempts contacting the hotel i asked to speak to the manager i spoke to him and he basically didnt help said he would call back i said if i dont answer could you please leave a message i think its disgusting as its to do with my money noone is interested and still have not heard anything from them i am now fed up of me making all the contact this is just a quick review For experiencing such poor service from hotel staff and to not even get a response back from the manager I will not book to stay here again
Positive_Review: first time staying at hilton hotel hotel great great location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast items were missing from room service order and eggs and bacon were poorly cooked plus sausages were full of gristle
Positive_Review: Great view and spacious room with comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Cost of breakfast too expensive We went elsewhere for breakfast and got a better deal Also not enough shower gel for two people and water was not hot only warm
Positive_Review: Good sized room and comfy bed Room and shower room were very tasteful and clean All of the staff were friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: If I had to find a fault and I am really scraping the barrel here I would say that the view out of our window wasn t the best we were facing out onto the back of some other rooms but as we didn t spend that much time in the room it wasn t really a problem for us
Positive_Review: The fresh cookie on arrival was a nice touch as a welcome to the hotel Staff were very friendly throughout the whole stay nothing was too much Transport links to and from the hotel were great we took advantage of the free ferry on a few occasions which took you to within about a 10 minute walk to the Canary Wharf tube stop or there was a bus stop right outside the hotel which took you to the Canada Water tube stop otherwise this particular stop would be a long walk from the hotel Both the ferry and the bus were very regular The hotel was nicely decorated if you have some down time I would suggest popping into the library where you can settle with a book and a glass of wine infront of one of the roaring fires The only meal we had at the hotel was breakfast absolutely no complaints here it was a plentiful and really good quality The toiletries in the bathroom were lovely also Crabtree Evelyn Overall a fab stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When I arrived it was 3 20 check in was at 3 i requesting a room with a view and told I had this but when I got to check in the Man Behind the Counter told me the room was not ready so our room was moved to a different one as we had to get ready and didn t have time to wait
Positive_Review: Free ferry across the Thames

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Uncomfortable bed super hot room with Pathetic window so couldn t sleep Asked for a room with a view of water got room with a view of bins which woke us at 6 30am as they were being emptied
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Service and hospitality was fantastic tasty cookie on arrival when checking in gave a nice welcoming touch Breakfast in the morning was fantastic with loads of choice hot cold Free ferry shuttle across the Thames was very useful as well

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Cold room Ceiling panel fell down in bathroom No mini fridge No water in room
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful Lovely location Upgraded room for free which was a lovely touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing everything was lovely
Positive_Review: Room was amazing especially bed the breakfast was lovely with lots of selection and the staff were amazing and helpful even let us print things off and hotel taxi for free as the ferry was off Amazing stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bed room 225 creaked with every movement or roll the tv remote didn t work and the reception for the tv was very poor also the free wifi was non existent Didn t work at all

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Tv wasn t working Windows are dodgy as hell it took me Till the next morning to figure out how to open them unless they needed to be closed lol Oops And we didn t get a full body mirror as silly as it sounds And we didn t get a view I spent 120 I work part time and a full time student so yea that s expensive to me Would of thought we d be getting a view considering I booked this room last year Just thought my man could of at least be finished with a hotel view of the canery wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location is the worst location in the whole of London no tube close by Catching a ferry is a serious inconvenience Trying to get a taxi all the was an inconvenience Staff were extremely unfriendly and English is very poor A terrible hotel and completely overpriced My whole experience of London was terrible due to this hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The view from the room The overall expense for what you get The bed was too stiff
Positive_Review: The staff whom were working within the restaurant at breakfast so helpful and very happy Great transport facilities for crossing the Thames

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Wifi did not work in my room the rooms are not correctly labelled in terms of going through the doors to show which direction you should be going That I had to go to reception to pay for room service before I could order Would be better if you could pay as leaving for it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When booking it did say we were guaranteed a city view however we had a view over the back of the hotel which there was nothing just bins and a place where the hotel staff could smoke Food and drinks were very expensive in the hotel 9 50 for a pint of beer and a can of pop
Positive_Review: The hotel itself was lovely and clean with a great view from reception of Canary Wharf over the Thames The room was very clean and spacious We were greeted with warm cookies upon arrival nice touch Parking located under hotel which was good as we travelled in our car Free unlimited use of the hotels own boat to cross the Thames to Canary Wharf we used this quite a lot to get on the tube at Canary Wharf Very quiet area however the tube was abit of a journey Overall a good stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bed and floor boards were squeaky Could hear people through the walls in the room next door

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room could ve been bigger but it was just enough space for 2 for a short time Would ve liked a pool table in the bar area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I didn t enjoy the room itself as it wasn t the same room as depicted in the photos on booking com the room had a lack of plugs meaning we had to switch between charging devices the television had a slow response time and poor choice the room itself didn t contain a fridge which would have been useful as maintaining food was difficult the balcony wasn t great either it was just a door that opened to a walkway so the view was awful
Positive_Review: The bathroom was large and the shower was efficient and we also enjoyed the decor of the hotel as it was very picturesque

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 1 It is expected to add a provisional 50 per day on account of potential expenses so 4 nights would have 200 added towards it I did not accept it as it is not mandatory and I knew I would not spend anything extra but it is presumed not to be queried I have been to other hotels with the same category and this provisional 50 day was not ever mentioned 2 I could not have a hot shower as the water was barely tepid 3 On the A la Carte menu there is no mention that the price for each course DOES NOT include the VAT plus a service charge so a meal that would have been 21 adding up the prices shown on the menu becomes 27 95 3 50 Also the printed bill expects the customer to also add a tip on top of it 4 The booklet in the room should mention that if there is an early start when checking out the staff can prepare some breakfast to take away This same booklet does not say on Saturdays breakfast will not start till 7 00 instead of the usual 06 30 Consequently I left without my breakfast which I had paid for 5 The WiFi was free but very poor 6 I did put a good for staff because the restaurant staff made up for it Some staff I dealt with at reception were not as efficient Unfortunately the negatives outweigh the positives therefore I shall not return to this hotel
Positive_Review: There was a wide variety for breakfast It is a good policy to have a complimentary ferry service to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The step from the bathroom kept stubbing toes Kettle didn t turn off when boiled Broken socket by bed Didn t get our free cookies
Positive_Review: Bed Massive and so comfy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I feel the room was very over priced for what it was the bed was shoved in the corner of the room we had no view of the surroundings out of the window the curtains were worn dated not good value for money at all 129 for one nights stay without breakfast I could understand if we were staying near central London but this isnt
Positive_Review: easy location to gain access to tube station by free river taxi provided by the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I seriously cannot think of anything

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There is a free boat put on by the hotel we found this excellent as it was more convenient and you can get off at Canary Warf tube and walk 5 mins and jump on the boat the other option is getting off the tube at Canada Water and walking about 20 30 mins this also isn t too bad but we went to see a show at the O2 which finished late and by the time we got to the boat it had finished it would have been better to hae that boat running longer even for a small charge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Charged upon arrival and charged when left So all in all a stay that should have cost 242 has cost me 560 Hotel was 109 a night then we were told there was an additional 50 per night for extras So paid 318 before we even got to the room Awaiting the first initial payment to be refunded

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The toilet was dirty had yellow water The location was not very good either as it is quite far from any local shops restaurants activites etc
Positive_Review: The bed was nice to sleep in although it was a hard mattress i slept well

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was small and it felt like we were on a boat We made reservations at the hotel restaurant waited at the bar for an hour and after the hostess seated us in the worst spot next to the kitchen when at least 9 other tables were open no one even came to give us a drink menu or bring water After 20 minutes of no service we left It was a very disappointing experience I ve never left a bad review but I would definitely never come back here
Positive_Review: Check in was easy The bar staff were very friendly and efficient The room was clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: As we was attending a concert for a special Christmas treat I asked if we could check in one hour earlier than 3pm we arrived at 2pm but was told the room was not ready and to wait while housekeeping cleaned the room We waited and waited and waited till just after 4pm This didn t give us any relaxing time and went straight to dinner at the pub next door as the restaurant was not open till later Before going to dinner we pre ordered a taxi to go to the O2 for 6pm At 6pm we went to the taxi area to be told the taxi wasn t there and will be around 30 40 minutes till it would be back and the hotel only has one taxi This was very stressful and we dod try to call our own but the other taxi ranks said it would take them about 30 minutes to come to the hotel Our taxi articed at 7 15pm After a very poor start to our Christmas treat once back in our hotel room with two children ready for bed the room was very very cold so tried to turn the thermostat up on the wall but the heating didnt work in our room It was 11 30pm and didn t want housekeeping coming to fix it at that time in the night so it was a very cold nights sleep
Positive_Review: We wasn t expecting much at breakfast the following morning but it was actually ok this was the only thing that was nice while staying at The doubletree hilton london docklands

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I always use booking com to book hotels and rooms but somehow the Hilton did not have my booking and I had to chase it up several times Very distressful Although in the end I had an amazing experience it would be better if the room had a fridge to store drinks and snacks and it is very silly to be paying wifi at a four star hotel
Positive_Review: I had an amazing night at the double tree in the docklands The room was very clean and beautiful with a balcony Staff were very friendly who generously upgraded my room with a kingsize bed A great thing is you get free unlimited rides on the ferry to canary wharf from the hotel A beautiful couples experience would definitely come back

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Tv was placed in the worst possible position away from the bed you could not see the tv from the bed Went downstairs to reception to ask for water and i was told u can order room service only for the guy on the other line to tell me ill be charged 5 Terrible experience

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Beds were obviously pushed together to make a double and kept separating so big gap in middle of bed Shower wasn t hot Room temperature wasn t working so it was cold

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Positive_Review: LOVED LOVED LOVED THE BREAKFAST WOW WOW WOW LADY CALLED FRANCIS TOOK CARE OF US

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I was supposed to book a bedroom with good location and views but when we checked in they told us our room was average and we had to pay 20 pounds more for something we were supposed to have Food prices was ridiculous for the quality and amount

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Dirty bathroom and lime scale on shower head and live terminals exposed on towel rail heater Poor service at hotel bar in evening
Positive_Review: Good location and very good breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The first room we had was nothing like the pictures Room was barely wider than the width of the small double bed and the bed must have been ancient as it listed to one side and creaked every time you moved an inch
Positive_Review: When we complained that we couldn t sleep on the bed as it was so creaky they gave us a new room without any quibble

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The sheets smelled fusty and the view was awful not what we were expecting in a hotel situated right on the River Thames Only two towels supplied when we are a family of four
Positive_Review: The breakfast was very good and the free ferry added to our weekend adventure in London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location it was either by ferry or a taxi which in our case was expensive
Positive_Review: The staff were the best ever they could not do enough for you The breakfast was amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The only minus side was that the bathroom was a bit tired and in need of re decoration
Positive_Review: Staff were all very courteous friendly and helpful Hotel was right beside the Rotherhithe ferry for an easy trip to Canary Wharf Tickets for unlimited crossings on the ferry were complimentary with our booking Beds were comfortable and the room was big enough for our family of 4

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was right next to talking elevator which went all night The corridor was really noisy Didn t sleep much No aircon Breakfast and wifi are exorbitantly priced
Positive_Review: Room was clean and large Got free ferry voucher to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Toilet kept blocking Floors creaky and bed Was gutted the balcony wasn t facing canary wharf Being pregnant it was a faf being in car park 2 I don t understand why we couldn t have had the code for the exit door Staff don t seem to know anything about car park 2 when asked questions Weren t told about wifi
Positive_Review: Size of bed was Brill Boat times great Breakfast excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: A nasty smell as you exited the lift and along to our room on fourth floor Didn t go away at all whilst we were there Think it is expensive
Positive_Review: Evening meal and breakfast were very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Having requested particular rooms in both visits Only to be given something totally different All staff really friendly but reception didn t listen to to our request so both stays got off to a bad start Would stay again though
Positive_Review: When we finally got the write room the view and location were excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff were terrible from start to finish Sour most unhelpful TVs not working or heating waited 30mins for someone to come fix it Enquiries about shows etc they hadn t a clue are horrible had to get Us underground train to London
Positive_Review: Room was nice but no mattress cover on bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 1 I specified in my booking that my partner will be arriving after 12 hours of continuous travel so that they could do the fastest check in possible He arrived before me at 3 pm which is normal check in time and didn t settle till 8 pm because a The first room he got didn t look anything like the pictures we saw for the queen deluxe with river view There are 4 pictures of spacious rooms bathroom and we got the room in the 5th picture which was horrible It was very small almost feels like someone could choke in there This room should definitely not be in this category b My partner asked for a different room but couldn t communicate well as his English is medium level He speaks French and Arabic but no one spoke these languages although it says on the Booking com page we speak your language c We ended up getting a new room that looked exactly like the spacious ones we saw in the picture Yey But the air conditioning was on on COLD and it wouldn t turn off It was already freezing outside We asked for someone to fix it but we got a small electric heater instead d Once again we had to let go of the room we wanted and stayed in a Kings Deluxe room instead where all appliances were working fine But the room was as small as the first one My partner barely fit in the bathroom We lost the atmospheric room we were paying money for to enjoy If we wanted a room that size we could ve stayed somewhere else for cheaper There weren t any room slippers robes as well although we found some in the previous room 2 We found out that we couldn t order food and drinks to the room We didn t know as it wasn t mentioned on the booking profile This ruined the experience as well We expected to find a small refrigerator in the room instead but it wasn t there 3 On the day of our check out Sunday we woke up and didn t find hot water
Positive_Review: 1 The hot cookie we got when we checked out 2 The ferry service from the hotel to Canary Wharf 3 Friendly and patient staff 4 The food selection at breakfast was great and tasty We got complimentary breakfasts because of the stuff you read above

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bed was uncomfortable personal preference though Requested a river view and got dumped in the back which was very noisy with deliveries and what not Randomly got chargerd an extra 100 for no apparant reason Each night there seemed to be a function in the lounge so we never got to experience it
Positive_Review: Breakfast was delicious Staff friendly Cocktails were lovely The view from the good part of the hotel was spectacular

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our room was very disappointing small and with an obstructed view nothing like the photo beware The upgrade we were given was better but smelt strongly of the cleaning cupboard next door Disgusting
Positive_Review: Excellent receptionist who tried his hardest to meet our needs

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location On the other side of the river had to get a ferry to get to canary wharf Ferry was quick simple and free but added a bit of extra time to each journey that i wasnt expecting
Positive_Review: Comfy bed excellent breakfast really helpful staff Overall a great stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I called a receptionist to the room at 1am because the heating was broke a member of staff came to the room and agreed it was broke who then said he would come back with some electric heaters Waited til 2am tried ringing reception no answer I told the member of staff when checking out she took my details and said she would investigate and see if she could get some compensation But i still haven t heard anything back from the hotel and will never be visiting again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Heating turned up a little more in rooms especially this time of year Or maybe i m a fussy thing
Positive_Review: Staff we re very welcoming and helpful with locations etc Food was well cooked room service staff were lovely and the doubled drinks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bedroom location was noisy with people walking past alot and the bed was very rickety every time i turned in my sleep it made a noise and woke me up
Positive_Review: It was very moder and clean The food and resturant was really good Very well greeted especially with a warm cookie when checking in which was pleasent and it was handy to have a boat service across to resturants

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: My partner and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Doubletree by Hilton it was perfect from start to finish We will definetly be coming back The room was beautiful and the view was outstanding The staff could not be more helpful and were extremely friendly inparticulary a lady in the resteraunt who s name we unfortunately did not catch she has long brown hair and had such a friendly unique touch The complimentary ferry was also a bonus along with the scrumptious food served at breakfast Could not thank the staff any more for such a perfect stay all the best and we wish you a Merry Christmas

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The service i recieved from the staff I ordered room service then to be called back 10 minutes later saying i would have to go to reception to Then get home the day after my stay and they have charged me 40 for something i had not had It then took me 35 times to call to be hung up and lied to by Linda at the front desk who said they could make the refund and it would be in my acocunt immediately Then to be hung on by someone else Then eventually getting through to the manager and saying she couldnt do anything right then so i had to wait 1 hour for a phone call for her to say they was refunding me and it would be in my bank account the NEXT DAY That was on saturday and i am still waiting for the payment back This has ruined my stay and i would never recommend this hotel to anyone
Positive_Review: the hotel is very nice looking

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was slightly chilly and couldn t work out how to turn on the heating Relied on shampoo included in the bathroom but not enough for a couple to shower
Positive_Review: The breakfast included in our stay was absolutely lovely yummy food The bed was comfy and slept really well Lovely view from balcony

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: If there had been more leisure facilities for relaxation and pampering it would have been so much better
Positive_Review: Wonderful location with the riverside looking amazing at night You are welcomed by a warm cookie on arrival which is a lovely touch Staff were extremely helpful and friendly and were quick to assist when we found our rooms were not warming up and the room phones were not working Awesome that a ferry trip across the river was included Fantastic breakfast too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: On the website there is a cocktail meny they apparantly doesn t have anyway Disapointing 24h roomservice is actually not 24h we were told

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: elevator too small for my son s wheelchair can not in international Hotel slow check in reception understaffed cold shower hard to find light switches in the rooms

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Booked a king deluxe room with a city or river view Room had neither Had to ask to change Second room had a better view but still not in line with the pictures seen when booking TV didn t face the bed it was on an arm but you still couldn t turn it round to face the bed Not a big deal as we weren t planning on watching it much but still not what you expect when you pay for a King Deluxe room Water was only just warm in the morning so not a great shower Website shows photos of a terrace bar but it turns out this is only available for group bookings
Positive_Review: Bed was comfortable Breakfast was good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I booked a smoking room on the net and when arrived said its s none smoking now and asked for room close to each other as booked 2 rooms one for my teenage daughters but had to pay for room up grade cause said none close so had to pay 25 to get rooms next to each other
Positive_Review: I liked the room looked a little bigger on pictures tho and staff was friendly the boat trip is nice idea and view was nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We came here to stay to celebrate our first wedding anniversary and was so disappointed the check in staff were lovely very welcoming but after that point it wasnt up to expectations The room was so small the bathroom wasn t the cleanest either looked slightly run down The TV lost signal every 5minutes Also had a constant high pitched noise going all night that kept us awake and the room walls were so thin every noice of talking walking past was heard very loudly heard another rooms tv going off till 2 30 am Other than disappointment of the room we went to check out restaurant bar and can not put in a good word at all the staff were so rude to the point we decided to eat elsewhere The attitude of the food and beverage staff that were serving on time of our stay really let it down We also skipped breakfast the next morning too to avoid the restaurant Such a shame as was looking forward to staying in hotel for meal and having few drinks with the beautiful view Overall very disappointed
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When we arrived we were assigned a room Once we got to the room we found that it was still being made up by the facilities staff We mentioned this to reception who then replaced us into another room but with a less adequate view This shouldn t have been an issue in the first place and rooms should not be issued to guests until fully cleaned and tidied The floors were incredibly creepy and we were worried about waking other guests
Positive_Review: The breakfast was unbelievable along with the view from the room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Strange thing but the step threshold between the bedroom and bathroom was dangerously high and caused both of us to trip several times In the end we had to put a towel on the lower level of the bathroom floor to prevent accidents
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed with crisp linen Fantastic breakfast range highly recommended Wonderful location on river with bonus of regular passenger ferry crossing to Canary Wharf and connection to the river bus service This facility gives hotel guests excellent access to a range of transport options including the underground at Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I didn t like the fact that my TV didn t work and it took the electrician THREE tries to fix it which resulted in me having to be moved If there is a problem staff members should move you regardless
Positive_Review: We loved the free access to the ferry It was so nice to jump on the ferry at any time and see the city

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bath could have done with a little TLC Needed replacing really
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly Room was lovely Breakfast and dinner was superb Ferry crossing from hotel to Canary Wharf Pier was a blessing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Difficult to find not well signposted at all Ok with sat nav though
Positive_Review: Quirky nice decor throughout and good views with some excellent decks overlooking the river Clean throughout and rooms ok for the price Good parking

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Wifi was not free and not working well in the room The hotel did not accept regular bank cards maestro for payment only credit cards
Positive_Review: Location was good nice view from the river

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We stayed in Kingsroom I never stayed in Kings room before but thought it will be bigger bathroom is very small there is no room for two people there was power cut in our room in the morning Although it was resolved very quickly
Positive_Review: It was such a nice touch to have a warm chocolate cookie with the room key Big thank you to the stuff as I asked tea coffee facility in the room View from the window was very nice especially in the evening when all canary wharf was illuminating complimentary ticket to the ferry to from canary wharf was very handy bed was fantastic Extra big and extra comfy it was absolutely perfect breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Corridor outside room smelt musty
Positive_Review: lovely warm welcome at reception Rook with a balcony and river view quiet and very comfortable Excellent breakfast good choice and freshly cooked

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Long Queues for breakfast excellent staff there Location can be a problem and not easy to get there after a late night ferry stops at 12 Only two larger on draught and I wasn t fond of either Takes the best part of an hour to get home from Central London
Positive_Review: Interesting rooms on Themes so great view Good breakfast Quiet Love the ferry Interesting part of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The first room was really small so we upgraded We had to check out of the more expensive room at 1 30am as there was a noisy radiator and we couldn t sleep There were no more rooms available and no maintenance so we had to get a cab home arriving home at 3am so we were very unhappy Still awaiting a refund for the room and breakfast that we obviously did not have
Positive_Review: The view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The staff were useless Woman on reception took 20 minutes to check me in and gave me someone else s details as my own Bar was small and quiet Noisy room next to the river and smoke alarm kept going off for no reason at all Bed was noisy also
Positive_Review: The room was lovely with brilliant view Big bed Breakfast tastes good but very small for money

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was much smaller than pictured expected The city view was only partial The costs weren t clear and we were charged an extra 50 deposit that they were in aware of in the morning I still don t think I got it back despite reminding them We had to walk through a woodland in the dark just to find it
Positive_Review: The bed was amazing the breakfast and dinner was brilliant the staff are very helpful and pleasant The hotel itself is clean and very nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Drinks were very pricey Probably just London prices though
Positive_Review: Breakfasts were great Staff friendly and helpful Easy access to Canary Wharf and the river clippers and the fact the Doubletree ferry always waited for the last clipper to transport guests from Canary Wharf dock to the hotel Comfy rooms and beds Very clean hotel The terrace will be fabulous in the summer

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was small for a Queen Size and the windows where really in need of replacement Heating in room was loud if turned on and 20 for breakfast is excessive wouldn t go again unless seriously discounted

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No mini fridge inside the room i consider mini fridge as basic comfort Very small room
Positive_Review: It was clean and situated on the river the staff was friendly and they were organised with the ferry commuting tickets

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: When greeted and checked into rooms it was all efficient and got given a hot cookie which made us feel welcome The view was beautiful from every Window and the rooms were lovely homely and clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The shutters on the window rooms were really hot but opening the windows ment rattling
Positive_Review: Great bar area to relax with friends and really nice food Nice touch with warm cookie on check in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Good location for the City but not so good for Central London
Positive_Review: Super confty bed free wi fi available friendly staff ready to help nice view complimentary tickets for the ferry nice breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Queue at breakfast
Positive_Review: Hotel was beautiful staff very friendly gave us options of what room view we wanted Room was very comfortable Loved getting the ferry to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 1 Bed was extremely noisy 2 step in Bathroom although notice on wall still an issue in middle of night 3 Barrels were being moved from 7 00am Sat sun Monday disturbing sleep 4 Stayed in august breakfast was included in the price for a higher price breakfast wasn t included although my mistake for not checking reservation details

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I paid for a river view which I did not get due to heating not working in room my view ended up being scaffolding Waiting for another room made our whole evening late We missed our anniversary dinner in town Ended up having room services which we had to wait over an hour for Not the great anniversary gift I had planned for us I still feel really upset and disappointed
Positive_Review: Friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bathroom was a little dated although spotlessly clean Free wifi didn t work in our room
Positive_Review: The rooms and facilities were spotlessly clean Our hairdryer didn t work and after phoning housekeeping a replacement arrived in less than 5 minutes The beds were really comfortable and so were the pillows and duvet Free complimentary cookies on arrival were very tasty Breakfast was really good with plenty of choice from fish to cooked full English to cereals and fruit Easy access to the main attractions via C10 bus and Underground Hotel is close to an Odeon cinema and PizzaHut which was great to unwind after a busy day shopping

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Queuing to go in for breakfast when we finally got in the breakfast was v nice Seemed to take quite a while to get anywhere waiting for the ferry then a 15 min walk to any tube station So if you are wanting to get in to central London it can take quite a while
Positive_Review: Rooms were spacious with balcony and view over the river staff allowed us to have a later check out as my daughter was ill

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room price we paid was the same as the executive room However our room was not up to scratch The tv didnt come out from a fixed position on the wall deeming it useless This was the only downpoint Other than that and the bad pricing it was okay Balcony room hardly worth the extra money especially without breakfast I would also recommend not checking out dead onn12 as gets very very busy or make sure you can express checkout
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I paid extra for a twin room I was staying with a male colleague in advance Despite that when I arrived the room we were given was a double bed We were re allocated another room but why did I have to waste time doing this and why did I have to pay extra
Positive_Review: Location and comfort

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A wonderful hotel with great views from the bedroom and bar Amazing welcome with a warm cookie and free boat service The boat service was extremely convenient frequent and quick to get to the restaurants and bars with the last boat at midnight perfect Comfy bed excellent shower and great service Wonderful luxury stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff was ver rude didn t want to help me I asked for a heater because room was very cold they didn t bring it for me or took any notice and I cathed a cold now I have chest infection that I had to go hospital last night very bad service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Positive_Review: The place and the position was good The view on the river very attractive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Positive_Review: Loved everything about the hotel we was in a king suite room 686 and it was awesome lovely veiws also

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fire alarm system went off 7 times during the night apparently due to a fire a few miles away and the smoke affecting the system The system kept picking up smoke and going off again Quite unsettling and ended up in the lobby at 4am until 5am until we felt confident that all was ok Very little sleep due to this problem which meant I felt exhausted the next day at my Conference
Positive_Review: The trip across the water was enjoyable and different The room whilst small was comfortable very clean the shower lovely and hot and the toiletry products were good quality The food and service in the restaurant was very good friendly warm good quality food and variety of menu I was struggling with foot blisters the staff kindly gave me huge plasters which saved the day

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were greeted with a freshly made hotel chocolate cookie which was a lovely touch Great nights sleep with comfy bed and pillows Lovely view out of our room window Very efficient ferry ride to Canary Wharf and friendly staff onboard Delicious breakfast and lots of options Staff were very helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Beds comfy location was excellent definatly recommend I went with children and was perfect for them Room was big and had a lovely view of the Thames

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fire alarm went off several times during the night finally becoming an urgent continuous bell at 4 00am As a permanent wheelchair user I had been given instructions to stay in my room if the alarm sounded and a member of staff would come and get me This did not happen we could not get a reply from any phone number so my wife had to get me up and dressed not easy I need to use a hoist to get in out of bed We went to reception where chaos reigned full of guests in various states of dress A member of staff in a hi viz jacket was explaining the situation to one couple saying he would speak to everyone individually I interrupted him to suggest that he made an announcement so that everyone could go back to bed which he then did It was clearly ridiculous that it took me to suggest this and my wife was very distressed that Hilton had not followed their own instructions and notified us that we were either safe or unsafe in our room The following morning all the guests looked very worse for wear we saw one man leave at 4 in the morning he couldn t take it anymore obviously however Edward Loader Head of Operations spoke to me at length and said that he would waive the cost of our room for the dreadful night a gesture I appreciate
Positive_Review: Good location nice room friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Very disappointed with our room it had a smell from bathroom drains I didn t like that we couldn t see out of window made it feel I was sleeping in a bathroom It had opaque glass on window Felt clostrophobic
Positive_Review: It had a lovely lobby and liked the peir to and from hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff at the front desk were very rude everytime we asked something they looked at us as though we didn t belong there Balcony was very dirty not representative of the pictures online Room was much smaller than expected
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The time you can get alcohol from the executive lounge was a bit short 2hours only
Positive_Review: The location was perfect the breakfast was superb the staff were nice and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The balcony is fab for smokers Loved that the hotel is on the River Thames so one can get there via water taxis boats provided by hotel from any pier wharf on the Thames Very nice breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Went for drink in the bar service was slow had to wait quite a while
Positive_Review: The bed was extra comfy pillows were soft room value for money The bathroom was a little on the small side shower was lovely breakfast was great plenty of choice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Internet connection wasnt good Bar staff not very friendly seems like tgey are not valued Could do with better stock for red wine all i had choice of for red wine was to buy a bottle or a glass of shiraz they werent willing to offer to open a bottle to compensate they had no other choice by the glass not very good No drinking water in room
Positive_Review: Nice clean comfortable room and bathroom Was given a riverside view on request Access 24hrs Woukd definateley stay again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Room nice and big and very comfy bed Front desk lady that checked us in was very friendly and helpful with a lovely smile Loved the welcome cookie too and very nice to have a courtesy ferry to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The staff were not helpful at all bar staff were rude when asked a simple question Concierge were not helpful didn t advise directions when getting car from car park also didn t advise of the pre authorisation 50 off my card just in case we had any extras We didn t and am still waiting for this transaction to be cancelled Certainly should NEVER do this without speaking to the customer first so it can be expected
Positive_Review: Location was good for some but not for what we wanted to do but that was our error

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our bedroom was small felt claustrophobic at times Bathroom was also small and the hand basin was miniature Pictures on the website make the rooms look much bigger
Positive_Review: Location was excellent Bed was very comfy Great river view Loved having the ferry on the doorstep so access to Canary Wharf was so easy and a real pleasure

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 15 for WiFi in the room is crazy
Positive_Review: Stayed in room 335 amazing views I ve stayed in some of Londons top hotels and this was up there with the best really will struggle to top this hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room wasn t as advertised no balcony staff with bad knowledge of underground stations meaning a longer than expected walk back to the hotel room noise from pipes the quilt looked like it was designed for the Arctic
Positive_Review: Hotel bar and resteraunt

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We booked and paid 3 weeks before our trip to get there and to be told there were no quuen rooms available we then had to pay another 30 to upgrade to a different room
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: our view from our room was a little dissapointing as i would have liked a thames view but we could only just see it from our balcony if we were leaning
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely accomodating as i have an allergy to feathers and all the bedding was feather based but when i told the staff they changed all the bedding immediatley for me Breakfast was amazing and lots of lovely choice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was tiny with double bed up against the wall one side nothing like shown on the website Hardly room to sit on the loo with loo roll sticking in your side Woken early 6 45am by cleaner hitting radiators and pipes outside the room for nearly an hour Worst 4 hotel I have ever stayed in Same applied to my colleague Complained at reception didn t even get offered a discount
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The TV in the room wasn t in a good viewing position from the bed Not sure if had a movable tv arm wasn t notified and didn t try to move tele incase broke Also little things like the cookie which should recieve on arrival didn t actually recieve it just little things to dampen what was actually a good stay
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good Fried eggs needed to be cooked more though Some staff member didn t know what a fork was

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: 2nd visit love the hotel and the room was good Service was not up to our last visit We used to love sitting outside and eating and drinking but there were not many comfy seats they were geared up for outside dining and no one came to take our orders

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We had booked for two nights and we were on the top floor the room keys were deactivated so we had to come back twice to the reception to reactivate the key cards plus the lift nearest to our room was out of order
