Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: WiFi very poor and no signal in hotel via service provider Booked a superior king room but I have no idea what was superior about it Hotel is overpriced and on the wrong side of the river for O2 but is advertised as close by No night room service and is in the middle of a residential site but no shops Definitely wouldn t stay again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We were attending a wedding nearby on this occasion and so my requests of the hotel were a bit more critical than usual particularly early check in so that we could change in preparation for the wedding At check in approx 2pm I was told that early check in was not available The receptionist s response to my suggestion that they should at least have communicated this to me ahead of arrival was that they had no record of any of my requests I have been using Booking com for many years and this is the first time that has been claimed I am inclined to doubt the accuracy of that statement therefore Thus very poor service from a four star hotel
Positive_Review: Large hotel originally I believe an old warehouse but an impressive modern conversion Big plus is on site car parking at not unreasonable cost for London 12 from memory I think Generous size bedroom although the en suite was compact to say the least everything was in there though so no complaint overall

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Didn t like being stuck on the fourth 4 in what was effectively an after thought of a room The window was opaque and as for the bed I have never ever slept in a bed that made so much noise and I m talking about attempting to get comfortable and sleeping
Positive_Review: Fabulous views over the Thames clean pleasant atmosphere helpful staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The view from the hotel deck is amazing and it s super easy to move around There is a bus station in front of the hotel and a ferry inside the hotel The neighborhood is very nice and safe

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Corridors and shared areas very tired Cleaning left in corridors Food trays left in corridors
Positive_Review: Nice room although damp bathroom Nice bar but service could improve when busy Great location for Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When we booked it said our room had a view of the river but it didn t

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Rooms were big The location is beautiful view of Canary Wharf on one side and short walk down the dockside you can see London city scape of the Shard and other buildings There is close transport links to the underground on a coupe minutes by bus and a river ferry to Canary Wharf to the river bus or underground and over ground links

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: My bedroom was on the ground floor beside a car park and I could hear people talking right outside my window It was only for about 10 minutes so it didn t bother me but I wouldn t have liked it had it gone on for longer
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Rude unhelpful night staff Terrible room smelt of urine and was like someone s attic No gym and fitness facilities Go to the one in canary wharf it s so much better Room service don t bother answering calls
Positive_Review: Day staff were helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Manager was extremely rude Tried calling reception from my room for 30mins no one answered tried again off mobile no answer went downstairs to complain and was told we are busy can t you see the phone are still ringing Room was not ready at check in time Had to queue twice to check in and get parking sorted waited 20mins to start with when checking in Mentioned at time of booking was a 10 yr anniversary Hotel didn t seem to care Junior suite room with balcony is a rip off You pay for the view only Exec king or exec queen rooms are cheaper but there balconites are double the size and also with the same view Does not make sense Wonderful way to ruin a 10yr anniversary didn t have breakfast because just wanted to leave hotel first thing in the morning
Positive_Review: Bed was comfy View was lovely especially at night

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Dirty toilet in room had been used Long wait for dinner to be served in the bar Too many steps and no help from staff watching you carry suit cases up the stairs from the car park or from bar to reception No plugs by bedside for charging phones
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good amazing chef Good bar food menu Beautiful location by the thames Complimentary river ferry taxi

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The service in the restaurant was awful I had to collect my own food from the serving area as there were little or no waiters available Hilton you need to staff your facilities better
Positive_Review: River bus great to get to Canary Wharf and restaurants and free for hotel guests

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We had pre booked a room only to get there find it had been given to someone else Then told they didn t have a similar room available which we refused to accept Got given a room as we opened the door walked in on someone already staying in that room Fuming at this stage we were given a twin room which was nothing like the room described or paid for Not a good experience Staff very unhelpful
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Not being offered the special offer in the restaurant at night My husband had seen the offer on check in and had to go back to reception to ask for a voucher and then get the different menu

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Very disappointing customer service and most importantly our room couldn t of been any more different to the photos online certainly not worth the money we paid
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bed was noisy and not comfortable We stayed in room 150 If ever offered this room turn it down The constant sound of the boiler with a combination of the lift going up and down in addition to the noisy bed kept me awake all night Thank god check out was 12 00pm as I didn t get to sleep until 5am I did complain at the point of check out and was provided with an email address advising me to contact the member of staff for the purpose of an upgrade next time NO THANKS
Positive_Review: Staff were lovely and helpful The boat across the Thames was also a nice touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The breakfast was poor compared to other Hilton hotels I ve stayed in Over cooked hash and under cooked scrambled eggs Choice of continental pastries made up for this though Bed was an old fashioned Spring bed but ok for our one night if you don t mind noisy springs Good pub a few hundred yards from hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Expensive food poor for the price no water dispenser and water from bar v expensive standard was no better than premier inn which is much cheaper

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We was in room 148 We was kept awake most of the night with a buzzing vibrating noise coming from a room next to us I think it was some kind of a boiler room but we was not happy with this There was an open window to this room on our balcony which when we had door open was even worse
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room temperature air con heating is hard to figure out so we were a little bit cold
Positive_Review: This place was better than other places we have stayed in and paid more for Just under 200 this suite was luxury We have been here before which is why we decided to come back

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location is far out from the city if you arrive late in after mid night the ferry is no longer running so you have to walk a distance to the hotel or take a taxi The photos on the website is way better than the actual hotel view and location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It s quite expensive in the hotel for food and drinks
Positive_Review: The view is wonderful the rooms are very modern and provided with everything you need iron board hairdryer everything you need I also liked that you could go on the boat to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Sometimes we felt too removed from the city We got inaccurate directions twice from two different staff members They were certainly kind and helpful but if they didn t know where they were going they should find someone who does
Positive_Review: This hotel is away from the bustle on London clean and comfortable We loved that our room had a view of the Thames city lights The frequent complimentry ferry service to Canary Wharf made traveling to London sights easy and fun Breakfast in the restaurant was wonderful and our son ate free

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room service messed up my order but not too bad Paying 5 00 room service was a bit harsh when they messed up the drinks but I paid it anyway

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location is great but if you don t get back before midnight then you can t use the ferry to cross the river and understanding the us system from Canada Waters from non bus users is a bit tricky so walked Room was very small and while cheaper on the deal compared to travel lodge and premier inn the room is half the size
Positive_Review: Over nice clean hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed nice room good location though last ferry at midnight on a weekend could be a problem for some we had to get from Wembley Breakfast was excellent All staff were friendly and competent The location gave us a chance to explore a different part of London Canary Wharf lots of shops bars and eating places The Docklands Museum is really interesting and well laid out free entry

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast was good but extremely chaotic people were losing their tables when they went up to get food and there were not enough waiting staff to monitor this

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I called from the airport to ask for directions to the hotel They told me they didnt really know they transferred me somewhere and nobody picked the phone Considering the roaming cost it was a waste of money I had mentioned in the booking that I was taking my daughter to London as a birthday gift I expected some kind of special attention or at least saying happy birthday to her but none of it happened Getting some food at the bad took ages Bad location if you want to do sightseeing The closest station is quite far
Positive_Review: Breakfast was great and the hotel is really nicely arranged Welcome cookie was a great surprise

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Check in was below standard

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bar staff not very organised I m afraid They seemed stressed and understaffed
Positive_Review: The location is great if you want to experience the quiet of London and yet you can get into the thick of it by taking the boat into central london Canary Wharf is the river ferry away The breakfast is the best

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The price was nothing short of extortion 250 per night not including breakfast and that was for the worst room was a complete rip off and I expected more the TV wasn t working for the Manchester Darby the building is worn and like a rabbit warren I feel proper ripped off
Positive_Review: The bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Lower the price and rating as this hotel does not meet the standard it is priced at
Positive_Review: Hotel was looking tired in decor Room was small for a deluxe Lifts were tiny Not worth the money

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The first impression of your room is at the door The doors on our floor all had old screw holes in evidence and different coloured wood where the old room sign had been removed The Hotel needs modernising Whilst the ferry service was very good to the Hotel the extra step was an inconvenience at times Gym equipment needs regular servicing as some was damaged and unusable Complimentary water in the room would have been appreciated for each day of the stay and not just the day of arrival
Positive_Review: The night time view from our riverside room was spectacular looking out onto Canary Wharf Good choice for breakfast The outside sitting area was lovely with views across the Thames The regular ferry service was very good to the Hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: room was very small windows didn t open awkward step from bathroom to room which we kept tripping over TV was in a awkward position not facing the bed but facing the wall had to wait a very long time to be seated for breakfast then there were not any clean plates for the hot food so we had to wait longer for them to get clean ones
Positive_Review: great location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We did not get the room promised a number of the amenities were not in the room Walk in shower fridge etc I was made a special request that was not actioned Plus we ordered room service and asked to pay by card when the staff member arrived he said we could not pay by card I had to walk all the way back to to the front of the hotel to use an ATM woeful
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Rooms wasn t that great bedding isn t nice No facilities close by the by water when Costa is closed 50 deposit even though the cost of stay is already paid taken Informed that money goes straight back into account and it does not

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: rubbish air con local kids knocking around undesirable rooms And bad location terrible staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No mini bar AND no bottled water available I think that is retrograde especially as you classify the room as superior Whilst there was an empty ice bucket in the room there weren t obvious instructions how to obtain the ice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I had booked a queen full river facing suite but was given a side room even though it was a king suite When I complained I was first told they couldn t change but when I told them that I had specifically booked the queen suite and showed them the booking confirmation they finally relented Not the kind of welcome you expect to receive at a Hilton hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The stairs outside being spiral shape as I only go in lifts However that s being fusy
Positive_Review: The breakfast in the morning was lovely And the fery is a brilliant idea made good use of it to get to all the reastraunts and bars on the other side of the river and it s free to use Room was nice and big with the Beauitful river view Staff were all welcoming and lovely

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The first room we had was very small and dark but the give us a better one The pier was nor really confortable if you are travelling with luggage Beati

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I noticed that for people arriving for a late breakfast about 9 30 there was an extremely long queue fortunately we had had ours
Positive_Review: The quiet breakfast area behind the main area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When we were given the keys to the room at 5pm we found that the room had not been cleaned so was given another room which was not what we booked no view and a very small window found the room very hot even though there was air conditioning
Positive_Review: The hotel was very comfortable and the breakfast very good but restaurant can be busy if going down later

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room service sandwiches like supermarket or petrol station ones Room service brought a glass of flat Prosecco and said it was just open Rooms advertised with balcony not worth having no view and no seating Incredibly you only get free bottled water on the first night it cost them 10p Asked for milk but non turned up so no water or tea or coffee in the morning Takes ages for anyone to answer the phone reception or room service Ask to speak to manager but he did not phone back Apart from the staff on reception and one or two in the breakfast area the other staff had no idea what they were talking about
Positive_Review: The reception staff the breakfast was good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Very badly organised when it came to breakfast The hotel was very busy but having to stand in a queue at the breakfast counter for over 20 minutes was less than satisfactory Also the family room that our friends had booked was not ready on our arrival at 5 30pm and they were told they would have to wait until at least 7pm before the room would be ready
Positive_Review: The location and the view from the room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The breakfast service
Positive_Review: Whilst the food was good the queue to be served was horrendous the result of only one poor chef cooking and serving it was a disgrace

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fire alarm system was set off 3 times so a very sleepless night for us

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff were abrupt at the restaurant when asked for food at 10 30 and said food had stopped being served but the website said until 11pm The restaurant didn t suggest getting food at the bar Had to pay a 50 deposit for the room per night hopefully this will be refunded soon The car park at garage 2 is strange there is no way down to the car park direct from the hotel you have to use the car entrance to access your car and walk across the car park

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: had a really small issue with the room took a little while to get hold of someone to get it fixed especially as it only took a couple of minutes to fix

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location wasn t great and no little gift shops or anything like that would have stayed longer if prices were abit cheaper food prices were rediculous
Positive_Review: The views were amazing and restaurant staff were so lovley

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Fire alarm went off twice at night with the only explanation being a fault Staff did not once ask if I had a good stay even on checkout No info given on check in like restaurant here bar there
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No free wifi Breakfast service chaotic and unorganised as had to continuously ask for and fetch items myself
Positive_Review: Bed nice and comfy Reception gave Hilton made cookies which tasted great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The balcony door needs oiling Very creaky TV needs a bigger wall mount on it so it can swing out to face to bed properly Might apply only to some rooms also arrive later than 3 They seem to struggle having the rooms ready in the time frame they give The adjoining dinning company not so great Employees seemed stressed and come off a bit rude Also very very busy in the morning Other than that place was great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Very disappointed we arrived at 6 15pm and our room wasn t ready The check in staff couldn t tell us when it would be ready Had no where to shower or get ready properly for our night out we stayed over the weekend for a special birthday meal Also breakfast was very badly managed Huge queue for the hot meal had to queue for ages didn t go down at all Hotel couldn t cope with being full Wasn t a good experience

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Poor room initially but then moved to a nicer room as requested room with a view Some staff unhelpful broken air con However attentive staff when complained and compensated for next stay due to issues
Positive_Review: Comfy bed and nice views Nice breakfast plenty of choice Riverboat to Canary Wharf service great nice boat staff Wine and cake sent to room to congratulate us on our anniversary which was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff at the bar were slow rude The fire alarm went off 3 times during the night meaning we were very tired for our onward travel the following day
Positive_Review: Great hotel excellent rooms loved the ferry service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We were not able to access our room until 16 45 but the reception staff did offer free drinks etc by way of apology
Positive_Review: Stunning location beautiful hotel Breakfast was amazing with everything you could think of The staff were friendly rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable We had an amazing river view balcony the view from our room room 441 at night was beautiful The only negative I had was the check in we were supposed to be able to check in at 15 00 but our was not ready until 16 45 this was a bit of a let down but we were given2 lots of drinks vouchers and later that evening a complimentary fruit bowl and drinks I would definitely book this hotel again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: At arrival somebody used the toilet in our room and didn t flush Awfull Terrible We ve never experienced this in our livetimes We got offered an other room in which you could not see tv from in your bed Oubviously there was a smaller tv before and now there was a bigger one which was hanging in an angle but the arm was fit for the small tv not for the big one You couldn t turn the tv in full Pffff No tv in the evening
Positive_Review: Breakfast was marvelous 3 times hurray Marvelous friendly helpfull beautifull staff Frances and the breakfast team Job more than WELL DONE

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Views over the Thames were beautiful The complimentary ferry across the Thames was incredibly useful The staff were very nice and the breakfast superb

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Pillows too soft Also in the rooms some lights were not working so it would be good that your housekeeping checks these ahead Provide a small fridge so we can store stuff for our snacks cold drinks tks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Arrived in the hotel in the morning to leave some bags I asked them if they have my details as I booked my room a couple of weeks back via booking com but they said my name was not on the system even when I showed them my confirmation email They assured me that they will fix it but when we came back at night to check in they still said I wasn t on the system Then I heard another person complaining because she was in the same situation as me
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was quite a long wait at the breakfast area But that was it Certainly nothing that would stop me coming back The bottled water was expensive too
Positive_Review: The beds were so comfy the staff were brilliant food was great and it was very cheap The location is amazing too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Paid for a deluxe King room with balcony but the room was small and there were no chairs on the balcony so we couldn t sit out there Also it overlooked a car park and tennis courts should have booked a river view room The housekeeping staff knocked on our door twice way before check out time 12 00 asking what time we were leaving so we felt rushed to get out the room When I booked the room it said breakfast included but when I checked in we were told it was not The tv in the room was on a wall next to the bed and it wasn t on hinges so we had to lay side ways on the bed to watch it bit strange
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a perfect location with the complimentary ferry over to Canary Wharf until 12 at night very handy to go for drinks in the city The bed was so comfortable and big We couldn t hear any noise from other guests in the hotel which was great as this is usually a problem in big hotels We had dinner in the Columbia restaurant which was amazing and really good value for money the bar was lovely too and it wasn t too expensive for drinks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was so small and very claustrophobic View was in to next room and i could of crawlled in to their room and vice verca as the locks were broke on window Noisy at night Will not be staying again awful
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The staff on the reception desk are polite but painfully slow We were initially allocated a room that bore no resemblance to the description on booking com We returned to reception to be greeted yet again with a long queue too few staff and another painful wait Finally we were given another room slightly better but it didn t match the criteria that we d booked This whole situation had taken far too long We were due at another appointment for a very specific time and were late The reception desk is the front line they should be reassuring alert and quick the staff here at Doubletree Docklands are non of these We have stayed at other Doubletree Hotels and had a wonderful experience and that s why we chose this one Think very carefully about booking this hotel it s nowhere near the standard of the others
Positive_Review: The best bit about this hotel was checking out

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bathroom felt a little tired the grouting was extremely discoloured and whilst I m sure this is down to age it made the bathroom feel slightly unclean The bedding also smelt slightly damp
Positive_Review: The view from the room was lovely The bed was comfortable and the breakfast was good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The persons at the front desk were all very helpful and nice The location is ideal for making a short trip to Greenwich on the river on the sunny day as well as is convenient for both the underground and DLR The hotel ferry across the river run frequently so the access to Canary Wharf was good Enjoyed the breakfast with the view of a heron and seagulls

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location is challenging if weather is not great as you need to pay for a cab or get a boat across the river and walk 10 minutes for the tube Breakfast was below average and the building needs some TLC Our room at first was a box looking at other people s window so you must fight for the right one You don t get necessarily what the photos shows
Positive_Review: Views from the bedroom IF you get a decent one Comfy bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Long queues to check in Someone elses underwear in drawers No answer on careline Room Temp control not working Big leak outside room Had to visit reception x3 to get TV remote that worked Costa coffee bar not open as advertised
Positive_Review: cookies Free ferry Room decor

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Could hear people in corridor when room door was shut
Positive_Review: Decent room size Breakfast staff were VERY friendly and professional Decoration style nice Good location for public transport

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing the deal was really great
Positive_Review: The amazing location for a business trip and the way they made it convenient for leisure travellers too I think going there for vacations must be great as well due to the shuttle boat and the excellent connection with Canary Wharf Jubilee line Also a special mention for the restaurant and the sunny terrace from which one can get wifi an AMAZING spot to work while enjoying the weather the waves on the Thames river and the view over Canary Wharf I m used to staying at Hilton and DoubleTree especially but this one was a very good surprise I d stayed once a couple of years ago but it was winter and I couldn t enjoy the whole facilities

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Better notification of having to get a boat across to the hotel Didn t cause a problem for us but did add time on to our journey times
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good We were in a nice quiet part of the hotel comfortable room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: That I have paid for breakfast online but wasn t included upon arrival Pre pay 50 upon arrival incase of damages wasn t notified when booking only told when checking in with it taking 2 3 working days to be put into your bank
Positive_Review: The view was amazing from every angle of the hotel Our room King deluxe was very clean and well kept Bar had lots of variation Hotel staff were friendly and helpful Unique experience different side has been seen to London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: the queue for breakfast was huge but nothing we couldn t handle and the bar was a bit pricey
Positive_Review: the rooms were lovely with brilliant rooms and the location was excellent for our plans the free ferry service was excellent and we will definitely be returning

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: AC didn t hold out well 34c in London during stay
Positive_Review: Buffet overlooking Thames a great way to start the day Location was quiet with easy access to transit

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I had contacted both the hotel and used the chat option on the Hilton website as I am a photographer and required uninterrupted views of Canary Wharf Both recommended the same room so that s what I booked however the only way to get a view of Canary wharf was to stand on tip toe and hang out of the window Thankfully there is an outside area that I could use for taking pictures but if the weather had been bad this would not have been possible Not the view I was promised by reception or the person on chat The staff seemed to lack training subsequently some were great and others were unsure of pretty much everything In some cases the bar for example the staff were good but way to stretched which did not help them or the customers
Positive_Review: The hotel looked good nice room lovely touch with the cookie when you arrive Some of the staff were extremely good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff were rude from start to finish we were checked into our room late after emails months in advance about early check which was great after a 4am flight My wife fell asleep in the lobby she was so exhausted Multiple people were checked in ahead of us and all they could say was its not ready No apology or niceties were given My wife and I were both ignored in the bar more than once to the point were we just left Horrible experience and we won t be back I wouldn t even give 1 star considering how expensive the room was I have stayed in hostels and had a better experience for 13 pound a night not 110 Oh and they also tried to charge us extra for the room claiming that this was their policy even though the price on booking com was final
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The TV didn t work and I queued 3 separate occasions for over 25 mins Wasted time especially when we had things planned to do and panicked about doing them and arriving on time Not good
Positive_Review: The view from the room was incredible

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The electricity cut out TWICE in our room That doesn t even happen in a 1star hotel Not happy Manager tried to bribe us with a free 60 breakfast who the hell pays 60 for breakfast Room layout was ridiculous The door just missed the bed when opened Bathroom smelt like damp They refunded me 50 after complaining twice which I was still not happy to pay but I had had enough by then and just wanted to leave Would not stay again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Terrible parking which we were charged twice for then had to carry our cases up two flights of stairs to reception Long queues for checking in checking out breakfast Rude hotel staff housekeeping supervisor barged in our room whithout knocking telling us we shouldn t be in the room then after nearly an hour of waiting not knowing what was going on we were told we could stay in the room Paid extra for a bigger room with balcony and river city view but the room still felt cramped and the bathroom was tiny the door hit the loo when you opened it and there was barely a square foot to stand in the whole bathroom As for the balcony with view the river city could only be seen if you stood right at the edge of the balcony and stretched your neck right over and round Poor quality breakfast bacon was more fat than meat and the rest was tasteless When I tried to complain whilst checking out I was shot down and ushered off as quickly as possible Real let down expected a lot more from this hotel
Positive_Review: Good location free ferry over to Canary Wharf for hotel guests

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Oh dear We arrived early during the day and from the way we were received and welcomed I thought this was going to be an amazing stay Unfortunately I would be sorely disappointed The service I received from the night staff was the worst I have ever seen and received and for the last 18 months I spent at the very least 5 to 10 days a month in a hotel I thought I seen it all First night having requested before my arrival foam bedding through Hilton Honors my wife s allergic feather down as silver status member I am apparently entitled to this but alas I didn t find any I tried to call and left the phone on speaker for a good 15 minutes before I hung up I tried another number that they made available apparently this number was supposed to make your stay better and no answer again Then I had to trek five floors down through a maze of rooms on the ground floor you have to see how poor the floor layout is to appreciate the strain and when I finally got to reception guy told me they never answer their phones on weekends because the phones are serviced He also told me it would be impossible to get any foam bedding because he could not leave the front desk because pointing at the queues of people behind me I returned my wife removed all the bedding and we were prepared to sleep on a naked bed when bless his soul he managed to give us one paltry foam pillow The next day when I went downstairs and reported the lack of foam bedding Maria was amazing she apologised for the inconveniences and assured that the matter would be resolved without any hassle and she kept her promise I thought ok perhaps dude from the night before had a bad day hey I worked in customer services for many years in many ways as a government official I still do so I know you cant always have your A game on when it comes to customers I forgave him and Doubletree
Positive_Review: The day staff the location were great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I didn t like how long you had to wait for breakfast It took about 15mins before we were seated But the food was very nice
Positive_Review: The beds are very cosy and the shower was brilliant

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Queuing for 45 minutes to check in with nobody explaining why it was taking so long and it was very unwelcoming When we came down 25 minutes later there was still a queue The tv in the room was in an awkward position When we arrived back on Saturday evening there was nowhere to sit in the bar so we went outside only to be told that the area was closed so we went to bed Breakfast was disorganised though I had spoken to the kitchen about gluten free toast when it arrived it the bread hadn t been toasted and the waiter suggested we put it in the ordinary toaster When we checked out the receptionist didn t even ask if we had had a good stay Definitely won t be coming back
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable and the free ferry service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Cleanliness of rooms one room had a filthy bath that we had to call housekeeping up to sort out the other room was left for us with a very smelly used and unflushed toilet The bar prices were high but the bar service was a disgrace Not what we expected from the Hilton group
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The breakfast was joke the queues for getting in and the queues for getting your breakfast having to borrow source From other tables no hot water to make a cup of tea no orange juice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Too many people for breakfast dining room and cook station couldn t cope Both mornings has to queue out side restaurant and wait for table On Sunday morning when we were at the cook station waiting twice our table was cleared as if we had left Very unorganised

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bath was filthy room was next to a lift which vibrated the walls everytime it went past Couldn t cater for the guests had to wait almost 35 mins for some of the breakfast to be available

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The breakfast could have been better It should have been 23 and I certainly wouldn t have paid that for a buffet breakfast Grumbled at 16 95 It was cold and I certainly want waiting on for that money not having to collect my own tea and make my own toast or have to queue for it But the hotel made it right so I am pleased with the outcome
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent Parking facilities excellent complimentary service to Canary Wharf was also excellent Room was clean and tidy Our overall staff was excellent will be staying again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I planned the nights stay here as a surprise for my boyfriend It was supposed to be a luxury getaway based on the amount I paid I booked a table ahead of schedule and the only time available which was 10pm Admittedly we were a little late The member of staff then appeared so desperate to clock off that he made us feel like we were an inconvenience The food was average Lack of facilities in the bedroom meant I couldn t even make a coffee in the morning Overall I feel disappointed by the stay and the service we were given ultimately a waste of money on something that was meant to be special
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Restaurant seemed a bit overpriced but we never tried it out so for all we know it could have been outstanding
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel with cool interior and a brilliant breakfast Friendly staff Super quiet and peaceful Also the free boat over to canary wharf was a major plus for us as we were going to the o2 everyday and also allowed us to take a riverboat into central London They also have a costa in the hotel which was a fun addition

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing that we can think of The travel advice maybe could be better or if you could provide a map as the direction of the hotel to Canary wharf quay is not evident from the railway station Also which is best Station Thanks
Positive_Review: The Bed was fab and it felt like a real little holiday break The breakfast was excellent and it was lovely to sit on the terrace The staff were really attentive despite beinbg busy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I was told a river view but it wasn t one really it was a side on river view lookjng through buldings misleading also not happy that if lying in bed the tv is fitted to a left hand wall so you can not see the screen properly receptionist were very busy I gave up queuing as took too long
Positive_Review: Lovely staff lovely and clean hotel breakfast excellent Beautiful river view from bar dinning rooms and reception

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel had a beautiful layout with a classy feel the free boat to and from the other side of the Thames was just a thoughtful idea and just adds to your stay The find gesture of the warm chocolate cookies when you check just makes you feel that the staff are going out of there way to welcome you The rooms were so clean and tidy and the views were amazing would 1000 per cent recommend this hotel to everybody

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Beds were comfy View was amazing Fresh cookies on arrival Amazing room Best hotel I ve ever stayed in Free tickets for ferry was amazing Location beautiful and restaurants available

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The location is brilliant overlooking the Thames and Canary Wharf Free ferry across the other side of the Thames to reach Tube or DLR stations short walk away

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I ve stayed for a night Saturday the 23rd of July I booked through booking com and on the websites states room with view I ve called in advance to have a arranged a small cake and an happy anniversary message in my room And I did state that I would come for a late check in on booking And I confirmed the booking the day before arrival On arrival we are sent to a room with no view and no happy anniversary message in my room The night was already ruined The receptionist offered us a cold or hot beverage to convince us to accept the room and stating that there were no room available with view I refused and he called the manager After 20 min wait the manager showed up and suddenly there was a room available however the room was half the size and the air conditioning was not working And there was a only a side view of the promised view on the websites So the room was super hot and we had to keep opening and closing the room to keep the right temperature The manager promised a bottle of prosecco I waited about an hour for the bottle and I had to go downstairs at the bar and pick it up myself dreadful In addition no one was answering the phone at reception so I couldn t really ask for anything So I ve managed to start my already ruined night at about 2 o clock at night I m addition there were only two hand towel in the room so I had to go downstairs and again cause no one was answering the phone and ask for them The receptionist arrived later with towels still wrapped in the delivery bag and with an annoyed face he gave to me I got surprised he didn t threw them in my face So I will definitely not trust anymore Hilton chain as I ve been let down greatly and ruined my anniversary with my wife
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Didn t like the way the way one of the receptionists would make a face and look a customer up and down after checking each one in as they walked away Aircon in room wasn t working the first night and the second night we had a ceiling leak so had to be moved at 1am in the morning
Positive_Review: loved the location and facilities food and drinks The way we were looked after after some room issues

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was stuffy and smelt stale not what you expect when your paying the cost you are Also the room I booked was a deluxe queen room which was not deluxe by any means the bed was a standard double bed the bathroom was tiny there was nothing about the hotel that stood apart from a cheaper priced one the price you pay is for the name of the hotel it s most certainly is not reflected in what you get I will not stay there again also the photos advertised with the hotel are very missleading
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We were given biscuits when we arrived which we didn t eat straight away Arrived back in our room on Saturday after being out all day to find that one of our biscuits was missing Might seem petty but it is still stealing Surprised also that bottled water is not supplied in the rooms Had a meal in the bar on the Friday night it was just average

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I did not like the bed much it was confusing like a water bed but not a water bed Snd there was some mess under the bed and stickyness on the papers
Positive_Review: I liked the big room and the cookies cookies were the shizzle

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The rooms and bathrooms were a lot smaller compared with the Marriott which is a short distance away and cheaper staff talk to each other whilst serving you which feels a little rude they Rush through the check in I missed the small print where they actually debit your account of a further 100 on top of the room cost then refund it back within 5 days where they know there has been no damage theft I called about this and was told to call back if the money doesn t go in annoying The worst part of this experience was breakfast having arrived at a busy time I had to queue for about 20mins not too much of a problem but what really annoyed me was that we were queuing when we could see lots of empty vacated tables which just needed cleaning however there was a shortage of staff so the tables were not being cleaned until a lot later than the guests had exited probably to ensure that they had actually finished and not gone to get more food perhaps Also annoying was the girl at the front restaurant desk in front of the queue who would see people walk up let them join the back of the line then bark at them saying excuse me you have to give me your room number first before you line up not what was expected for a Hilton hotel
Positive_Review: I like the location for Canary wharf it is really close by the rooms and hotel were clean there s a coffee shop inside the designs of the rooms were very nice and sophisticated and the beds were comfy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We booked a river view room only to be given a room with no view at all This is false advertising by Double Tree needs to stop We were very dissapointed by this
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff clean rooms Excellent breakfast options

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No fillet steak temporary taken off the menu but Victoria did get the chef to cook two excellent thank you
Positive_Review: Our restaurant manageress was very helpful as we did have two small issues which she dealt with no hesitation friendly and helpful her name Victoria on duty Friday Saturday 8 9 July

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: charge for early check in even though they advised we could check in if room ready Given wrong room complained and Manager rude Have written letter to hotel
Positive_Review: modern good views nice atmosphere

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Could have been emailed to advise ferry was not running instead of having to travel to ferry port and then travel back again Had we have had plans it could have delayed us Member of staff could have been more friendly as seemed short but got us checked in
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The rooms although look big are tiny Toilet door was hitting the toilet bed was super noisy for the price you pay you should get free wifi and not have to pay for it luckily was out of the room most of the time spent there
Positive_Review: Complimentary cookie on arrival ferry service the balcony relaxing feel of the lobby

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I m being extra picky here but the coffee at breakfast wasn t the best to be fair I m a coffee addict and take it seriously and had I had breakfast both days I might have got my coffee from Costa in the hotel the second day
Positive_Review: I thought the whole experience was great from the Reception Staff who were so friendly and helpful to the location the use of the water taxi and when that was not working on Saturday morning the hotel arranged free taxi rides to the nearest tube I loved my room which was modern and clean and the bed super comfy I only got to eat breakfast the once but the staff were efficient and friendly There was a wide range of food

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fact that the ferry had broken down and there was no one to let us know this and had to make a rushed dash to the tube to make an appointment Costa coffee was very slow and coffee was cold
Positive_Review: Loved the river location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Ferry wasn t working on the Saturday and we were not informed by staff even though I d asked for an extra ticket at reception that morning Only informed about replacement taxis after asking what was happening Receptionist extremely difficult to understand English is my mother tongue but I had ask him to repeat himself several times Extremely slow bar service I was the only person at the bar however the bartender continued to clear empty tables for another 5 minutes even though he was aware I was waiting
Positive_Review: Great breakfast and lovely outside terrace area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I had a rather frustrating experience I booked the room because it came with a guaranteed view and a bathtub in reality the room looked out onto another building through dirty windows So I complained and the staff tried to be helpful upgrading me to a room with a view of the river I was so pleased until I actually got inside the room It was a family room and had two double beds in it and wasn t cosy or nice at all For a romantic getaway with my boyfriend it just all felt so wrong The bath drain didn t work so we couldn t have a bath And the toilet didn t flush properly It was supposed to be a special night away for us an anniversary and birthday celebration and ended up being rather a let down in terms of the room and facilities etc I had also called ahead twice to stress that it was a special occasion confirm that I would have a view of the river and ask for some wine glasses to be in the room which I was assured I would get and never got When I checked in I asked again and still never got wine glasses Which is just freaking annoying
Positive_Review: The staff genuinely tried to help with the issues I had However even in helping they didn t really the room we got shifted into was not nice at all a big open space in the room without chairs or anything even though it did have a view of the river sure It didn t feel warm and cosy and romantic I was really disappointed with the whole experience You expect more from a Hilton It wasn t cheap either

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff not very helpful we had special requests which were ignored breakfast service and bar service slow They always seemed a little short staffed room was small
Positive_Review: The bed was amazing slept so well beautiful location lovely views

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location for 02 the ferry was great and we got ferry from hotel to 02 which was so easy and stress free Great terrace bar for cocktails before Breakfast was lovely huge choice Room was modern with balcony and river view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location isnt very close to any tube stations so not having a car isnt a option
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable There was a lot of option for breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No service charge we would instead leave a tip the pizza at the bar tasted like it was cooked from frozen and not freshly prepared for the price of it
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable and the room was a good size We had a good view and the complimentary boat service was nice touch The bars were nice but should not include service charge Overall I would come back such a nice treat The homemade cookies were amazing a classy hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was very small and not decorated to the standard of a four star hotel Balcony was filthy and we had staff walking from corridors onto our balcony to get to the other side very early in the morning We were not told about room deposit until we checked in which was inconvenient I feel the room was not value for money
Positive_Review: Ferry was a nice touch Staff were pleasant

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room did not have double doors opening out to a large balcony as the photo alongside the room showed when I booked The tv was on a bracket that only pulled out far enough to watch from the door not while sat on the bed also there were no plug sockets near a mirror which made drying my hair quite difficult in the morning
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly and bed was comfy and the shower was good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Well no one had told us when booking that to access the hotel you need to get a ferry This really restricted what we had planned to do as the last ferry back we just before 12
Positive_Review: Lively hotel really picturesque One of the best hotel breakfasts I ve had and staff were great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing But Location won t be for everyone especially if wanting to visit touristy bits of London If that s what you want stay closer to centre
Positive_Review: The view from our room and the bar terrace was amazing at night The boat across to Canary Wharf so that we could eat and shop Location great for the O2 Nice and quiet especially at weekends

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great rooms in a spectacular setting of this fine hotel looking across to the wonders of Canary Wharf and all the interesting river transport and tidal variations Great location for short or long stay trips to London particularly recommended is the walk along Thames Path to central London Great Gym at the hotel too good beer at the bar free ferry fantastic breakfast need we go on more

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No hair dryer in the room
Positive_Review: Bed comfy Plenty of tea coffee Staff helpful friendly on check in Free ferrie travel Highly recommend Great hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our first room was horrible Really really small and was i think in the middle of the hotel had one small window overlooking the ceiling of the hotel But we went back down to reception and luckily got a much nicer room
Positive_Review: The location of this hotel is great we used it as a base for an event at the O2 They offer a free boat service across the Thames where you can get the clipper service to the O2 The room was great although our first room was AWFUL but the lady at reception was nice enough to give us an upgrade We had a balcony over looking the Thames and it was just really lovely Also the bar in this place Just go its beautiful just to sit out on the river watching the world go by at whilst having a nice drink and a bite to eat Also breakfast is really worth getting huge buffet with really yummy food

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The corridors seems a bit tiny and scary at first but it is due to the original architecture of the building old docks
Positive_Review: Easy to reach metro 5mn bus which are very frequent Amazing and unique view on the thames from the room Brunch on the riverside Clean rooms Very friendly staff Free hot cookie at arrival Very good deal for money Excellent breakfast included in room s price

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The view paid for a city river view but could only really see the ferry dock the roof of the walkway connecting to the other half of the hotel Not exactly the prettiest of views The wifi didn t work properly which wasn t ideal Our room was right invetween the boiler room and the lift so all we could hear throughout the night was the pressure valve in the boiler and the lift shaft clanging The price that we paid for the room 200 just for 1 night I feel wasn t justified with what we received Of all the things we were promised when booking the two most important things the river view and the city view were amongst others the two biggest things lacking I would stay here again if the prices were lowered
Positive_Review: The complimentary giant cookies The size of the room it wasn t overly big but had everything you needed The shower was extremely nice may sound silly but the water was really soft Complimentary ferry service to Canary Wharf for people staying at the hotel just show your key I personally feel the hotel would ve been better for prolonged stays I was only there for 1 night

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fabulous stay from arrival to departure first class Staff very helpful and friendly Excellent location free ferry over the Thames to Canary Wharf with excellent shops bars restaurants and metro to all London areas and beyond Room beautiful such a comfy bed Second visit and will be back Breakfast amazing all fresh everything you could want Close to all London has to offer but discreet enough to allow you quiet as well A fab London pub couple of doors down and a posh bar bistro a lovely stroll down the Thames away You will love it xxxx

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: An automatic service charge added to my bill of around 15 just for ordering 2 bottles of cider and a pizza in the bar
Positive_Review: The room was quiet and very clean The bed and pillows were extremely comfortable We both had a fantastic nights sleep The breakfast was also very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The staff were not very helpful We requested room service at 11pm but were told this had stopped After a lot of probing we discovered that the bar was still serving hot food we had to get it ourselves though and wait at the bar whilst it cooked and carry it through the hotel up the lift into our room rubbish service We would have been happy to pay a tray charge and not what I d expect from a Hilton Other hotel room services will do everything to help and make your stay relaxing Bar staff not very attentive one member of staff spilt a whole bottle of coke over the bar which went all over the bar stool and floor but made no attempt to tidy or rectify so it was left dripping and unsightly whilst she stood around chatting
Positive_Review: Beds were super comfy breakfast was lovely Check in staff were very friendly great free boat service to the hotel and back to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The incredibly creaky floor boards in the room were really loud probably not great for the people below us but otheriwise nothing Quite a time to travel to the near undergrounds if you have a short stay and a lot to do
Positive_Review: Breakfast was really huge and all fresh each morning The rooms were very clean and there was plenty of space for all of our stuff After an issue with the air con the staff were really helpful and moved us straight away to a better room that was bigger still Even though we re quite young it was nice to be treated the same as any older guests would have been

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Everything This was not 1 2 miles from the O2 bathroom was filthy staff was unhelpful Tried to order room service for 30 mins and they kept picking up the phone and putting the phone down
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Firstly when we got in our room and started to unpack we found a pair of ladies underwear not my wife s then my wife found a pubic hair in the bath The next morning at breakfast my wife went to have some cheese which was in a wrapper and noticed it was a month out of date We told a woman that looked like she was managing the breakfast about the cheese in which she did say sorry and walked off with it After that we did not see her again and we was there for at least another half a hour after To top it all off as we checked out we went down to the car park to set off home As we got to the shutters they did not open so we parked back up and went to reception to find out how we get out That s when we got told that we need a car park coin to get out why we was not given this when we checked out I don t know as I paid for the parking whilst checking out so then we finally thought we was ready to go but no we couldn t get out still because the had done the same to two other cars My wife went back upstairs to tell them what was going on She came back down with a caretaker sort of guy who said to my wife I don t know why they always do this Meaning this is an ongoing problem The staff where rubbish at this hotel they defiantly need more training I would not recommend this hotel and I most certainly never stay there again
Positive_Review: The bed was good and the room was a good size

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff I was given a double room with no balcony without being told anything I went to reception told them this is not the room I paid for I paid for a queen with balcony and views and was told sorry we are extremely busy tonight we only have that room I said that s unexceptable they told me do you love on London we can redund you money and come and stay with us another night when I was 3 in morning had to organise a babysitter ect also underground car park was full
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The help that was given to me when I had come to the wrong hotel having made an error when booking Reception staff were very obliging and made calls on my behalf to the booking company and also the other hotel All was sorted and we will definitely stay at this hotel again and use the booking company

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No competent and strong assistance with bags All on staff at checkin were very slight women physically Unequipped for bag assistance though willing Then when I was checking out there was no one available at all for bag assistance
Positive_Review: Location location location Can t be beat Great shuttle service to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was nothing I didn t like
Positive_Review: Very relaxing hotel Great outside bar and food Fabulous courtesy boat Nice size room Hotel parking Easy access to the 02 arena

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: having to leave the room so early in the morning has my coach home wasent until the afternoon
Positive_Review: the room was excellent and the bed very comfortable to sleep on

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bar staff in the evening were awful didn t know what they were doing didn t know whether or not they were serving food and took far too long to make drinks and serve you I had also informed the hotel that it was my partners 21st birthday and it would be nice if they could make the room just that extra bit special but no such extras were made which is a shame cause I would have been happy to pay for a bottle of champagne or something in the room on arrival There was a long queue to check in and out we were also woken up by a cleaner in the morning continuously knocking on the door and then when we answered she simply said it was the wrong room Staff at breakfast were not very helpful either although the food was nice and there was a great selection there was no coffee and no one to ask for help
Positive_Review: The room was lovely bed super comfy and loads of space in the junior suit Bathroom was very nice and clean Lovely views along the Thames The ferry was also very convenient as dropped you at the hotel Overall the trip was pleasant but would have been greatly improved by better customer service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Amazing location I loved the fact it way quiet and I fell in love with the design and the location of the hotel You get a pass for the water ferry which took us over the river Nice little perk Although the hotel itself was a bit of a labyrinth our room was a decent size and had a very pleasant deco Pretty quiet Only down was that we couldn t access our balcony would ve been nice to sit out w a drink however when mentioned at check out staff very helpfully mentioned to ask on next booking you d like a balcony Breakfast amazing restaurant very nice beautiful sitting outside by the river Loved it Will be defo back w the family

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Service charge being added to bar bill when no service was received Very little hanging wardrobe space No robes provided in room
Positive_Review: Staff very welcoming friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It would be useful to have better signage at Canary Wharfe station for directions to the ferry
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfortable and the room a good size It was lovely having the little balcony and being able to step out to look over the river We left the door open for a while to enjoy the pleasant breeze The complimentary ferry was useful although we preferred taking the bus to Canada Water to pick up the tube into the city The breakfast menu offered was varied and delicious As the weather was good we enjoyed sitting outside on the terrace to eat All the staff we encountered were polite helpful and professional

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Not a big fan of feathered pillows but the bed and room was comfy with good facilities Excellent and friendly room service gave me a freebie too Warm cookie on arrival was a nice touch Lovely breakfast huge variety Was very happy with my stay will definatley come again Also the ferry over the river was just beautiful Wasn t expecting a boat ride Loved it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: To say the hotel had been refurbished the quality of the room was poor Soap dish hung off the wall in shower and various botched patched up repairs
Positive_Review: great choice for breakfast staff couldn t be more helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Could not see TV from the bed paid for city river view got a view of residential apartments
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfy and the choice for breakfast outstanding

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our Queen Deluxe with balcony and river view wasn t ready when we arrived we were early however the receptionist said she had another room available this turned out to be a double bedroom on the ground floor we didn t have time to go back to reception and complain without being late for an appointment when we did try reception was full with people checking in
Positive_Review: The wonderful view of the Thames and Canary Wharf from the outside Terrace excellent for a summer event The courteous and capable way in which we were treated when having a problem with our room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When we first arrived I had booked a room witha private balcony and a partial sea view They gave us a tiny room with a tiny window with no view or balcany like I had booked The problem was that I had booked this room especially as an anniversary gift but they gave us a very subpar room Thankfully they changed the room for me after a little complaining and the new room was much better and overall didn t spoil our stay
Positive_Review: The location the food the atmosphere and the room was great with a fantastic view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I had purchased a deluxe King room with balcony and was also told that I would be able to check into my room early 12 1pm Upon arriving they said that the room wasn t ready but we were able to leave our bag with them in a safe place When we eventually got into the hotel room at night time we found that our king bed was in fact two single beds pushed together there was no balcony whatsoever and the bathroom wasn t great The power of the shower was also very weak which left us disappointed the morning after Overall I feel that this hotel was not value for money whatsoever and me and my partner both feel very disappointed by this hotel and its facilities
Positive_Review: The mattress on the single beds were comfortable and hotel lobby was nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was nowhere near a superior room as we d been promised no fridge and tiny bathroom not impressed at all Staff were good but room awful Lunch was abysmal and not edible
Positive_Review: Bed was comfy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff didnt pick up phone at fromt desk several times Ironing board was not good Strong smell of cleaning fluid throughout corridors Doorman didn t offer assistance with luggage Service charge is added to every order even one drink at the bar which seems excessive
Positive_Review: I liked the decor very hip and good views of river from most parts of hotel Being given a cookie upon check in was a nice touch Breakfast was good Check in and check out were quick and good service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room not clean bathroom door didn t lock 4 5 flies in the room not comfortable at all Also it was an anniversary treat for the weekend Not happy at all I have stayed at double tree before in Nottingham where excellent rooms and great service Dock lands was a let down
Positive_Review: The location by the river

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The breakfast was expensive and not very good quality sausages were cheap and toast cold and soggy The maids walked in on our room prior to our check out wife still in bed
Positive_Review: The free ferry Friendly staff Room was nice and clean but not worth the money Shower powerful Big Bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Very happy with this hotel Nice location with water taxi stopping at the hotel Very tasteful and modern interior and place kept very clean Staff were also very helpful and friendly Breakfast was delicious too Would highly recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The position of the TV in the room was NOT properly adjusted for guest viewing and could not be changed The bathroom was small and toiletries occupied almost the whole space available on the shelf in front of the mirror leaving almost no space for our personal items It has been a long walk through narrow corridors to the lift The Wi fi connection was usually very poor or completely unavailable in the room especially at night
Positive_Review: The king size bed is wide and very comfortable bedside lighting is very convenient The design of the room is nice even for a long term stay All members of the staff are friendly and help you asap

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I am a vegetarian and would have liked a little more choice on the restaurant menu I hope to return again but with my daughter who is vegan so would like more choice to cover that However I enjoyed a delicious well presented meal in the relaxing and ambient restaurant a lovely dining experience
Positive_Review: Stylish hotel with very accommodating friendly and welcoming staff Tranquil bedroom with comfortable bed and quality attention to detail Lovely views from bedroom balcony of the Thames on one side and city skyline the other As a single traveller I had a relaxing and enjoyable but too short a stay I will definitely return

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The car park located in the hotel was completely full so we had to park our car outside down the road When we arrived they told us our room was no longer available and gave us a different room We took the key and went into the room to find they had given us a key for someone else s room with all they re belongings in there I was mortified I would hope that my possessions Are safe in the room but this made me uneasy The rooms were ok basic nothing amazing for the money
Positive_Review: The free token for boat ride across the water

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Booked a room with a balcony but you could only see the view of the river and Canary Wharf at the end of the balcony the rest faced another building We had to leave the public terrace at 11pm which was a shame as we were enjoying the view and we were being quiet
Positive_Review: Fabulous choice in the breakfast buffet with a great selection Bed was super comfy and staff were friendly and helpful Would definitely stay here again Ferry was useful Nice and quiet

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: That I couldn t stay longer
Positive_Review: Hotel staff very friendly and helpful Breakfast and evening meals outstanding Views to take your breath away New York has competition Will definately visit again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing at all
Positive_Review: I can t praise this hotel highly enough the staff where brilliant food excellent and the room was beautiful I would recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 50 security deposit that s immediately withdrawn on admission and then refunded seems like a long way around it Why not just keep card details to then detuct charges for damages after checkout
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No safe no mini bar no free wifi without hassle
