Positive_Review: The terrace bar views were superb Lovely location on river Room was spacious Bed very comfy Breakfast spot on

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Balcony in a King superior room Coffee machine would have been good to have
Positive_Review: Nice size room amazing bed Good breakfast looking out over the Thames

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The staff was very helpful but we had a small confusion upon our arrival The receptionist gave us a room with partial side view on the river whilst we ve booked one with full view on the Thames queen size When we contacted him he said that luckily there was still one room available with full view so we changed for that one Happy end for us eventually but just be sure you get the room you booked
Positive_Review: Helpful staff nice view nice breakfast ferry boat service for free to from Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I didn t like the fact that i was charged twice for my stay I was also charged more money which i wasn t aware of
Positive_Review: I liked the hotel and how it was presented And i appreciated the staff for recognizing their mistake and giving me and my partner free breakfast and a pass to the executive lounge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It needs a mini bar and the bathroom is too small
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful I would definitely recommend this hotel to a friend The room was very comfortable with a nice view from the balcony

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room size was small for a king deluxe room Travelodge has bigger rooms The tv was awkwardly mounted on the wall making it hard to view
Positive_Review: Very nice decor in the reception and amazing breakfast The staff were helpful and warming and the free ferry service to canary wharf was helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bed It was sooo uncomfortable I did not like the check in The staff member asked for my credit card which i thought was for ID purposes he then debited my card with 100 with no explaination It was for any incidentals during the stay but if I hadnt of asked I would not have ben told On check out I was also billed for someone else s room This caused a delay whilst they sorted things out
Positive_Review: Parking facilities was good Free water ferry to canary Wharf Clean Hotel Good room size with lovely views The hotel was in a good location for the Olympic Stadium

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Unnaccounted for debits from my bank account and the cost of the room was higher than the price arranged on booking com
Positive_Review: All you can eat breakfast with readily available fresh orange juice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Would of been nice to be aware of getting to hotel via bus link as arrived back after last ferry crossing so had to find this out ourselves bathroom could of done with being a little bigger
Positive_Review: Very nice hotel enjoyed travelling across river to hotel which was an experience staff very friendly good choice at breakfast rooms clean bed comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We felt that the on line booking and all the information regarding the room size and style were misleading and hence when first impression of walking in to the room was one of disappointment Buffet breakfast hot food was cold It was not until we were leaving did we happen to see the second car park I would have been happier parking in secured parking than on the street over night
Positive_Review: The Hotel facilities and location were good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No response for 40 minutes when calling room service upon placing an order for sandwiches we received packet sandwiches Not what you d expect for a Hilton
Positive_Review: Overall a really lovely hotel with friendly staff you even get a cookie on arrival Lovely room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: different levels of floor in the room going from the en suite to the bedroom nearly broke my foot a couple of times bad design wasn t off to a good start
Positive_Review: breakfast was brilliant

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The wifi wasn t free I don t know if this was because of the kind of room we booked or just policy It wasn t a massive hindrance as 4G was available throughout the hotel but it would have been nice not to use our own data
Positive_Review: The bed was amazing It was an executive queen room and needless to say the bed was fit for royalty Great space and light amazing views and just all round satisfaction

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No swimming pool fitness room could be better
Positive_Review: Beautiful location river view from blacony complementary ferrey to canary wharf Nice welcome warm cookie on arrival Nice rooms very clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bed was extremely uncomfortable in room 205 it has a very unforgiving lump on the left hand side of the bed Our friends who were staying in a family room said their bed was very comfortable Also the ability to get extra pillows would have been nice
Positive_Review: Bar man knew and remembered our drink choices over the weekend and remembered our room number even though we only went to the bar couple of times This was a lovely special touch Also as the trip was for a special occasion we ordered a bottle of bubbles for the first day which was swiftly delivered on check in with a lovely bowl of complimentary fruit Thank you

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: View from the room was more onto an ugly building across but from the right angle you still have a view of the river It s a short walk from the ferry to Canary Wharf station but long enough so that if it were raining it would be off putting But in good weather it s a pleasant walk But there is a bus supposed to arrive in front of the hotel too that goes to Canada Water station To be honest this is nitpicking
Positive_Review: The room was beautiful and well looked after The bar is cosy and quiet the view was over the river and quite stunning at night The free ferry across made it easy to reach the hotel you walk off the boat onto up the quay and then into the hotel lobby which is great The price I got 230 for 2 nights in a SuperKing bed was cheaper than Stratford Double at a Premier Inn on that weekend date A no brainer really

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Evening meal and lack of available snacks in bar I e crisps nuts etc our table was in line with area where food was cooked for evening meal we were not happy to see chef nibbling at food while preparing it also not wearing hygiene gloves while handling food Evening meal was of poor quality chips soft and over cooked chicken only tasted of salt We sat in bar to relax about 2 hours before our table was booked for we needed some snacks to keep us going but we re told none were available but we could order off menu which was no good when we had booked table We ended up going in 50mins earlier for our meal Not happy We have stayed at hilton docklands on many occasions prior to double tree but are not impressed with double tree I very much doubt if we will return
Positive_Review: Nice welcome at reception Very helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When I asked for a river view room I was expecting to look at the river face on Instead I had to look at the patio area then to the left for a bit of river
Positive_Review: The breakfast was amazing So much on offer and it was all delicious

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing stands out which I didn t like but if I really had to pick something it was how busy the staff were at breakfast We asked for coffee but as they were so busy they forgot
Positive_Review: Brilliant location friendly staff and very clean The staff couldn t be more helpful at reception when I needed directions

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location although free ferry service is available to address this issue but timing on weekends are not practical As per advert every room has river view and I requested room with river view as per advert but my request was declined as river view rooms were available at premium rates
Positive_Review: Good welcoming staff and breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff need to pick up phone calls and there was no fridge I previously booked a queen room it was better than the King room because the King room didn t have all the complimentary essentials for some reason Bedding was creased and looked rushed Tv wiring was seen instead of hidden
Positive_Review: Quality and vibe was fantastic Area is prestigious Cookie from the reception was nice Free tickets to ferry was great didn t use it though

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No view over river
Positive_Review: The cookies and most comfortable bed Our check in attendant Can t remember his name but Italian from Milan Most helpful young man

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The hotel was so far away from the tube station which meant travelling late at night was almost impossible as there was no way of getting back from the tube station
Positive_Review: The room was spacious and clean staff were helpful and the views were amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The staff was rude and stuck up Got my booking all wrong at check in No fridge in the room and the car park gate was a hassle
Positive_Review: The ferry crossing was free and very convenient and the view from the bar outside was beautiful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The underground was a 25minute walk from the underground we did not know about the ferry until we arrived The room was not particularly large and no view to look out onto
Positive_Review: The room was clean and the staff friendly also there was a good choice at breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Tiny claustrophobic rooms Expensive wifi Poor service Noone picks up the phone Had to chase roomservice 4 times went through reception who promised they would call back but nothing happened In the end it took 1 5hour to get some food to the room which meant i could not get to bed until 1am Asked for a newspaper at breakfast was promised to have 1 brought to my table finished breakfast 45 minutes later without any papers Seems like staff very nice and agreeable but then doesn t care much about carrying out the actual service Far from public transport
Positive_Review: Beautiful location by the docks Clean Friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No negatives really perhaps a mirror behind the dressing table would be good for whilst doing your hair and had to make sure back for last boat at 11 50pm apart from that cant wait for my next visit
Positive_Review: Great location being just across the river from central london the boat bus was great stayed there for the o2 just a short boat trip over river minutes walk to tube station and one stop to the 02 always a boat available when needed and just made it more exciting also so close to tube station anyway or clipper boat taking you to all of the sites great fun hotel was great very individual with the internal walls and decoration very clean rooms big for london too and we only had basic twin good facilities in room great large shower warm chocolate cookie in reception was a lovely touch too and yummy cocktail bar lovely and breakfast best ive had so much choice couldnt really fault it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Double bed in standard room is too small Very noisy antisocial behaviour outside our part of the hotel on Saturday night until dawn
Positive_Review: Parking on site Bar for a nightcap Room decor and air conditioning Ferry service to Canary Wharf Complimentary cookies on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Are you kidding me You greeted me with a goddamn cookie I d marry this hotel if it wasn t frowned upon
Positive_Review: The bed was ridiculously comfy honesty it was like sleeping in the fat fold of the Pillsbury doughboy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was nothing I didn t like
Positive_Review: The staff were ALL excellent From the lady who checked me in and got me a room immediately and I was early to the Bar Staff and the lady who delivered my evening meal They all were professional kind and engaging It made a huge difference

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: the room that i rent was relatively smaller than i expected
Positive_Review: the location next to the famous river and the bar are both lovely The staffs are generous and charming

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It would be nice to know the ferry times as we weren t sure how often it ran and until what time
Positive_Review: Amazing hotel wish I could stay longer Complimentary ferry service makes it easy to cross Thames and reach Canary Wharf tube station or take a ferry to the center of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Paid for a room with balcony but was given one without and they would not of done nothing if I didn t go back to reception and tell them I paid for balcony and the view wasn t good as I couldn t even see Canary Wharf Ordered room service and they bought the wrong food up
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: room was no 106 and was a little noisy as on the back is a pub but it was a bank holiday weekend so very busy
Positive_Review: Greatr service from reception upon arrival Hotel was in a lovely location bar was nice and breakfast was delicious especially the pancakes

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No breakfast include in price Our rooms Windows overlooked a court yard garden this was ok but the Windows didn t open we rang reception and they were very happy to change our room no question asked excellent service
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff very helpful excellent food Large rooms and large bed very clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room smaller than expected for superior room but still adequate
Positive_Review: Hot cookies on arrival Location fantastic Views from balcony stunning as per pictures attached with Thames and Canary Wharf to right and to left shard gherkin cheese grater and sky garden walki talki Service brilliant Restaurant beautifully cooked food Terrace fab Parking 12 overnight is very good for London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Perhaps table service in the bar would be nice make a guests experience a bit more relaxing
Positive_Review: The cookie on arrival The shower is much better than ours at home Transport over the river was very convenient All the info on arrival We were able to leave our bags at the hotel whilst at Comic Con Getting nibbles with drinks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bed could ve been slightly comfier creaked every time we moved Lack of toiletries toothpaste
Positive_Review: Great location opposite Canary Wharf easily accessed by bus or free ferry shuttle Large room with fantastic view of the Thames Breakfast served until late with a fantastic selection we got there ten minutes before end of service and nothing had been cleared away which makes a nice change from other hotels

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Service charge for even buying 1 drink is strange but i believe that is normal for this part of the world
Positive_Review: Very spacious rooms Lovely location and views from hotel Very good idea with the boat into canary wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Mini bar would have been good It was difficult to get drinks in our room Also very cold room so bathrobes would be good
Positive_Review: Loved the welcome cookie and friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: beautiful room amazing views fantastic bed wonderful restaurant the staff here are incredible a credit to their employer anyone looking to see customer service at it s best needs to visit this hotel I had a flawless stay and would return again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast was a disaster Very long queue to get in the dining room Tables not cleared and generally very disorganized A shame really
Positive_Review: We loved this hotel Fabulous location and lovely welcoming staff Our room although small was very comfortable with a stunning balcony view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Tiny tiny elevators They also don t tell you that unless you get dropped off at the front door by a cab you have a healthy climb up two floors with all your bags to get there after getting dropped off on the street from the bus
Positive_Review: Awesome pillows Good public transit options to all of London Very quiet Got the best sleep of our two week vacation at this hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The noise booked a suite above a terrace party I wasn t informed of then had to move rooms a further 2 times
Positive_Review: Food was nice however the chef was wiping her nose on her whites which was off putting

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was lovely but the bed was so hard both myself and my husband had no sleep and chronic backache the next day
Positive_Review: The hotel was lovely the staff were professional our room was gorgeous and we enjoyed the food in the restaurant and sitting out on the terrace in the sun by the Thames The downside was the very very hard bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room was small Check in was a little slow and disjointed Local knowledge was lacking from staff on reception
Positive_Review: Nice bar with a good ambience Free ferry Breakfast was nice and staff at breakfast very friendly and efficient

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was nothing which could have made our stay any more enjoyable it was perfect in every way Special thanks to the team who prepared our room and the gentleman on reception who ordered the taxi to take us back to Kings Cross station
Positive_Review: My husband and I stayed at the hotel as we were visiting a show at the O2 arena to celebrate our 55th wedding anniversary My daughter unbeknown to us phoned the hotel and asked for our room to be special the results were amazing I have taken pictures with my ipad but am not sure how to upload them here Shortly after our arrival 2 members of staff came to see if we were happy with our room reception staff phoned shortly after to see if the room as okay We had a wonderful stay and I cannot recommend the hotel staff enough for making our stay so special The food and service in the reception were excellent everyone was friendly and helpful I would definitely stay here again and would recommend this hotel and its staff to anyone

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We had many issues with the hotel as soon as we arrived Firstly they had given us the wrong room and then we rang the reception so many times without any answer We rang all the numbers and no one answered any of our calls which made us have to walk all the way down to the lobby Overall it was a very disappointing stay with us questioning whether this was really a hilton as we have never experienced such bad service in any hilton we have stayed at before We would not recommend this hotel to anyone
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Hair in the bathtub The doors to the room were in bad shape they d obviously had plaques on them that had been removed and just left as is Just a question of aesthetics but still The view from the balcony was nice enough the city skyline beyond the roof tops but the balcony itself was in disrepair Bar was OK however the under section of the bar is filthy I put my hand under it to steady myself while I sat in the bar stool and came away with a nasty surprise on my hand Linens on the bed a bit rough The Black Pudding at breakfast is a firm fav but it was raw and quite obviously so so that wasn t a plus point
Positive_Review: Nice location on the river excellent ferry service over to Canary Wharf Nice large room we received an upgrade on arrival I had requested a river view which they couldn t offer Room was fine Nice big comfy bed Breakfast was VAST and plenty of choice and good bacon The chef made me a fresh omelette Excellent and attentive waiting staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Checkin was extremely poor with no details given about stay breakfast wifi how to find room Toilet didn t flush properly Drawer didn t close Reception didn t answer phone Couldn t get shower to work
Positive_Review: Room was nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Paid for an upgrade at 50 and was not upgraded room was changed on the second day and when we went into this room we found someone had left a solid present in the toilet Not great Was not happy with how it was handled and is still going on 2 3 weeks later
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Well the rooms are as basic as a Travelodge or Premier Inn despite paying for a deluxe room The tv didn t work the bedside lights didn t work not even bottles of water were provided I wouldn t bother paying the hiked fees for this hotel spend your money on a decent hotel that is actually worth the amount There s alot more noise than I was expecting too The beds are so soft so I wouldn t recommend if you suffer from back problems Overall I m very disappointed
Positive_Review: The only things that made this hotel stand out from a regular budget hotel was the free ferry over to Canary Wharf and the pretty lobby when you enter the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Very busy for breakfasthe but it was the Sunday of the London marathon Unable to get a hot drink at the bar the previous evening when we got back from o2 arena
Positive_Review: Very handy for the ferry along the river

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Long queue for breakfast and poor service once seated Eventually seated in bar area for breakfast Spent the whole of this time with a crowd of other guests right next to us all waiting to be allocated a table Had to request tea and coffee for which milk and sugar arrived 15 mins later This situation made worse as tea making facilities in bedroom had not been restocked or clean cups provided after use on Friday Disappointing end to an otherwise pleasant stay
Positive_Review: Free ferry shuttle Friendly staff Outdoor patio and decking area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bed was a bit squeaky
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a very nice location great view at night from the bar but the food and drinks could be little more cheaper Overall a lovely hotel for a couple of nights stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Too expensive for what it offered Public spaces and decor a bit tired
Positive_Review: Very friendly obliging staff All very helpful Good comfortable bed bathroom well stocked

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fab location super views great staff excellent breakfast bar terrace faultless Reliable ferry shuttle great access to city Thames Path well worth finding all the hidden treasures

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I thought as it was my partners birthday i had booked a room with a balcony and river view i could slightly see the river but i more had buildings and a badminton court It was my partners birthday and i had spoken to someone and they said they would put a little something in the room i got their and their wasn t anything when i rang reception the lady on the phone said to me ill pass u to the manager she can deal with you in a very very rude manor then the phone was hung up on me i didn t feel like the 3 ladies at the front of reception was approachable to talk to them about it especially after i had been spoken to the way i had on the phone I have always stayed at your branches and found them lovely but to be honest this kind of ruined our trip a bit as i was very angry
Positive_Review: The boat service was amazing and the staff was soooo friendly and helpful also the breakfast was very nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast service was poor but I note two staff were off sick customer services compensated me for this Real down side was the ferry doesn t run past midnight
Positive_Review: Staff were great in the hotel nice rooms comfy bed great customer service nice views from the room good access to central London and the Docklands

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Sometimes the employees don t look really organised e g at breakfast
Positive_Review: Amazing cross outside fluffy inside fries Beautiful room Very good breakfast with the best real bread in Great Britain so far

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast looked delicious and had loads of choice but cooked breakfast was all cold and served on cold plates Easily avoidable mistake which ruined it Tried to charge me over 11 to make two quick phone calls to my husband who was lost having been redirected to a different car park as hotel one full and had my phone with him by mistake That was very disappointing and ridiculously priced They took it off the bill but to try and charge that amount seemed very unfair
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel and great to get free ferry Friendly staff and lovely big room with great view Check in was quick and professional I would return Good value for money Really lovely outside terrace and great playground very close

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Had to keep re logging on to free wi fi
Positive_Review: Liked the setting very much Built over old docks and with views across the river with dedicated ferry from Canary Wharf Easier access via Canada Water and C10 bus

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: One of the reception staff was abrupt and unhelpful I do not understand why we was offered a newspaper if it wasn t going to be available We didn t find out our paper was unavailable until we asked for it We had to queue for a long time for Breakfast there clearly was not enough staff available to cope with the demand I had to ask for a glass for juice on several occasions It was a similar scenario when i wanted a bowl i was finally told they were all being washed
Positive_Review: When we arrived we were made to feel welcome and offered a warm cookie I liked that when we advised a member of Staff the hot water and phone in our room was not working we were offered an alternative room There was a member of staff working outside by herself she was totally run off her feet However she couldn t do enough to help us

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The single beds in my twin room were not great standard single size but just not very comfortable
Positive_Review: Good sized twin room nice and clean with good facilities big TV nice shower etc Hotel facilities were great parking water taxi bar etc Had a burger from the bar menu for dinner which was nice and breakfast was great lots of choice and all good quality

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our sleep was disturbed due to a continuous hum all through the night had we been there for another night we would had gone to reception
Positive_Review: The location staff were very friendly and helpful the boat from hotel to Canary wharf was really useful excellent value for money will definitely book again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The front desk staff was clueless when we asked about booking tours
Positive_Review: The luggage porter named Melvan was great and very helpful i finding a doctor for me due to my illness while there

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Having to pay for wi fi access which I elected not to do The free hour was actually only thirty five minutes I know because I timed it lol
Positive_Review: The restaurant staff who were very friendly and welcoming Nothing was too much trouble

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Poor sound proofing Extremely noisy on corridor and outside Lack of privacy when curtains not drawn due to carpark being immediately outside
Positive_Review: Liked location Wifi fine

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Small window in room which could only be opened a small way because of security lock Step down into bathroom from room
Positive_Review: Warm cookie on check in Free ferry to Canary Wharf Good selection of food at breakfast Friendly polite staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I only booked the hotel because it had a river view and even called and asked if it had a river view Turned up and had a view of the loading bay so all I could see out of a tiny 3x3 foot Window was a brick wall and woken up by people outside pulling trolleys around loading trucks Not romantic at all
Positive_Review: The view from th terrace was absolutely beautiful The most amazing way to have a drink and some food

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Poor standard of pillow in the room Disturbed at night to pay for room service
Positive_Review: Amazing location Quality bar foyer Complimentary ferry on the river is excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The hotel could do with a small store selection of supplies nearby or on the premises A fridge in the rooms would be very beneficial My only other minor quibble would be how small the bathroom sinks are I enjoy having a really large sink when I go away as I only have a very small sink at home so was disappojnted to see that the sink was the same size as or possibly even smaller than my one at home doh
Positive_Review: Having been to this hotel several times over the years I was really glad to say that this visit didn t disappoint either The staff were excellent the location splendid the ferry staff were excellent the rooms were immaculate The rooms were immaculate the quality of the breakfast was superb and the restaurant manager was an excellent compere Mrs McLucas she was warm and friendly but was still clearly running a very tight and efficient ship and definitely serves some credit Excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Loved everything X
Positive_Review: Loved the room with the river view Very clean hotel and very friendly staff Wish I could of afforded to stay a few nights not just one If you ever have any offers or deals on please let me know I would definitely come back Great hotel Also loved the free ferry over to Canary Wharf very convenient Thank you x

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The hotel was quite far from a tube station
Positive_Review: The room was very clean and tidy as was the rest of the hotel The food in the restaurant was very good There was an added bonus of the free ferry use to get to the other side of the river

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was no net curtain to cover the balcony door and you could see the bed in the next room the only way to get privacy was to shut the curtains which blocked all the sun out The TV was fixed flat to the wall therefore you could not lay on the bed to watch TV to relax We ordered a continental breakfast to be brought to our room Firstly it arrived later than within the 10mins of your given time there was no spoons for the cereals there was no pastries or croissants and quite frankly the tray arrived looking like it had been thrown together and not nicely laid out as we would have expected I rang Room Service to ask for the rest of our breakfast items but got no reply so I rang Reception A short time later pastries and spoons were brought to the room but no croissants We were not happy with the way the staff member pushed his way into the room we felt our privacy wasn t respected on this occasion We would not return to this Hotel Lastly there was no light near the only mirror in the room that would be used to dry your hair and put on make up light is needed for these tasks
Positive_Review: The Bed was really comfy All the hotel staff spoke and said Hello as they walked passed you The views are lovely too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Very warm welcome by staff and warm cookies which was a lovely start Hotel is simply stunning breakfast was fab and the views across the Thames were superb Room was lovely well equipped with hairdryer and iron and the view was great There s a bus stop right outside the hotel which you can travel to the tube which was ideal and the ferry passes were very handy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The breakfast was not worth the extra money although nice the bacon was rock hard and by the time you sat down the food was near enough cold The staff wasn t very helpful and did not make us aware before hand or during booking in that an extra 50 a night will be charged and given back within 4 5 working days I am stating this for the people like me who did not know this
Positive_Review: Nice hotel in a remote location near the river themes

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The view we had
Positive_Review: Room was lovely although the view wasn t that great but didn t affect our stay the ferry crossing was a lovely way to get to the hotel and all the staff I came across were very friendly and helpful hotel clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Maze like corridors making it difficult to navigate Size of bathroom
Positive_Review: Location Extra special service from the waiter and chef when we ate on the terrace Quality of room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Weird smell in hall way Not enough mirrors in the room
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfy staff very polite and helpful Great location very useful free ticket for river bus Room very spacious

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Disappointing that wifi wasn t free
Positive_Review: Great location for the O2 short ride on the Thames Clipper Very helpful staff Great rooms really comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Check in was a bit slow but nothing to complain about
Positive_Review: Location and how easy using the ferry was cookies were nice on arrival Breakfast was excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast was chaotic and disorganised Waited over 20 mins to get seated and then disappointed by poor service no crockery food quality and cleanliness of dining room
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel in ideal location Room comfortable 1 min Ferry to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff need to learn manners Don t boast about things like choc chip cookies when you don t provide them Told the bar would shut at 1 00a m when it shut at 11 45p m
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bar staff slow messed up a few orders including ours No personalities no enthusiasm Pillows hard and no mini bar
Positive_Review: Cookies given at check in and parking on site

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Wasnt happy that i didnt get a walk out balcony like others and that the water was not warm only luke warm
Positive_Review: The hotel was very comfortable The view was amazing especially at night the rooms were a nice size

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The only thing that bothered me slightly was having the room situated next to the door which allows access to the room near us This meant banging and people talking loudly late at night
Positive_Review: The location and rooms were lovely Very clean the staff couldn t do more for you which was great The breakfast was included in our stay which was really nice had full English buffet plus cold meats and croissants etc

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bathroom very small no minibar
Positive_Review: Lovely bed and pillows very friendly staff and stylish decor Loved the outdoor terrace overlooking the Thames also great pub 2 minutes walk away for a change Free ferry across to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: that my husband tripped several times over a tiny step in the bathroom and has a bruised toe and looks like hes going to lose his toenail not good really design fault
Positive_Review: nice sized room good view free water travel to the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I dislike having to pay for wifi especially as you can get it free on the bus
Positive_Review: The ferry across the river and down to Greenwich for the start of the marathon was an added bonus

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: That we had to exchange our rooms 3 times due to it not being up to our expectations for what we paid for Had to also go all the way back to the other room to get our own luggage Felt like we got fobbed of by most of the staff when we needed assistance always got told to ask another member of staff Also the room wasn t clean at all dirty towels and bed sheets Broken plug socket and also not a good TV for a 4 hotel
Positive_Review: We liked the suite that we had and also the Canary Wharf view It was nice having a living room as well as a bedroom Free warm cookies on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our room was right next to the lift machinery equipment and very noisy and also right above the loading area which was a problem and spoilt our break Value For 99 No We complained at reception and they offered a free breakfast but that wasn t any compensation Then as we checked out we were blocked in on the hotel car park for half an hour by a guest that had gone out for the day Its a free for all with parking that the hotel have no control over Our stay overall was very disappointing and it ruined a special weekend We had looked forward to for a few months Nice staff but we got a raw deal and won t be returning
Positive_Review: The convenience of the hotel ferry to get us across the river into the city good access plus parking at the hotel is a benefit The staff are very helpful and polite

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: My request of feather free room not take care of had to sleep without any bedcover Even after I mentioned it on my booking called the hotel nd checked and checked while booking in Disappointed that even after mentioning it 3 times it was not taken care Got free parking for the inconvinience but did not get any sleep very poor communication Not happy at all
Positive_Review: The service at the bar in the afternoon Excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Grab and Go was advertised as being 24 hours but was closed when we arrived
Positive_Review: Incredibly comfortable bed and lovely views of the docklands Really liked how there s the little bridge over the old docking station to get to one part of the hotel from another

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Literature stated free wifi It was only free for 1 hour
Positive_Review: location great for access to any part of London but no need to go far anyway free river shuttle to Canary Wharf short river trip to Greenwich Breakfast couldn t be better river views excellent Our rooms as good as expected The bestest hot chocolate chip cookies free on arrival Bath AND shower in ensuite Absolutely lovely decor

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Due to the nature of the event in London the price was premium Bathroom was small for an executive room
Positive_Review: Stayed in this hotel as it was ideally situated for me to run the London marathon The hotel went out of its way to cater for the marathon runners early breakfast healthy choices ferry to Greenwich ideal for marathon runners Room was spacious and bed was very comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Some staff weren t briefed about the additional marathon services so was confusing with conflicting information
Positive_Review: Fantastic breakfast hotel put on free ferry for marathon runners to get us to the start line Free cookies on check in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were so good Eddie sorted disabled parking straight away for my Mum Sandra sent fruit to my room as soon as we checked in Our 6th stay at hilton riverside Now Hilton doubletree

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The lift to our room was very small and no mini bar in the room
Positive_Review: The room was just the job bed was very comfortable the bar was lovely and the staff very pleasant and efficient The location for the concert we attended at the O2 was really good FREE FERRY Breakfast was superb with very polite staff and plenty of choice thank you

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The tele doesn t move off the wall can not watch this In Bed properly
Positive_Review: The beds were comfy great facilities for runners for the marathon good breakfast and great boat taxi service to the start

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast staff very rude I had to ask 3 times for a cup of tea at breakfast most hotels offer you a pot when it did come it was slammed down in front of me Also whenever I ve stayed at a Double Tree Hilton we ve been given warm cookies on arrival this wasn t offered but must have been available as I saw other guests with them
Positive_Review: Clean comfortable rooms nicely decorated

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our room felt like it was in the staff area poor view car park bins corridors a bit shabby in places lifts tiny Our room was adequate but small bathroom location my only gripes Nice to have a balcony if only to strain ones neck to see the view of Canary Wharf The bar staff were frankly poor this needs addressing especially in the evening after O2 events More heated areas outside too for us non smoking capers Cookies not all that
Positive_Review: We loved the novelty of the ferry Decor of public areas was modern comfortable Location for the O2 was fabulous

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The complimentary ferry there was a massive queue of people queuing up to catch the ferry after the gig we were attending at the 02 and we could see the boat was just sitting there the other side of the water unmanned it should have been there waiting when the gig finished Lots of people stay at this hotel because they re attending a gig at the 02 so the hotel really needs to get this weighed up
Positive_Review: Lovely room comfortable bed gorgeous breakfast with amazing choice Great location with wonderful views of the river skyline from the hotel bar Would probably ask for a room with a view next time

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I waited 1hour for room service I phoned to remind and turns out they forgot about me Came up with wrong order Dirty towels No vending machine for Snacks but yet they have a vending machine for batteries and paracetamol
Positive_Review: It was a night away from home so that was nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Would of been great if you could of used the ferry without your room keyou rather than having to pay surely if you ve stayed an you weren t aware of the service before you should be able to use a return service
Positive_Review: The bed was so comfy massive thumbs up I didn t want to leave Loved the welcome cookie too however just the gesture I m sure there were nuts in the cookie an I didn t want to risk a reaction The location was lovely as it s further out would of been nice for recommendations

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The price of the breakfast I went to the harvester at the O2 and had an eat as much as you like full english and continental with unlimited drinks for less than half the price of two full English breakfasts at the hotel
Positive_Review: I was impressed by the facilities and the cosy personal feel to the place

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I requested a room overlooking the river we got a room with a white washed very small window I had said it was my husbands 50th birthday surprise weekend when I booked yet I had to go and complain about it not the best start to our weekend we were moved to a a room with a view after I complained but having to do so we only just made out theatre time all became very rushed and harrised
Positive_Review: Most comfy bed ever

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fantastic staff who were helpful polite and went out of there way to be friendly to the adult with learning disabilities I was accompanying fantastic Buffet

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Slightly off the beaten path but it is nice returning to a quiet that isn t in the middle of the busy city
Positive_Review: Great staff very friendly Staff were always more than happy to help Nice and quiet place too Nice clean place Food in the restaurant was fantastic however I d say breakfast was slightly expensive Dinner though Outstanding

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location A long walk 1 hour 40 mins if you miss the ferry which stops at midnight As a mature couple we had to ensure we were making our way back to hotel well before 11 30pm So much for the city that never sleeps we had no choice
Positive_Review: Staff were wonderful breakfast was outstanding and the chef would make things to order A nice touch with the cookie

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The fact it took nearly 30 minutes to check in was crazy To have an e check in desk which I had done and a Hilton Honours desk to recognise different guests was great but then to not let guests use the different desks was madness I tried to check in at 2pm but was told the room was not available you should have let me check in at that point instead of telling all guests to come back later creating a massive queue that you could not cope with As I say MADNESS Additionally it took 3 keycards to get out Car Park 2 and I did not enjoy walking up and down the road
Positive_Review: Overall the feeling of the hotel was very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The ferry time table didn t make any sense for weekend not easy to travel around without the ferry at night We had to get a taxi
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The first room 431 was unsuitable as the sloping roof had windows that the curtains would not close to conceal and we moved rooms so that the light did not wake us in the early hours
Positive_Review: River location and shuttle ferry Comfortable beds and spacious room Breakfast was good Nice bar

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room felt a bit clinical and box like Tube was a good distance from hotel despite river link Which didn t start till 8 55 on a weekend Room was quite noisy as backed into homes Didn t quite have the same feel as the Marriott we stopped in on Canary Wharf in December which cost a similar amount
Positive_Review: Breakfast was lovely and staff pleasant

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was my boyfriends birthday and the staff were so lovely he received a cheesecake delivered to the room and a complimentary breakfast it was so lovely Will definitely be going back again and again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Everything was great apart from there was only a few channels on the TV only BBC 1 and E4
Positive_Review: The receptionist gave us welcoming chocolate cookies They also gave us free passes for the Ferry to get into Canary Wharf for the duration of our stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing wrong with the hotel just Booking com s description of the room was very misleading Riverview should have read No View windows covered in etch vinyl so not transparent Tut Tut Booking com
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Walk in shower requested NOT provided Double room booked they tried to give us a twin No Heating in the room had to have a space heater They made me sign a form due to my slight disability i am not in wheelchair nor walking sticks in case of fire they would come and knock on my room VERY VERY humiliating for me
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: NOT REALLY VALUE FOR MONEY FOR THE SIZE OF THE ROOM ALSO STILL HAVENT HAD AN INVOICE EVEN AFTER CONTACTING THE HOTEL AGAIN
Positive_Review: FREINDLINESS OF STAFF

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The view from the bar looking over Canary Wharf and the free unlimited travel river crossing from the hotel for easy access to the other side of the river and the nearest tube station

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Terrible location We specifically booked this hotel because booking com said this hotel was 0 8 miles from Tobacco docks where we were attending the BAFTA gaming awards that evening We could have stayed at any hotel but chose this one based purely on location value for money What a joke 0 8 miles should take no more than 5 minutes in a taxi And it probably was 5 minutes from our destination ACROSS THE RIVER The reality of it was a 20 minute journey via car Booking com need to make this clear on their website as we were then late We also paid extra from a room upgrade A superior Twin room Well all I can say is God knows what the standard twin room was like because there was nothing superior about the superior twin It was tiny The bathroom was so small I didn t even have room to dry myself off after the shower It reminded me of being on a boat The layout of the hotel is also horrendous Upon check in you are given an elevator number a floor number and a room number All of the elevators are located in different locations across the hotel It was like a maze We had to ask for help in the end as lift 5 was no where to be seen Eventually after walking through the main building across a bridge and around several corners we finally found it And that was just to get the lift up to our floor Oh and suprise suprise despite us having 2 suitcases 2 suit carriers and a carry on bag not one person offered to help take our stuff to the room
Positive_Review: Check in was ok Guests are given a hot cookie upon check in which was a nice touch Decor throughout the hotel reception is nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: we were a little gutted about the view none from our room 404 We had been upgraded for a room with a bigger bed for myself and my daughter to share but I think we would have preferred a smaller bed as only 1 night with a better view over the river
Positive_Review: Booked the room for just 1 night while I took my young daughter to a concert at the O2 Great location for this a the river boat took us straight there and back no getting around London late at night with a child myself and my 8 yr old shared a room and staff upgraded us on arrival for a bigger bed which was huge and very comfortable Huge shout out for Cristian who made a big friend with my daughter and delivered pastries upto our room for her breakfast which made her feel very special Extremely clean room and overall lovely hotel The compliment boat was fabulous and another shout out for those guys who again made my daughter feel very special

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: having stayed at hilton docklands on a number of timesI noticed the staff have changed some of the new staff were not as friendly as the old staff but overall we enjoyed our stay
Positive_Review: breakfast n a bed very comfy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast could have been included in the costing considering the price
Positive_Review: The luxurious feel of the hotel was lovely and I especially liked the free water bus to the Canary Wharf during the stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Not being able to afford to stay more often
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent and treated us very well My wife and I were really impressed with their attention to us and to any questions we had We were treated very courteously by reception the breakfast chef and the ferry assistant but the smiles seemed to emanate from all staff We also liked our view of the Thames even if it was sideways on

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Didn t like to be asked for a 50 holding fee incase we had anything to eat drink or used facilities Which we only used the bar and paid then and there This was not stated when I booked it and was waived in the end but should be made clear when booking Also check in was 3 but room was still not ready at 3 so we had to wait around
Positive_Review: Lovely view across the Thames beds were comfortable and overall very clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The ferry was actually great after i booked the hotel i realised it was not in canary wharf itself but across the river so i was expecting to spend a lot of money on taxis but still slightly inconvenient if planning to go out at night One of the men on reception was a little rude and not helpful at all which is a shame as all the other staff were brilliant and very accomodating My friend and i do not know London that well and he talked to us like we were idiots
Positive_Review: Really lovely hotel we got complimentary breakfast because i had a gold card which had so many choices Very clean hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I spent the weekend here with my partner the hotel was clean and staff were extremely friendly Hotel facilities were great and the location of the hotel was ideal as there were a variety of transport options to get you to and from the centre of London We particularly liked the complimentary ferry link between the hotel and canary wharf We had an excellent trip to London and will definitely use this hotel again and recommend it to family and friends too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The only problem I had was the location as it was further away from the centre of London than I anticipated However the ferry service operated very frequently which helped alot
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable and the buffet breakfast was very pleasing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Although there had been a slight hiccup with our booking we were upgraded for free to an executive room allowing us to use the executive facilities which were brilliant the stay was perfect It was my boyfriends 21st and the whole experience was brilliant The boat shuttle service is a brilliant way of getting across to Canary Wharf where there is excellent restaurants bars

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location for sightseeing was great however if would have wanted to stay and eat late after the show we went to to see public transport doesn t run too late
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfy lots to chose from at breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfortable and the room service was excellent and really quick The staff were more than happy to deal with any request we had Breakfast was 10 10 Large choice of food

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Service charge added to food bill in restaurant without prior notification Food prices already high enough so I felt that this was a quite cheeky
Positive_Review: Warm welcome by staff inc a warm cookie Clean spacious room with free WIFI Windows and balcony door that fully opened to allow fresh air in Free ferry across to Canary Wharf direct from hotel pontoon was superb

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Great big noisy chimney type thing outside our room you could here it over the tv so I had no sleep Was supposed to check in at 3pm but room wasn t ready so got in at 4 30pm I m disabled and needed to lay down and take meds Whole room and bathroom stank of sewage phone didn t work breakfast was late and totally wrong Also towel heater was broken Shoddy and staff unhelpful Now at holiday inn in canning town so much nicer and cheaper NEVER EVER stay there again
Positive_Review: A burger

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location makes transport an issue I booked well in advance didn t get a river view Felt like I was in a bit of a box
Positive_Review: Atmosphere is lovely

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bathroom needed refurbishing The bar prices were a little too steep
Positive_Review: The location That they provided free tickets for the ferry to Canary wharf The price of the room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The Manager We have had previously stayed here and had complained about a few issues we had We thought we would try again as the location was great for our trip Upon arrival we spoke to the manager who was on the desk for check ins My word if customer service was always like this there would be no complaints We were given a lovely room and he would personally make sure that everything would be to our satisfaction and he did So thank you for making it extra special cookies too How to look after your guests and get them back we have booked again for 2017 brilliant

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bed was too small and just one blanket The view was so bad we were looking on a parking lot it did not meet our expectations
Positive_Review: The staff was really nice and friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The front of house staff were very professional but not that friendly Would have been nice to have a hello and smile on the times we walked through the hotel and saw staff management
Positive_Review: The woman at breakfast who wore the bunny ears was extremely friendly and definitely deserves a pay rise

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We had to ask for the air condiitioning to be turned off in the restaurant at breakfast it was so cold our food got cold and I had to put my coat on which was ridiculous This was a big put off
Positive_Review: A good choice for breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Car park abit tight but can t be helped
Positive_Review: Excellent service Fantastic food Amazing view a great weekend overall Plus the boat being included in the price definetely worth the money

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When myself and my partner arrived we were first given our card key to a room that was extremely small very hot with a fraction of the river view I was extremely disappointed with this as not only was we lead to a very poor room but there was no champagne waiting that I organised as a surprise for my partner I was left quite embarrassed and had to go back to a reception immediately and inform them that the room was not what I expected and was not what I upgraded The lady confirmed the room was an Executive Queens Deluxe however I knew this was not the case as I did carry out a lot of research on the variety of rooms that the hotels offers when I upgraded the room to a maximum price I could afford Without arguing she immediately gave us a new card key for another room which thankfully we were very happy with Unfortunately another problem occurred in the morning when we arrived at the restaurant for our breakfast We were informed that breakfast was not included in our room I had to bring up the confirmation on my phone to confirm with them to be allowed in which again left me fairly embarrassed in front of my partner Bedroom Although our room did have a wonderful view the bathroom was very small The bathroom tap was leaking and from what we could see this was a problem in the room for quite a while as the bathtub was fairly green under the tap The bathroom was very hot and stuffy and there was no vent
Positive_Review: Firstly arriving on the riverboat ferry from canary wharf pier to the hotel s private pier was very impressive with the beautiful views of the river Thames and surroundings it was definitely a great start Our view out the room was superb We had the Executive Deluxe Queens Room that overlooked the River with Canary wharf into the distance The restaurant for breakfast had a very wide option of different foods ranging from a fry up to fruit yoghurt cereal pretty much anything you can think of was there The restaurant was big and very well decorated busy but well organised

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Travel distance to the city centre is about 30 mins by river ferry but the travel distance is outweighed by the experience of traveling up and down the Thames to get the hotel A swimming pool would make the hotel the ideal place for a family to stay in London
Positive_Review: Great hotel and staff Free river ferry across to Canary Wharf was a great treat for the kids Playground outside the front door was a pleasant surprise

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I think the breakfast was very overpriced We booked a room that didn t include breakfast as I thought we d see how much it was when we got there Almost 20 each is very steep which is why we went elsewhere for breakfast once we checked out
Positive_Review: The whole hotel was absolutely amazing The decor and style was fantastic the rooms were really clean and had everything you would need for your stay The free ferry across to Canary Wharf was also great and provided a great link to more pubs etc

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our room was very cramped as it had a sloaping wall and the window was on that so the curtains just dangled all night and I m the morning the light shone in far too Much and you couldn t close the curtains as if the wall position
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy to sleep on and We lloved the fact we could collect the boat right outside to cross the river

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We booked a King Double as a treat for my wife s birthday and emailed this to the hotel hoping for a room with a nice outlook of the Thames but got a ground floor room overlooking the car park front entrance with the smallest bathroom ever it was a bit like the Mrs Brown s Boys under the stairs toilet sketch easier to reverse in than walk in
Positive_Review: Nice and easy for the O2 arena bus stop right outside C10 to Canada Water in around 10 minutes and then 2 stops on the Jubilee Line

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No temperature control in room very cold in the bedroom and too hot in the bathroom
Positive_Review: Very convenient ferry to Canary Wharf runs frequently at peak times

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Last morning no fried eggs chief was just cooking omelette but those who love eggs with their breakfast was disappointed went up checking with hubby several times but still none
Positive_Review: Breakfast great choice Loved the ferry across the themes

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Catching the boat to cross the Thames might be a bit annoying if you are not a tourist and time is valuable If you have time I would even say it is somewhat an attraction
Positive_Review: I ve stayed in many hotels in London and this is one of my favourite It is an old industrial building renovated in the typical dock lands industrial style a lot of character rooms are nicely laid out bar is great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing Everyone was so helpfull
Positive_Review: The staff were amazing I had arranged to propose to my partner while staying at the hotel and they set aside the library area for us decorated it with candles put our music on a wireless speaker and also put lights on the balcony where I proposed overlooking the Thames Truly memorable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was a lot of noise and I wasn t able to sleep well due to the amount of noise the delivery vans were loud and I could hear the staff making noise from outside Found it very difficult during the evening to get a good sleep
Positive_Review: The food was lovely the room was beautiful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We got raw sausages for breakfast on the Sunday which we complained about after eating a few of them to the manager who showed the chef Was sick later on that evening and it really spoiled the idea of eating there again On the sat the breakfast was brill so was gutted on the Sunday Also a timetable for the ferry on the bed would have helped a lot as we were told on the sat last ferry is at 1145 but we never new that was only at the sat and not the Sunday so cost us 35 plus around 45 mins wait to find out it wasn t coming Also room 328 bath is cracked and gone rusty
Positive_Review: We were blown away with our visit it was amazing the cocktails the staff and the rooms We re all really nice except bath

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Being charged 58 room service when we hadn t had any room service The charge was removed because the girl on reception couldn t find a receipt as there wasn t one But had we just have dropped our card in the express card box then this would have been debited from the card I used when we check in
Positive_Review: Lovely relaxed atmosphere in the bar areas bar waitress staff nice friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Plug in sunk wouldn t open so couldn t use sink Reported it to staff at reception went out hadn t been fixed when we returned late that night Had to brush teeth in bath Was given discount
Positive_Review: Bed very comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing at all
Positive_Review: The room was spacious with nice area to sit room was very clean bed comfy and a nice place to relax Checked in very quickly and is a lovely hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The angle of the TV in the room as it could not be extended enough to watch it whilst in bed
Positive_Review: Loved everything about this hotel The location was perfect Was nice and quiet in the evening with a lovely view of the city Definitely would recommend

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: the receptionist tried to charge me fifty pounds extra without telling ne untill i realised when entering my pin number the room was tiny for a queen size room and it felt likitwe was put in the abandond corner of the hotel no local shops just a small pub outside
Positive_Review: the reception area of the hotel looked nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We booked a room on booking com with the idea of what we would have however the room we were put in wasn t anything like the one we had selected it had no view what so ever and the Windows didn t even open I was quite dissapointed with this as I had planned it for a surprise for my boyfriend and he wasn t impressed at all
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and the place was very nicely set out

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room and particularly bathroom was tiny Bed was very creaky
Positive_Review: Great location for river views and ferry to Canary Wharf You get a bit more for your money than central London and the journey in was less than 20 mins by bus and tube

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Hotel is fantastic throughout from reception to the bar rest to the bedrooms hotel is so clean and staff that were around were so helpful and always had a smile on there face service and quality of the food was superb location is great for the o2 and bars over the way by ferry ive worked in a 5 hotel for 14 years and travelled to a lot of 5 hotels and this is up there with them great hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Reception staff not understanding English which resulted in me being charged an extra 14 instead of credited 14 Took nearly 20 minutes to check out and we thought the issue had been resolved when we left but clearly not the case
Positive_Review: Rooms very comfortable Bar relaxed and welcoming

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Surcharge
Positive_Review: Should tell people there s a surcharge before hand rather then giving a receipt with with it added with no explanation we were not the only couple that complained

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Stayed in the Queen Guest Room and the views were amazing as they overlooked the docks Very peaceful out on the balcony at night and the room service was really good as well Would definitely recommend

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Very expensive bar for fairly poor food our room was at the back so woken up to bottles being throw in to main bins every morning not a great location
Positive_Review: Beds were poor rooms small and the bar closed to residents at 1am If you missed the last ferry it was a very expensive taxi back from the O2

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We could hear people leaving the lift in the early hours and in the morning The hall ways could have been updated a little to match the rest of the property
Positive_Review: Comfy bed great views in comfortable surroundings The bar and terraces were great also We also appreciated the possibility of express checkout

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room service Requested replenish of coffee milk not restocked by morning maid Requested at 23 15 and told it would be 30mins as they were very busy finally arrived at 00 45 Next night trouble with safe Rang reception at 23 00 no one came to room so went to reception twice and finally around 00 40 told that there were no staff who could deal with it until first thing next day After chasing at 7 00 the same person who d been on duty the night before came at 7 15 and fixed it in minutes A stay here was an expensive treat for us and we had to go to work straight from the hotel it was not a restful experience
Positive_Review: Great balcomy views of the City and over the river to Canary Wharf from the room Liked having to get the ferry across and seeing the beach as the tide came and went Breakfast staff very pleasant even when busy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Had some problems checking my booking hence the upgrade I simply wanted to know if I could check in early and if we had two double beds as per the website The effort it took to find this out was less than good and spent 20 minutes talking to 3 people to find this out I even called the hotel and was told to talk to my travel agent Also had problems ordering some sandwiches and room service just after 11 An hour and half later we cancelled the order They waived the parking fee to compensate
Positive_Review: Fantastic location and a lovely hotel recently refurbished We got an upgrade to a 2 room suite having had problems with the booking This room is normally 300 a night and t is easy to see why Two 6 double beds 3 TV s lounge area and shower room Room and balcony overlooked the Thames and Canary Wharf There is a free ferry boat across the river to Canary Wharf to the Clipper which runs to the centre of London and O2 Very convenient for all this Nice bar and restaurant with huge selection of options for breakfast We parked under the hotel too Will certainly stay here again for O2 and other Lady running the restaurant was excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The heating in my room didn t work and it was cold seeing as I was by the riverside room
Positive_Review: The views and links to other places the hotel itself is beautiful loved the boat services too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bathroom was a little small Found empty bottle of water in from which was discovered after a chair was moved
Positive_Review: The complimentary ferry to Canary Wharf Very pleasant and helpful staff Bed very comfortable and spacious Good range for breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Me and my boyfriend booked this for Valentine s Day and booked a king with a balcony I chosen this hotel as it was so close to the river and had wanted a room with balcony with at least a decent side view of the river in the booking I asked very nicely if it would be possible to have a room with a decent view as it was my first valentines I m originally from London and absolutely love the river when s we arrived the room we received was over looking a car park we were at least four rooms away from the view of the river from the side that was visible through literally a crack in between buildings I didn t even feel like we were next to the river at all I appreciate that there are many rooms but seeing as I had specifically asked very nicely and there were many rooms that were closer to the river even from the side or ones that over looked a a small artificial lake would have been fine but I may as well have been in any hotel in London the view was the opposite direction to all of the classic London sky line so basically could have been anywhere I couldn t help but feel very disappointed it s not like I was not willing to pay for a room with a decent view but this was the most expensive room that had a balcony this was my first ever Valentine s Day as I have never been in a relationship before and I can t help but feel like it was a let down as I had booked this hotel specifically for the view of my beloved Thames
Positive_Review: The hotel in general was nice the room was clean and comfy the staff were mostly lovely but not very helpful the cash machine in the hotel was broken at the time and when I asked member of staff where the nearest one was I recieved no answer which left me and my boyfriend blindly searching for one on our own

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The rooms were really small The food was terrible and undercooked It was impossible to find our room We paid for a view of a car park Not worth the money at all
Positive_Review: It was tidy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Parking was expensive and hard to get in and out of plus our TV didn t work Staff weren t too helpful
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy and the decor was nice River boat was good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
