Negative_Review: ist room no view covered windows no tv reception told staff no response till complaining again next day got a upgrade very happy also new pictures in dining area changed why not of history as before did not like heavy uncovered hot air blowers over doors had to dodge them
Positive_Review: beds comfy made up every day breakfast excellent as always expensive if not booked in advance with a deal nice area free ferry crossing to other side a bonus

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Just a shame about a couple little house keeping department issues but the way the staff sorted these out was a credit to the hotel and very professional
Positive_Review: The location decor staff was amazing and services and staff are a credit to the hotel The staff really professional and always there when needed Excellent customer service and will now be my hotel of choice when visiting London in the future

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: we were in a room near the boiler flues in the car park so it was very loud at times The Tv signal was very poor which made it impossible to watch But this wasn t a real problem as we wer on a weekend away
Positive_Review: The breakfast was great Staff were very helpful and attentive Room was very clean and comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The first room had no heating the second room did but u couldn t turn the heating up so the room was still freezing U can hear the lift buzzer going constantly and room was very small and the bathroom was tiny
Positive_Review: Comfy bed great view great choice for breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The TV remote control didn t work The heating fan was too loud at night waking me up every time it started up
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfy and every where was clean The hotel generously acknowledged my husbands birthday and honoured my request for a river view Nice food for both evening and breakfast Thanks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Not enough tea and milk in the room and maybe some biscuits would have been nice Didn t have breakfast we thought it was too expensive
Positive_Review: The cookies though as my daughter has a nut allergy and alternative for her would have been good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We arrived quite late to check in and were quite tired from a day walking around London We got to the room and it was pretty nice until we started noticing small black hairs all over the place We ran a bath and just before getting in noticed a number of these hairs floating in the bath Then went to the sink and more hairs there Went to phone reception and to my surprise there was even hair on the phone Reception didn t answer despite a number of calls so we ended up having to go back to reception to complain We were given a new room but this isn t really ideal at midnight when all we wanted was a relaxing bath and to get to bed The staff seemed too used to dealing with complaints and even at this time there was a queue at reception where we overheard a few more complaints

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room bathroom although comfy clean was a litle to small for my liking but nevertheless warm cosy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The whole hotel is clearly tatty and slightly tacky The hallways the doors the woodwork in the rooms are that old dark brown stained bashed up wood used in seedy cheap B Bs around the UK They have pipped an artificial sickly sweet air freshener via the air conditioning which makes a dreadful noise when on into the corridors and bedrooms Truly nauseating if not a health hazard The shower bath very narrow and difficult to climb into for a shower and slippery had rusting taps and mould between the all the edging The towels and flannels were actually shredded The beds were so creaky you daren t move for waking people up And you could hear everything that was going on in the neighbouring rooms Oh and finally if you are into all things brown this is the hotel for you Not at all what we expected for a so called 4 star hotel Shame on you
Positive_Review: The area around Surrey Quays is an interesting area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The walls are really thin and it s quite noisy didn t get the best nights sleep however beds were comfy
Positive_Review: Lovely room good location and nice views of the Thames

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: that you only get 60 mins free wifi in certain areas The rooms can be expensive and having wifi avaliable all round would make this hotel even better for people
Positive_Review: Loved the warm cookies Although we didn t get them on arrival but as soon as we made staff aware they apologised and handed them to us The organisation of both the hotel boat and the clipper from Canary Wharf was excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff came across a little rude trying to rush us through check in Maybe as there was a que but still we had travelled for over 2 hours and it didn t feel very welcoming We only had 2 milk sachets in the room so when we returned from an evening at the o2 we went to reception to ask for more milk so myself and my partner could have a drink from the room facilities but it seemed we interrupted a conversation between 2 members of staff I Felt uncomfortable On departure when checking out the receptionist did not tell us about stairway in the building down to the Carpark so we went outside and found we couldn t exit the way in which we had arrived as the metal shutter gate to the car park was down This wasnt down on arrival down the ramp So we came back up the ramp into reception to be told of a stairwell in the main reception going down to the Carpark then after going downstairs we found out that you need a coin to exit the Carpark which we were not given After returning upstairs a second time and feeling rather annoyed after having to que and ask to get the coin it all felt very unorganised
Positive_Review: The location I can t fault it was excellent great view and comfortable beds although I wish we were told about the free ferry it would of saved us a long round trip to the O2

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The heater in the room didn t actually heat up so the room was quite cold at times Also it was difficult to close the wooden shutter because the heater got in the way But overall they seemed quite minor
Positive_Review: The room was very similar to the photos on the site lovely decor and spacious It was a nice surprise that we got a free ferry ticket for the duration of our stay The welcome cookie was also a nice touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I had difficulty connecting to the wifi as I couldn t figure out how to connect to it and when I tried con aging the restaurant on our room phone nobody answered
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff and a free room upgrade with a beautiful view Also found the free ferry tickets extremely useful and the hot cookie on arrival was just an added bonus

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bar was a good place to sit but there was a cold breeze so too chilly to be comfortable for long
Positive_Review: I enjoyed the short ferry ride to the hotel the room was very clean and staff were happy and helpful Close to Docklands bars and restaurants A little tricky with travel in to town but not too bad once we d worked it out A

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 35 minute wait to check in receptionist did not relay much or relevant information forgotten to give us water taxi tickets advise of facilities or where anywhere was located heating wasn t working so reception was freezing was 1 degree outside no heating in room quickly got moved to another hotel location far further than stated from tube stop
Positive_Review: Free water taxi across to canary wharf quay complementary cookies and waterwatered arrival great rooms good taxi service from hotel cool bar

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: When we arrived at the hotel the room that we were given was not as described I was promised a river city view but all we could see was the flats opposite so we asked to change rooms The second room we were given was beautiful and had a lovely view The room was clean however the toilet had not been flushed The air conditioning was on full blast in the middle of January and couldn t be turned off We had to get a maintenance man the come to our room to switch the system off completely The room was still freezing so we had to get a radiator sent to the room We found the staff quite rude When we called reception about the air conditioning there was no answer My partner went down to reception and asked why there was no answer and the woman shrugged her shoulders and said I don t know
Positive_Review: The room in the hotel was beautiful the view was lovely and the room all in all was very comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We were left standing at the bar and other customers came after but got served first and we were due to check out at 12midday but the maid knocked and came in our room at 11 then again at 11 40
Positive_Review: The rooms

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: the bed was pretty hard
Positive_Review: Location was ideal for travel in to London with 2 different buses a stones throw away from the main entrance and a ferry going from the hotel to canary wharf scenery was lovely at night with all the skyline lit up from the buildings on the other side of the river

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The facilities are poor They have had a refurbishment and there are many problems if you stay on the Wharf side I wouldn t stay there again and regret my booking with this hotel Approached staff and Hilton customer services with regards to no hot water poor water pressure noise issues but no solutions Very poor
Positive_Review: Thames Ferry docks at the hotel Great link to the rest of the city as nearest tube is a good 15 minute walk via parks Wouldn t walk this at night obviously

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location and love the ferry back and forth to Canary Wharf Our room was fantastic with a view of Canary Wharf in the evening We had a free upgrade on our arrival too Beds and really comfortable room was a great size all clean and tidy Fantastic time

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We didn t get the room we had booked we had asked for and paid for a river view and ended up not getting a view at all The heating didn t work the television did not show the main channels the hair drier didn t work

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The shower sprayed water all over the bathroom when used They did provide you with extra towels for the floor
Positive_Review: The great free ferry service from their dock to the other side of the river The room was large and spacious The staff were very helpful We had a view of the river which was a lovely surprise

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I ordered room service pizza chips and some noodles I had to wait for over an hour for this When I finished you was told to leave the plates on a tray outside your door which we did it was very dangerous and the corridor was very slim but that wasn t my main concern When walking to breakfast the next morning me and my partner walked in a private room next to the elevator mistaking it for the stairwell and in there was the tray with the plates and leftover food on I have photo evidence The room was clean but bits were obviously rushed and missed there was what seemed to be a pubic hair on the telephone and long blonde hair in the bath I have brown hair overall it was an average hotel to stay in nothing like it makes out to be I recently stated in the hotel In Leeds doubletree which was amazing and is the only reason I went for a Hilton doubletree again Very disappointing
Positive_Review: It was very convenient that the hotel offers a free boat to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location was a bit tricky to get to charged an obscene amount for two sandwiches and some crisps Kitchen closed at 11 but we ordered foor at ten to and were told it was closed Cold Tesco sandwiches x5 the price was massively out of order
Positive_Review: Beautiful room lovely hotel free transport over the river for guests

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: If I was being hyper critical the service in the restaurant was a bit inconsistent
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel Amazing value though I did book as part of a January offer Very comfortable and would stay again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room service turned out to be a bit more expensive than expected as well as the wi fi in the rooms
Positive_Review: Very good location out of the center of London quiet Transport was quite easy Clean rooms and warm atmosphere

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Checked in and agreed to a standard room instead of the river view room that I had booked and was willing to pay for The room is uncomfortable noisy area of the hotel kept thinking someone was going to come into our room Was disturbed when having a bath with men knocking on my door wanting in to service the bathroom when I was still checked into the room Drilling began at 9am each morning Never told when checked in that needed a ferry ticket luckily had my oyster card but was 2 70 to get across when could of had free trip if the hotel had of told me Checked out with my bill expected it to be paid on that day and not 7 days later the hotel now take the money leading my bank into overdraft Look elsewhere Yes it s nice hotel but really not worth it
Positive_Review: Ferry from the hotel to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I m not sure that it was the faults hotel but when booking this for New Years Eve through Booking Com I was led to believe I had booked the Hilton beside Tower Bridge We therefore had planned out entire day thinking we was in another part of London when in fact we was the other side of the river This caused a few issues as we had tickets booked for the theatre a restaurant booked for the evening and even tickets purchased for the fireworks all on the South side yet we was no where near any of this The hotel is lovely yet very disappointed with Booking Com as their description of the hotel is not up to date there is no swimming pool and the king suite does not have a kitchenette nor does it look anything like the pictures they are advertising
Positive_Review: Clean spacious lovely breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I have booked for an riverside room however I had got the most smallest and horrible room ever I have been advised by Booking com that I had booked for a riverside room but when I get to the hotel after 3 hours of driving it was a terrible mistake to go through booking com you have let me down You should get for what you pay Terrible
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It was quite difficult to find the right elevator for the right section where your room was located It was like a rabbit warren or a maze There wasn t enough staff on at reception causing long waits for service
Positive_Review: I liked the fact that you could take the ferry over to Canary Wharf It was delightful to walk over there

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: We booked a deluxe queen room with a balcony and they gave us the key to a 2 single beds room and no balcony Complained at the reception one of the members of staff was absolutely useless however a gentlemen got involved and managed to find us a room better than the one we actually booked for the same price
Positive_Review: The view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Poor ventilation in our room and No mini bar Expensive wifi 15 per day for wifi in room is a bit too much
Positive_Review: Excellent view from restaurant Amazing breakfast and loved that frequent complementary ferry to Canary warf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff had the cheek to tell me the queen size balcony rooms were unavailable Offered me a double supreme room and said that it was more expensive than my originally booked room but won t charge me extra A little research later and I find out that it is in fact 40 CHEAPER Poor service sly methods of money making and staff who lie On top of that a room I had booked 3 weeks prior is unavailable No one offered to carry our bags either
Positive_Review: Clean hotel nice cookies on entrance

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Hotel was quite out of the way as the tube station was quite a walk as we found out with bags in tow There is a bus service which runs from Canada Water station to outside the hotel which was useful but next time I would rather stay more central as we spent a lot of time travelling in and out 20 95 plus a 5 tray charge for breakfast was rather extortionate however it was nice
Positive_Review: Rooms were nice clean and modern Staff extremely helpful and ferry service useful The outdoor seating area off the bar is fantastic on the Thames and over looking Canary Warf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I booked a smoking room as an essential part of my stay with the intention of smoking my last box of cigarettes ever with plans of giving up for 2016 so my partner and I arranged to do it in style only to arrive at the hotel and be told they have never had smoking rooms We decided to stay anyway since we had made the trip trying to park was also an issue as the shutters did not work so I had to leave the car and walk back in to inform staff who let us in manually I believe we checked in at 10pm and checked out at 12 30 because what I had prepared myself for in terms of smoking my last box of cigarettes ever became much more stressful than I had anticipated so much so that i had to check out and we deemed it better to go home rather than stay in the hotel room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Hotel is very isolated unless the ferry to Canary Wharf works for you I chose the hotel because Booking com told me it was only a couple of miles from the venue in Wapping I was spending the evening at It didn t point out there was a bloody great river in the way and the taxi fare to get across was about 40 so the need to use bus and overground meant I had to leave before the end

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I emailed to find out about the ferry to get to the hotel but received no reply I called to check and the person I spoke to told me it was complicated to get from the tube to the ferry so recommended getting the bus It s actually very easy to get to the ferry from canary wharf The room was okay but as I have found with lots of these rooms on booking com in London they are huge rooms that the hotel really has trouble selling or need upgrading and don t really represent a deal as such
Positive_Review: View from the terrace and outside bar area and breakfast Ferry to canary wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff are untrained and inexperienced 2 big events on in the area O2 concert and World Cup Rugby and there were not enough staff to cater for all the guests well enough Poor communication and badly stocked bar no Guinness Insufficient food to fulfil the menu
Positive_Review: Rooms are comfortable and staff are friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The size of the room for what we paid was quite small There was no main light or floor lamp in the room so in the evening it was quite dim The mattress on the bed was not comfy you could hear and feel the springs again for the money you expect more
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was excellent the water ferry was very convenient and it was great to use the river rather than just land transport Balcony in the room was a plus

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The tv didn t work we had to psych 50 per payment which was not mentioned before hand
Positive_Review: When s liked the balcony and the room size including our bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Didn t have a working television There was no hot water On complaining in the morning reception staff said boiler was faulty didn t really help our predicament Breakfast not worth the price
Positive_Review: Beautiful setting on the river Was able to sit outside until late into the evening as blankets and patio heaters were provided Bedrooms ideal lovely comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The length of time it took for us to actually check in was ridiculous I had always been told double tree are great hotel and give you a cookie on arrival where as this wasn t something we experienced on our stay but did see others had which isn t great service also we had booked the king suit and this looked nothing like the pictures there was no telephone in the room to call down reception and we was on the 6th floor 8 staircase so as you can imagine this would have been useful also the hotel added 10 on to our taxi fare and we wasn t made aware there was an additional charge for the hotel calling the taxi overall I was disappointed I wouldn t choose a hilton or doubletree again I would recommend a Novotel
Positive_Review: I liked the fact there was a free ferry ride over to canary wharf the included breakfast with the stay was worthwhile

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Noise from adjoining rooms upstairs children running round banging doors
Positive_Review: Wonderful view excellent room and facilities Clean and tidy Could not have asked for more

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: room not ready at 3pm fro check in Room very dusty Breakfast chaotic and dis organised
Positive_Review: The room was tastefully decorated Some of the reception staff were excellent choice of breakfast and quality was above expectation

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Some of the rooms on the ground level are a little bit older than the rooms on the higher floors from my experience with this hotel
Positive_Review: Good value for money in the off season During summer the rates can be a little on the higher end as it is considered a four star hotel The staff seem to maker an effort to give customer service based on HIlton standards

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing apart from the bath plug needed a bit of maintenance
Positive_Review: The welcome when we arrived after midnight The view The ferry ticket The lovely breakfast The quiet room Every member of staff was cheerful and pleasant

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Being given the wrong information about what level my room was on
Positive_Review: A unique experience of the Canary Wharf skyline at night great room with desk etc the breakfast is excellent as are the waiting staff who serve and want to help guests It was a pleasure to be served by polite staff I will always check out this Hotel everytime I am in London henceforth

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 1 TV installed at 90 degrees to bed weird 2 Room over car park very noisy most of the night 3 Toilet seat broken 4 Chair broken 5 After complaining they agreed to move us to another room and agreed to move our luggage When we returned late on Sunday night they had not moved our luggage and seemed confused 6 Breakfast at 21 pounds was cold pre fried eggs and hard bacon 7 Summary while staff seemed eager to please there seemed to be a general lack of management

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The only thing that I would point out is that the room was cold and there were no instructions for the air conditioning system We stayed cool
Positive_Review: We my 10 year old daughter and I arrived late and tired having got ourselves lost on Canary Warf and then missing the shuttle ferry The young man at reception was delightful updgraded us and cheered my daughter up with warm cookies Breakfast was lovely we didn t have the hot option but really enjoyed our fruit yogurt and croissants

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The staff were acting funny because we wanted a refund as we didn t get the room we booked for After 20mins of going back and forth we were offered a suitable room offering city and river views

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: TV was positioned terribly in the room Shower had been bodged so water went everywhere when first turned on
Positive_Review: Breakfast Nutella muffins Bath was nice and big Bed was comfy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The room was quite a way from the main reception desk
Positive_Review: The hotel was very clean and modern and the room was beautiful with a fantastic view We were given a free upgrade on arrival as there was availability

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Asked for a balcony with a nice view Received a room without a balcony altough paid for one Had to change rooms once changed really disappointed with the view from the room which was over a car park and of the housing building next door Made the stay so unromantic
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: False advertisement on the pictures of the room The picture outlined was not what we got in the end I didn t like the fact we had a stone wall in our room was extremely cold Fire alarm was set off due to a guest smoking in their room even though it states on booking com that you can have a smoking room we were stood outside for 10 minutes because we weren t allowed in the building When we eventually got in the ambience was very cold no one to greet us no music no heating all staff approx 10 were running around like headless chickens unsure of what they should be doing when in fact should have made all guests aware of what was happening We were then told that we would be charged 13 for parking our car I refused to pay and the concierge waivered the charge which we were grateful for The room itself needed a re vamp Hard bed old furniture with stains on even the food menu was covered in red wine
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: It wasn t like other hiltons rooms were ok
Positive_Review: There was a problem with our room and the supervisor upgraded us and provided excellent customer care

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: restaurant extermely crowded hotel team was not prepared for having many guests long waiting time for breakfast and dinner
Positive_Review: good location nice view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Positive_Review: The Breakfast and accessibility to transport was very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Room definitely not like pictures Completely misrepresented Website showed nice balcony had Juliet balcony also misrepresentative 1 curtain was hanging light didn t work tv didn t work fridge didn t work Etc etc etc etc Had a kid one bed suite with a normal size bed come on who puts a normal size bed in a suite Due to small bed and snoring I had to sleep on sofa Left a day early couldn t take it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Firstly our room we booked wasn t the one we was given Bathroom was tiny view wasn t what we booked river view our room looked at the bar restaurant Charged me 50 pound extra even though the receipt showed correct amount my bank statement says otherwise Poor hotel all round will not use again
Positive_Review: Being in london

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Restaurant food was disappointing and some staff were welcoming As a single woman I didn t want to sit in the bar to eat but was not allowed to order from the bar menu and be served in the restaurant One of the more expensive places I have stayed in the area and the least satisfying
Positive_Review: Reception staff were friendly and helpful Moved me to a quieter room with out any question

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff were very slow to respond to calls from the room room service response in particular needs improving need also make sure all room facilities are in place and good order
Positive_Review: Very good sized room staff very friendly and good location for Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The ferry over the river is difficult to find when you first arrive on canary wharf side When you eventually find the dock there are no clear directions Not particularly good when you arrive late in the evening very tired Also TV in room was not working so having arrived late and unpacked we had to pack up again and be moved to another room The hotel sorted it quickly but inconvenient having to be moved all amenities should be checked prior to arrival to avoid this
Positive_Review: The room was very comfortable clean and spacious Just a quick trip over the river to the hotel Welcomed with a warm chocolate cookie Value for money

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Car parking facilities inadequately explained Phones not working in two rooms Room standard booked was not provided and had to be changed New room was not to the same standard as booked 24 hour room service not as described in brochure i e nothing other than supermarket sandwiches after 11pm When ordered not delivered Both rooms had broken desk drawers Flaking paint plaster in stairwell With the exception of one member of staff attitude and advice from staff unhelpful Radio did not work
Positive_Review: One member of staff was actually helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I booked a queen suite however was extremely dissapointed to find the bed was only a double I confronted reception who offered us free breakfast but no offer to put us in the correct room At breakfast the service is shockingly bad We sat out on the terrace and i had to go looking for for cuttlery and glaases for drinks when people inside were waited on at tables Would never reccomend to anyone
Positive_Review: The location is good as is the free ferry over to canary wharf The room was clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The location isn t a massive problem and the majority of the time the walk to and from the tube station was quite nice However when in a rush or carrying bags it s much worse and having to wait for the boat can be quite frustrating
Positive_Review: The foyer and the bar were well designed and the rooms were too The sound of the waves washing up on a morning were a particularly nice suprise

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast on the Sunday was very busy 600 people staying at the hotel We turned up at 10 00 and we had to queue for a table and then we had to queue again for a cooked breakfast Not enough staff to cope with the demand which resulted in uncleared tables no plates and glasses at the food stations and not very happy customers Though once you got your food it was very good with a wide selection on offer Location was a bit too far out for central London but once we located the right tube line at Canary Wharf situated within the shopping centre which is a bit of a maze we managed to get into Covent Garden
Positive_Review: The area the hotel is situated in is very nice and the view from our balcony was lovely Hotel very modern with a free ferry to take you across the Thames to Canary Wharf though if you want to get back around midnight you need to double check the crossing times

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Step to the toilet
Positive_Review: Very efficient staff Room excellent though very dangerous step to the bathroom Breakfast chaotic as not enough plates etc Beautiful views and great free ferry

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Food was burnt Had to wait an hour for someone to pick up the room service phone Housekeeping walked in on me twice Once when I got out of the shower Our bed was broken They gave us a room with a small double instead of a queen sized bed This hotel took nearly 400 out of my account for a 1 night stay which was only 135 and was extremely painful to get back Dreadful establishment
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Couldn t sleep because of a fan that couldn t be switched off Moved to a new room Found some hairs in the bathroom No toothbrush or toothpaste Charging for Wifi in 2015 what the
Positive_Review: Staff tried to make up for things

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast service seemed unprepared for number of guests wanting food at 10 15 and a longer than normal wait for a complete range of hot food

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The staff are not warm or friendly The stare when a god evening sir is expected I understand it s a British hotel and the rudeness is complimentary but it is an American chain I expect better manners
Positive_Review: The style of the hotel and location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Our room didn t look over the river and for what we paid this was a disappointment but the bar seating area outside was open till late which made up for this
Positive_Review: The staff in the Columbia bar were more then welcoming having a laugh with us and other visitors It was lovely to feel so comfortable The free ferry was also a huge bonus so that we could go over to Canary Wharf

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: In the past if I ve booked a docklands hotel it s usually walking distance from Canary Wharf I booked this hotel in error this hotel should be titled Hilton Surrey quays not Hilton docklands as this was misleading Our taxi driver which cost us a fortune as the boat was on a break said a lot of people make the same mistake On arrival the reception had no record of our booking luckily I had my paperwork and email on me however they had no record of me bringing my children even though I remember I had to input their ages when I made the booking To be fair the hotel rectified this and put my husband kids and I in a very spacious 2 bedroom suite My parents however mum was celebrating her 60th birthday were put in a tiny room overlooking the carpark and was kept awake till 3am with crowds leaving the hotel and car doors slamming Lesson learnt Read the address of this hotel don t just look at the title and assume
Positive_Review: Rooms very clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bit of a shambles getting seated and served for breakfast
Positive_Review: Mentioned was anniversary And they made us lovely cakes and gave us a great view Lovely cookies and pleasant staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Called reception several times no answer Breakfast awful very disorganised dirty food areas no glasses had to find waitress to ask for tea or coffee lack of food Squeaky bed
Positive_Review: Room was clean great boat service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Staff money was taken from our account by the hotel without our say so we didn t use room service or anything our bank is now dealing with this
Positive_Review: Room and hotel was lovely

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Creaky floorboards squeaky room doors corridor doors slam hot water takes 5 minutes to come through nowhere near a tube station no view the layout of the hotel is shocking even the staff haven t a clue which lift guests should take took me 15 minutes to get to my room with the help of three staff members Somehow my auto generated rating of this stay was 3 8 no way I d give it 1 for cleanliness
Positive_Review: Clean and modern room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: I did book a room on boking com a day before but for some reason it never went though so had to rebooked was 50 00 more can t get the same room I wanted The breakfast is very cold the sausage was revoting I thought as a english sausage would be a good british one but no can t eat it at all
Positive_Review: the new beds people in the bar area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Upon check in we got a card for 60 minutes of free wi fi For any more we would have had to pay This seems ridiculous to me Everyone has free wi fi these days I m willing to pay a little more for nice things at a nice hotel but paying for wi fi in 2015 is just too much
Positive_Review: Everything was very clean and looked very nice The staff were all friendly and professional Room service was a reasonable price for room service There was a wide selection of food for breakfast everything I had was delicious Our room was spacious and comfortable The bed was one of the most comfortable hotel beds I ve slept in almost as nice as my own

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Nothing bad to say
Positive_Review: Carolina on reception was really welcoming She arranged for us to change our room so we could have a river view and we ended up with a bigger room which was grear The warm cookies on arrival were a lovely touch Breakfast was vast and really tasty The C10 bus which goes from Canada Water directly to the hotel was really useful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Check in very miserable staff same on check out with a 10 minute que room was good had everything we needed but we didn t sleep most of the night as the bed was awful very time you Moved you could feel and hear the springs in the bed The pillows wear lifeless This really ruined out stay at the Hilton As we were very tired the next day we came for a treat for our wedding anniversary and said we would have come back for a celebration we have later in the year but the uncomftable bed and no sleep as put us off
Positive_Review: Location and free hopper to docklands

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Breakfast was by far the worst that I ve experienced in some time Completely disorganized and chaotic Buffet dishes not stocked food not restocked no orientation directions given by staff My table was even given away to another guest after i initially sat Also on check in no attention had been paid to my advances requests
Positive_Review: Brilliant location and exceedingly comfortable room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The heating on our room was extremely loud all night to the point I could not sleep I called reception but the phone was not working also so I had to go to reception in pjs which was quite a walk away I was told there was an issue with the heating and nothing could be done other than a refund of 25 of my room rate I had to call to chase this up and not even 20 of what I paid was refunded

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Facilities were great good value for money Room had the perfect view Breakfast had so many choices Courtesy water taxi was a god send Hotel was clean and tidy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were initially concerned about the location on the south of the river but the frequency of the boat across to Canary Wharf made it fun to go out and about We also walked into the city along the Thames Path which was both pleasurable and tiring

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 1 All 4 pillows on bed very soft Perhaps consider providing 2x soft 2x firm pillows which might better suit majority of customers Or have the 4 soft pillows on the bed but leave a couple of firm ones in the top of the wardrobe to use as needed 2 Plates for cooked breakfast all stone cold plate warmer required

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bathroom was so small that I was hitting the toilet seat with the door to get in Sink very small and ended up splashing water all over the floor Bed also felt like large single bed rather than double TV connection was poor with very poor picture quality Horrid and glary room lighting with very unpleasant colour for the LED reading light At breakfast we had to wait for ages to be given cold cappuccinos Would not stay again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: having to pay for wifi which we chose not to do Reception was far too busy rooms although lovely could do with a refresh no complimentary drinks or mini bar in the room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: At check in we were given key cards They did not work as the receptionist had put an incorrect room no on card so we had to return to desk to query I found your quality of toilet paper poor for such a hotel of its standard It was the same quality that one meets in some public lavatories cheap non absorbent paper which is very thin and requires several layers to work efficiently
Positive_Review: We have stayed before and the Hotel is very comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was a horribke horrible smell in the room it was horrible we were told when we arrived that we have to have an adapted for disabilities room we said we did not want that so we had to wait for half an hour for a normal room we then tried to phone reception about the smell and it just kept ringing no answer The bedsheets did not look clean drinking glasses were dirty it was freezing cold I was very disappointed as it was not cheap I would rate the hotel 2 and a half star
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Large and sprawling you can walk a long way to get to the bar It is also a bit out of the way for mainstream London visiting Saying that the ferry gets you over to docklands quite quickly Hilton need to get with the times and provide free WiFi for all in the hotel
Positive_Review: Once again the staff at Hilton were excellent When our taxi did not arrive the duty manager drove us to the event we were attending personally a nice touch This is a comfortable hotel with good facilities and we got a very good price on the room for London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The most ridiculous things is 12 a day for WiFi

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: no hot water in shower water was warm not suitable to take a bath or shower Bar staff are not helpful we waited 30 minutes for a drink and another 20 minutes to order food service in the outside eating area was very poor Television is in a awkward place on the wall to watch tv

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: At a few points during friday eve the bar was left with only one person to serve which resulted in a long wait to be served However the bar staff were more than apologetic
Positive_Review: The breakfast was amazing The room spacious and comfortable Views were spectacular from the terrace and nice friendly vibe Ferry was very handy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Only thing was I did not have a room with a city view but putting everything into perspective it was not an issue the hotel was great
Positive_Review: The staff were amazing the views were great and location excellent the free use of the complimentary ferry was very convenient

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The person at the front desk that instructed me to my room gave very discreet direction which led me to be lost for about 10mins
Positive_Review: Lovely furniture design cleanliness was great view was beautiful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: There was a confusion with room service and our door number and our pizza and sandwhich s took over an hour to reach us so when it did it was cold We requested a taxi to be called from reception they said the earliest any taxi could get here was a 45 minute wait when we had somewhere to be We requested on the phone please could you call us if it arrives early we will come down 10 minutes before it s due We waited and no taxi came We then had to que for a further 10 minutes to speak with reception who did not take any responsibility and we explained that we needed to be somewhere and we were made to feel in the wrong A lovely taxi driver picked us up and explained there was not a 45 minute wait on taxi s Leaving us to miss part of our venue and feel very disappointed with the service
Positive_Review: Lovely room and view very happy with location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Everything was perfect and convenient nothing disliked at all I would definitely come back
Positive_Review: The staff were absolutely lovely and so friendly Loved the fact we got free boat service to Canary that was excellent The bed was super comfy after a tiring day had an amazing sleep and the view was extremely beautiful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: The bed was very hard and we thought we was getting a river view when we complained a staff member left us waiting for half an hour and we gave up waiting
Positive_Review: The hotel it s self is absolutely beautiful and very clean I really recommend the accommodation stunning views and beautifully presented

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Even though the Canary Wharf area is beautiful I do NOT recommend this to anyone planning to visit the touristy areas because they are just way too far Also there is no free wifi
Positive_Review: Great beds views area free river shuttle

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Went as a birthday treat for my husband staff left a lovely cake and bottle of wine in our room Very helpful friendly staff especially the Spanish receptionist Lovely location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location was further out to travel into centre of London than used to This made meeting up with friends a little long winded with buses tube All manageable but would need to think of somewhere closer in future Room was well presented the bed was not comfortable at all and didn t sleep well with air conditioning issues that were resolved by reception next day
Positive_Review: Was a lovely hotel with views over river The free use of the river boat over to Canary Wharf was a great thing to have use of

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Aircon not adjustable unpleasant smell in room but not too bad that I could not stay in
Positive_Review: Room comfortable tea making facilities iron and board good bed desk After a complaint about aircon and smell in room I was given a free breakfast quite unexpected breakfast was excelent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: 1 It took a while to check in at reception as all the details was not received from Booking com apparently 2 One reception staff unhelpful when confirming that I asked for a special request She said that it was not on the system until she was asked to look again and then it was there 3 The window stills in the restaurant was dirty while eating at the window it was quite visible 4 Customer s children spilled food on the floor and it was not cleaned the whole time we were having breakfast Staff and guest just crossed over the mess 5 No swimming pool 6 Room very costly when I booked 7 It was my 10th wedding anniversary which I choose to celebrate at Double Tree and I was told that wine or fruit would be sent to the room but received nothing
Positive_Review: 1 The fresh cookies given at the reception 2 My room was changed with no problems 3 The bed was super comfortable 4 The views and balcony was fab 5 Very spacious room in the Deluxe King size 6 The staff particularly in the restaurant were friendly and helpful particularly Francis she was such a happy and welcoming lady

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We thought the hotel to be a really good place to stay We did have a little difficulty understanding couple of the staff but they were still good The bar and dining area we found to be really nice well designed and pleasant to sit and relax there are several lovely terraces to relax and or eat by the water The rooms were also good and clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Yes I did had a slight bad experience I wasn t booked into what I chosen on line The room given was one or two down in it s standard Still awaiting a proposed gesture from Duty Manager as a compensation

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside

Positive_Review: Lovely hotel great view helpful and happy staff Very comfy bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bad points are staff only seemed to be member of staff on front desk meaning I had to queue to sign in Came down in morning and asked guy on reception when next ferry was free service he took a while to find out surely he should know then when I got off other side I got stopped and asked for a ticket The guy should have told me I needed a ticket when I asked him the times I obviously wouldn t have thought I needed a ticket as it s a free service and literally goes from the hotel to other side of river it s not as though you could have jumped on half way The woman insisted I proved to her I stayed at the hotel it s the only place I could have come from she wouldn t call them for me to check either Also apparently the maid barged in on my boyfriend even though he had shouted to say he was in there and not to come in
Positive_Review: Lovely setting nicely decorated quiet and clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Sunday night water taxi finished too early meaning we missed it and had to go back to canary wharf tube and go through catching tube and bus back to hotel Should be highlighted that sunday night is not as late as normal weekdays Our fault for not checking but all the same would be helpful if there was a special notice
Positive_Review: Position overlooking the thames Free motor taxi to canary wharf General surroundings

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Bathroom was very small The room had a sort of maritime feel to it being next to the river which was not really to my taste The television was in an odd location in the room Location of this hotel was remote for London Good for Canary Wharf but thats about it
Positive_Review: Nice interiors Right next to the river with nice views from the room and restaurant Nice breakfast really good food Reasonably priced for London actually This is a good hotel

Positive_Review: Location close to Canary Wharf and free ferry across the river

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: In spite of the mass sporting event on the weekend and unlike the Novotel Cardiff The Hilton made no provision for an early breakfast for the large proportion of guests attending the event At the last minute water and bananas were laid on Considering I d paid a rate including breakfast I was aggrieved that the only way to get it would have been to pay 20 for a room service option
Positive_Review: The Hotel was in good condition with helpful staff Room was a good size with lovely aspect and well designed As the hotel has been refitted into an existing Victorian warehouse the layout is rather chaotic with tight very narrow corridors and small lifts The lifts were only accessible by first using a flight of stairs Just to be clear though overall a satisfactory if pricey stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Location Was out of the way of getting to the other side of the river once the boats had stopped at night Almost 100 in a taxi Also disappointing how hot the rooms were and the air con was limited to a certain coolness
Positive_Review: Rooms were nice and clean and the staff were lovely Loved the free cookies

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Docklands Riverside
Negative_Review: Water bottles in our room were not replaced after the first night Had dinner on the rooftop terrace on Friday night We were escorted to our seat by a lovely friendly waiter however service after this was appalling We were asked by our waitress to provide a credit card as our room didn t have credit She then took my credit card away with her to keep until we had finished I didn t feel comfortable with this so I asked for it back from another member of staff after a long wait to find someone After our meal well about 20 mins after we had finished the waitress came over to the table to collect our plates lifted them up and set them back down on the edge of the table while she went to another two tables to serve other people without excusing herself each time cutting it short and ignore diners to move to the next table She then cleared an empty table and disappeared for about 15 minutes before returning to our table to remove the dirty plates We had to ask her for the dessert menu and the bill and ended up going to the bar to pay as she took so long getting back to us She seemed flustered and appeared to be the only one serving the whole terrace which shouldn t be the case on a Friday night Our bill was wrong as we had been charged higher prices for our food and drink than were stated on the menu This was resolved but took a while to sort This whole fiasco ruined our evening and took away from the outstanding food we received
Positive_Review: The room was lovely clean and very comfortable with great views from the balcony Reception staff were friendly and welcoming Food in the restaurant was delicious Great ferry service to Canary Wharf
